AFFIX_1015_DESC.ContentEN: Grants an additional #1 EXP when used as material

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Dark.ContentEN: When triggering bonus effects, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Umbra DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks, and reduces the target's Movement Speed, ATK Speed and Stance recovery speed.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Fire.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Pyro, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Pyro DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Light.ContentEN: When triggering bonus effects, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Lumino DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks, and refreshes the remaining duration of all bonus effects.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Slash.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Slash, the Slash Damage dealt to the target's Shield is multiplied by 2.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Smash.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Smash, the reduction to the target's Stance is multiplied by 2.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Spike.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Spike, the Spike Damage dealt to the target's HP is multiplied by 1.5.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Thunder.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Electro, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Electro DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Water.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Hydro, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Hydro DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks.

ATTR_DESC_ATK_Wind.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Anemo, inflicts a stack that deals periodic Anemo DMG to the target for 6s, up to 6 stacks.

ATTR_DESC_BulletConver.ContentEN: The rate of ammo gained from the "Ammo Supply Chest" being converted into ammo for this weapon.

ATTR_DESC_CRI.ContentEN: When CRIT Chance exceeds 100%, it increases the CRIT Level, dealing higher CRIT Damage.

ATTR_DESC_EnmityValue.ContentEN: The lower the HP percentage, the higher the damage dealt.

ATTR_DESC_ExcelWeaponTag.ContentEN: Attack increases when equipped with a corresponding weapon.

ATTR_DESC_MultiShoot.ContentEN: The chance of firing 1 additional projectile when shooting, which does not consume ammo. When it exceeds 100%, there is a chance to fire more than 1 additional projectile.

ATTR_DESC_SkillEfficiency.ContentEN: Affects the Sanity Cost of a skill.

ATTR_DESC_SkillIntensity.ContentEN: Affects Skill Damage and the effect magnitude of buffs/debuffs.

ATTR_DESC_SkillRange.ContentEN: Affects the range of skill effects.

ATTR_DESC_SkillSustain.ContentEN: Affects the duration of skill effects.

ATTR_DESC_StrongValue.ContentEN: The higher the HP percentage, the higher the damage dealt.

ATTR_DESC_TriggerProbability.ContentEN: The chance of triggering Bonus Effects upon a single hit. Once triggered, if the attack deals multiple types of damage, all relevant Bonus Effects will take effect at once.
