Buff_Content_100.ContentEN: When a high-threat enemy's HP drops to #1, they become invincible, and a certain amount of enemies will spawn to join the fight. Defeating all the spawned enemies will remove the high-threat enemy's invincibility.

Buff_Content_201.ContentEN: Enemy units take #1 less damage, but each time they take Skill Damage or Weapon Damage, the damage reduction decreases by #2.

Buff_Content_202.ContentEN: Enemy units take #1 less damage, but each time they take CRIT Damage, the damage reduction decreases by #2.

Buff_Content_203.ContentEN: Enemies take #1 less damage. This reduction diminishes by #2 each time they take damage from a ranged weapon.

Buff_Content_211.ContentEN: Enemies regenerate #1 of their Max Shield every 2 seconds. Regeneration pauses while any elemental bonus effect is active.

Buff_Content_30.ContentEN: Every #1 instances of damage dealt by any ally grant 1 stack of #2 ATK Increase, lasting #3 s and stacking up to #4 times.

Buff_Content_301.ContentEN: For every #1 time(s) an allied unit deals Skill Damage or Weapon Damage, they gain 1 stack that increases Attack by #2 for #3s, up to #4 stacks.

Buff_Content_302.ContentEN: Increases Ranged Weapon damage dealt by allied units when they are moving.

Buff_Content_303.ContentEN: When any ally deals Weapon DMG, that hit's CRIT Chance increases by #1 per elemental bonus effect on the target, stacking up to 4 times.

Buff_Content_304.ContentEN: For every #1 Sanity spent by all allies in total, grants #2 Skill Damage Increase for #3s, stacking up to #4 times. At max stacks, grants immunity to Hitstun.

Buff_Content_401.ContentEN: When Primander is on the field, they increase the Attack of enemy units around them by #1 and reduces their Damage Taken by #2.

Buff_Content_402.ContentEN: Enemies take #1 less Melee Weapon DMG.

Buff_Content_511.ContentEN: Allies lose #1 periodic damage and gain #2 Weapon DMG.

Buff_Content_512.ContentEN: Allies lose #1 CRIT Damage. Skill damage has a #2 chance to trigger an elemental bonus effect.

Buff_Title_211.ContentEN: Shield Variation: Gloom of the Undying

CAPTURE_BULLETJUMP_PC.ContentEN: Use Helix Leap (&Slide& + &Jump&) to catch up with the target faster

CAPTURE_BULLETJUMP_PHONE.ContentEN: Use Helix Leap (hold the button + swipe up and right) to catch up with the target faster

CharTrialEvent_Des_Baiheng.ContentEN:
No herb may cure the world's deep-rooted ills,
 but hers is a nature tempered in healer's grove.
 Her form shimmers, a haze amidst herbal warmth,
 each elegant stroke of her prescription a quiet salve to life's impermanence.

CharTrialEvent_Des_Feina.ContentEN:
You met her beneath a sliver of tiny starry sky.
 With fairytales, she rewrote the scars of yesterday.
 Her snow-white quill lofted tender dreams — 
 Unbound, they ride the wind over walls, wastes, and the chill of night.

CharTrialEvent_Des_Saiqi.ContentEN:
On frozen lands, your paths crossed in a foreign city. 
Her smile melted the frost from your weary soul. 
The unexpected encounter stirred her long-slumbering dream
—a daylight vision of blossoms and golden sun.

CharTrialEvent_Des_Songlu.ContentEN: Thump-thump—Behold the lumbering beast with food! Fear not, she won't devour you—and neither shall you lay claim to her. For Truffle shares her bounty with all. Take this jam-slathered bread. Today, like every other day, the little commissary is on a mission to eliminate the world's hunger.

Condition_Toast_HardBossUnlock.ContentEN: Complete the previous difficulty to unlock

Content_110101_1.ContentEN: A voice seems to beckon from beyond...

Content_110101_2.ContentEN: Do not let it ensnare you. Press forward and escape the nightmare.

Content_110102_1.ContentEN: You wake up from the nightmare, facing the razor-sharp fangs of Filthoids.

Content_110102_2.ContentEN: Your squad has been ambushed by fierce Filthoids. Defeat them and reunite with your squad.

Content_110103_1.ContentEN: After neutralising the sudden Filthoid threat, head to the emergency aid station to regroup with your squad.

Content_110103_2.ContentEN:
The battle has taken a heavy toll on your squad. Medic Daphne has asked for your help in comforting the wounded.
Meanwhile, she plans to retrieve medical supplies from the warehouse. For safety reasons, you decide to go in her stead.

Content_110103_3.ContentEN: A sudden surge of Filthoids is approaching from the corridor, but the wounded are in no shape to fight. As the squad leader and the last man standing, you must hold the line and protect your comrades.

Content_110103_3_2.ContentEN: Avar's timely arrival has turned the tide of battle. Seize this moment to defeat the Filthoid leader and bring the fight to an end!

Content_110103_4.ContentEN: Together with Avar, you've successfully repelled the Filthoids. Time to return to the medical post to discuss the next move.

Content_110104_1.ContentEN: Avar instructs Daphne and the wounded to stay at the post and wait for reinforcements. Meanwhile, you and Avar press on into the heart of the Fortress to continue the mission.

Content_110104_2.ContentEN:
Assessing the situation, Avar believes The Forsakens anticipated the Empire's operation plans, putting you at a strategic disadvantage.
To shift the odds, he decides to sabotage the Phoxichor tank in the engine room to disable the Fortress's defences, making it easier for your trapped comrades.

Content_110104_3.ContentEN:
Assessing the situation, Avar believes The Forsakens anticipated the Empire's operation plans, putting you at a strategic disadvantage.
To shift the odds, he decides to sabotage the Phoxichor tank in the engine room to disable the Fortress's defences, making it easier for your trapped comrades.

Content_110105_1.ContentEN:
You encounter two members of Squad Snow Wolves. However, one of them is trapped in the heart of the engine room.
Work with Avar to cut off the power and rescue your trapped comrade.

Content_110105_2.ContentEN: You've successfully reached the Engine Room. Time to cut the power.

Content_110105_3.ContentEN: You've shut down three power sources — but an alarm suddenly blares from the Phoxichor tanks in the engine room...

Content_110105_4.ContentEN: Over the radio, Avar suggests overloading the Phoxichor tanks if standard shutdown fails — destroying them outright.

Content_110106_1.ContentEN:
Though Vic has fallen, you must continue the mission.
Work with Avar to disable the mechanisms in the engine room and stay alert for lurking Filthoids.

Content_110106_2.ContentEN: You've successfully disabled the power source, but in doing so, the self-destruct sequence of the Phoxichor tank has been activated. Escape the engine room before the countdown reaches zero.

Content_110106_3.ContentEN: Though Fulvis, the chief commander, insists on continuing the mission, Avar's judgment proves sound. Instead of a reckless attack that might cost you your lives, you focus on rescuing the Griffins first.

Content_110106_4.ContentEN: You encounter Simon, who is besieged by Filthoids. Take them down.

Content_110106_5.ContentEN: You've found Simon, but he's surrounded by Filthoids, and his condition looks dire.

Content_110107_1.ContentEN:
Though you were too late to save Simon, his final words reveal more comrades trapped near the rail tracks.
Press forward to rescue those you still can.

Content_110107_2.ContentEN: You run into Filthoids along the way. Take them down quickly — don't let them slow you down.

Content_110107_3.ContentEN: A brief call with Daphne gives you a moment of reassurance. Keep moving forward.

Content_110108_1.ContentEN: A brief call with Daphne gives you a moment of reassurance. Keep moving forward.

Content_110108_2.ContentEN: You hear your squadmates calling out, but Filthoids block your path. Defeat them and regroup with your squad.

Content_110108_3.ContentEN: You've dealt with the Filthoids. Time to join your squad.

Content_110108_4.ContentEN: Your team came across two Charons. The young woman explained they were innocent townsfolk enslaved by The Forsakens. Unable to verify their identities, you decided to cautiously move forward in the direction the elder indicated, hoping to reunite with Avar.

Content_110108_6.ContentEN: You encounter two Charon civilians — a young woman and an old man. She claims they were captured by the Forsakens and forced into labour, while he offers a shortcut. With no way to confirm their story, you decide to proceed cautiously in the direction he suggests, hoping to regroup with Avar.

Content_110109_1.ContentEN: Avar plans to blast open the central control room gate using a turret. With the engine room offline, you'll need to restore the simulated battlefield using emergency power to reposition the turret.

Content_110109_2.ContentEN: The turret is moving along the track. Protect it from incoming Filthoids with Avar until it reaches its destination.

Content_110109_2_1.ContentEN: To blast open the central control room gate, you need to reposition the turret. Activate the control mechanism to move it along the track.

Content_110109_3.ContentEN: Avar plans to blast open the central control room gate using a turret. With the engine room offline, you'll need to restore the simulated battlefield using emergency power to reposition the turret.

Content_110110_1.ContentEN: Use the turret to blast open the passage to the central control room.

Content_110110_2.ContentEN: After the bombardment, the side door to the central control room is open. Investigate the area with Avar.

Content_110110_3.ContentEN:
Katya suddenly launched an attack against you, but Avar reacted quickly and thwarted her plan.
Discuss the current situation with Avar.

Content_110110_4.ContentEN:
You stopped to rest. While Avar recuperates, interrogate Katya to discover her motives for trying to assassinate you.
Also, it seems Avar lost a photograph during the fight — perhaps you can help him find it.

Content_110110_5.ContentEN:
Katya isn't willing to tell the truth, obviously trying to provoke you. Her insolence brings back that familiar voice in your mind. You manage to keep your senses.
Now, speak with Avar to plan your next move.

Content_110110_6.ContentEN: Avar initially plans to head to the central control room alone, but the fellow soldiers don't want to leave him to face the danger by himself. After some persuasion, Avar agrees to move forward with the group.

Content_110110_7.ContentEN: On your way to the central control room, you come across a strong Filthoid known as the Battle Maven. Trusting in Avar, your mentor and comrade, you're confident that together, you'll defeat this formidable foe.

Content_110110_8.ContentEN: You've defeated the formidable Filthoid. Keep moving forward.

Content_110111_1.ContentEN:
Upon reaching the central control room, you find it unexpectedly empty — no sign of the enemy or traps.
Investigate the surroundings and search for clues.

Content_110111_2.ContentEN: Avar suddenly aims his gun at you.

Content_110111_3.ContentEN: After coming to, you realise you're still alive. Survey your surroundings and assess your current situation.

Content_110111_4.ContentEN:
Avar shows no signs of life.
Through the broadcast, you hear that the Legion has issued a warrant for Daphne, accusing her of espionage — a charge you know to be false. You must escape the central control room and find her as quickly as possible.

Content_110111_5.ContentEN: You find Daphne, though for some reason, she's aiming a gun at you.

Content_110111_6.ContentEN:
You've found Daphne. Despite her panic, she does her best to stay calm and fulfil her duties as a medic.
The Fortress is no longer safe. Escape with her through the sewers.

Content_110112_1.ContentEN: The sewer's complex layout demands careful navigation. Proceed cautiously and find an escape route.

Content_110112_2.ContentEN: The enemy is trying to flood the sewers to prevent your escape. Activate the drainage system and continue your search for an exit.

Content_110113_1.ContentEN:
You and Daphne, hoping for a chance at survival, managed to find Chief Sibylle within Lonza Fortress. Soon after, you are taken to the Imperial Military Prison for interrogation as suspects of espionage.
To protect yourself and Daphne, and to honour Avar's sacrifice for justice, you must prove the truth to the Warden.

Content_110113_2.ContentEN:
The Warden administers a hypnotic drug to you. After a moment of dizziness, you find yourself in a bizarre space resembling Lonza Fortress.
It seems you're about to endure a special "interrogation."

Content_110113_3.ContentEN: Endure the Warden's fiery trial to prove your innocence.

Content_110113_4.ContentEN:
You explain to the Warden what truly happened in the central control room — Avar faked his betrayal to secure vital evidence, sacrificing his life to leave behind a recording. Unfortunately, Fulvis's adjutant, Falsi, took the recording.
After hearing your testimony, the Warden agrees to further investigate the case.

Content_120001_1.ContentEN:
With the Charon Hunt case closed, peace has returned. The only thing left is to await word of the "high-value prisoner" in twenty days' time.
Why not use the lull to stop by The Asphodel and check for any new commissions?

Content_120001_2.ContentEN:
The opera ticket from Camilla brings back memories of the Charon Hunt — and Children From the Snowfield, the play tied to that tragic case.
Now that it's being restaged, perhaps it's worth seeing for yourself.

Content_120001_3.ContentEN: The crowd outside the theatre is buzzing with excitement. Might be worth lingering a moment to hear what everyone's talking about.

Content_120001_4.ContentEN: The show's about to begin. Best head to the main entrance — missing the overture would be a shame.

Content_120002_1.ContentEN:
A frustrated scalper brushes past you after failing to sell a ticket.
No need to dwell on it — just get to the theatre entrance.

Content_120002_2.ContentEN:
Thanks to a well-timed intervention from a foreign woman named Zhiliu, you not only gain entry — you're ushered into a first-class box, a seat most can only dream of.
Might be a good time to thank your unexpected benefactor.

Content_120002_3.ContentEN: The performance is about to begin. Take your seat — and let the anticipation build.

Content_120002_4.ContentEN:
Though the opera's spell still lingers in your thoughts, the rising lights signal its end.
Time to follow the crowd and head out.

Content_120002_5.ContentEN:
Just as you're leaving, a stranger blocks your path. Zhiliu's tardy business associate has finally shown up — and he doesn't look friendly.
Stay alert.

Content_120002_6.ContentEN:
Zhiliu handles the black-market dealer, who tried to rip her off, without breaking a sweat.
Now, bring her the Phoxichor so she can verify its authenticity.

Content_120002_7.ContentEN:
As expected, the Phoxichor turns out to be a fake. But you can't shake the image of that strange wisp of smoke reacting to your presence...
Still, for now, it's time to head out.

Content_120002_8.ContentEN:
You're about to part ways with Zhiliu outside the theatre — only to learn she's heading to The Asphodel too.
Since you're both going, you might as well guide her there.

Content_120002_9.ContentEN: What a day. Report back to Camilla — you may have more to share than expected.

Content_120003_1.ContentEN:
A new day begins.
As usual, head to The Asphodel and see what's stirring.

Content_120003_2.ContentEN:
A strange message shatters the calm — is it a secret missive from Berry, or a well-laid trap?
Not wanting to drag Snow into this, you excuse yourself and quietly slip away.
Return to the Sanctuary and wait for nightfall.

Content_120003_3.ContentEN:
Whether it's truly from Berry or not, you need to find out.
Once night descends, head to the red phone booth as instructed in the message.

Content_120003_4.ContentEN:
Snow's already waiting outside the Sanctuary — clearly, she's seen through your plan.
Resolved to face what lies ahead together, you and Snow set off once more.

Content_120003_5.ContentEN:
Could that white-haired figure really be Berry?
The girl you've been searching for may be just steps away — approach with caution.

Content_120003_6.ContentEN:
Just as you suspected — the figure at the booth was a trap set by the Legion. Good thing you came prepared. 
Talk to Snow and decide your next move.

Content_120003_7.ContentEN:
You've avoided the worst — but the Legion is now on high alert.
Move quickly and slip away before the patrols catch on.

Content_120003_8.ContentEN:
Zhiliu shows up just in time to get you out of a tight spot.
Hop in her car — there's no time to lose.

Content_120003_9.ContentEN:
This is your final hurdle tonight.
Get past the gate guards without raising suspicion — and make it out of Icelake.

Content_120101_13.ContentEN:
Midway through your journey, the ground trembles without warning.
 An Enforcer you briefly met at the docks turns hostile, its form an uncanny hue — unlike any Bi'an you've seen.
 No time to think. Prepare for battle.

Content_120101_3.ContentEN: Head to the Market by the Pier

Content_120101_8.ContentEN: Head to the Celestial Notice Post

Content_120102_1.ContentEN:
After parting ways with Lunocarp, your path leads just beyond the steps of EverSpring.
 Meet with Zhiliu to learn more about the commission ahead.

Content_120102_10.ContentEN:
Likely from sheer exhaustion, Yuming falls asleep mid-conversation.
 Find somewhere safe and help him rest.

Content_120102_11.ContentEN: This detour ends here. Follow the path out of Tidesong Cavern and continue on your way.

Content_120102_14.ContentEN:
You arrive to find the Magistrate of Yingtian barely holding his ground against a pack of Sable Bi'an.
 Join the fray and turn the tide.

Content_120102_2.ContentEN:
You arrive just in time to see Zhiliu settle a dispute among the Starweavers with calm authority. From their conversation, the urgency of the Scourge of Zhuyin is clear. 
 Discuss the commission details with her.

Content_120102_3.ContentEN:
Zhiliu has tasked you with retrieving three Zhuyin Scales from the Gritblight Expanse — a step toward containing the Scourge of Zhuyin.
 For a true Phoxhunter, duty is its own reward — though a generous payment never hurts.

Content_120102_4.ContentEN: As instructed by Zhiliu, your path leads through the Tidesong Cavern en route to the Black Market, where a specially crafted tool essential to harvesting the Zhuyin Scales awaits.

Content_120102_5.ContentEN:
As instructed by Zhiliu, your path leads through the Tidesong Cavern toward the Black Market, where a specially crafted tool essential to harvesting the Zhuyin Scales awaits.
 The faint echo of water in this shadowed place stirs a thought — why do so many quests begin in caves?
 But idle musings must wait. This cavern too is overrun with Sable Bi'an. Fight your way through.

Content_120102_6.ContentEN: The Magistrate of Yingtian arrives just in time, driving off an assault by Sable Bi'an. Once the misunderstanding is cleared, he offers to escort you safely out of the cavern.

Content_120102_7.ContentEN:
After escorting you to the cavern's exit, the Magistrate departs alone.
 Your path lies ahead, but ominous sounds behind you set you on edge.
 You may have only just met — but he did help you. Go check if he's alright.

Content_120102_8.ContentEN:
You arrive to find the Magistrate of Yingtian barely holding his ground against a pack of Sable Bi'an.
 Join the fray and turn the tide.

Content_120102_9.ContentEN:
After a hard-fought battle, the last of the Sable Bi'an lurking in the cavern are finally laid to rest.
 The Magistrate of Yingtian appears badly wounded. Go check on him.

Content_120103_1.ContentEN: As Zhiliu instructed, first-time visitors must emerge via the coastal cavern, wearing a specific pendant and giving the passphrase.

Content_120103_10.ContentEN:
While harvesting the scales, a faint voice reaches you. A vision of EverSpring under attack flashes through your mind — an unshakable premonition of what's to come.
 Hurry back and check on things.

Content_120103_11_1.ContentEN:
Your fears proved true. Thankfully, EverSpring's staff have risen as one, weapons in hand to defend their home.
 The situation is stable for now. Find Zhiliu and offer your aid.

Content_120103_11_2.ContentEN: Your fears proved true. Join the EverSpring staff and drive back the Sable Bi'an.

Content_120103_11_3.ContentEN:
You witness Zhiliu coolly dismiss a protesting middle-aged man — a move meant to steady the ranks.
 She sends you to reinforce the forecourt of the Argent Loong Temple. Hold fast a little longer, and the Incense Warden will be able to turn the tide.

Content_120103_12.ContentEN:
With the ritual complete, Taihao — a resplendent Loong — descends to sweep away the evil.
 The crisis is over. Return and report to Zhiliu.

Content_120103_13.ContentEN:
You hand the Zhuyin Scales to Zhiliu.
 But at the mention of that earlier warning voice, she turns distant — or so it seems.
 There's nothing more for now. Leave EverSpring.

Content_120103_2.ContentEN:
As Zhiliu instructed, first-time visitors must emerge via the coastal cavern, wearing a specific pendant and giving the passphrase.
 A black marketeer waits just ahead. Make contact.

Content_120103_3.ContentEN:
Somehow, you've lost the pendant. Without it, the rendezvous falls through.
 Just as you're left stumped, a commotion breaks out nearby. May as well see what's going on.

Content_120103_4.ContentEN:
You learn the black marketeer exploited a loophole in the Nine Chapters of Dafeng to swindle a young woman out of her family's money — then set a Bi'an on her as "punishment." Thanks to your timely intervention, the worst was averted.
 Now, check on the wounded girl.

Content_120103_5.ContentEN: As tensions reach their peak, a stranger steps in and calls a halt. He hails you as an honoured guest and says his boss, Mr Qiu, wishes to speak with you.

Content_120103_5_1.ContentEN:
Your exchange with the black-market boss was far from pleasant.
 Still, he handed over the tools for harvesting Zhuyin Scales. You've no wish to linger — leave this place at once.

Content_120103_6.ContentEN: Worried for the injured girl, you return to check on her — and see whether the black marketeer kept his word.

Content_120103_7.ContentEN:
A white-haired woman appears, tending the girl's wounds with arcane arts — and easing your weariness as well.
 Who is this mysterious healer? Speak with her.

Content_120103_8.ContentEN:
With a visit to the Hall of Ephemerality agreed upon, you part ways with Fushu for now.
 Turn your attention to the task at hand: head to the entrance of the Gritblight Expanse to meet Master Gongshang and learn to use the harvesting tool.

Content_120103_9.ContentEN:
After clearing up a comical mix-up — Master Gongshang mistook you for apprentice hopefuls — you've learned to operate the Mechanical Nexus to neutralise the Gritblight, earning the title of honorary learners of the Jishu Sect.
 Head into the heights of the Gritblight Expanse and harvest three Zhuyin Scales for Zhiliu.

Content_120104_1.ContentEN:
Fushu has sent word through Zhiliu — the young woman you rescued at the black market has taken a turn for the worse.
 Head to the Hall of Ephemerality and check on her.

Content_120104_10.ContentEN: The playful young Wishen refuses to leave — not until you solve its riddle.

Content_120104_11.ContentEN: The young Wishen has had its fun. Time to escort it back.

Content_120104_12.ContentEN:
With help from the three young Wishen, you've arrived at the true Spring of Yu — a place where this world and the next converge.
 Ask the Elder Wishen where to find the herb Wangyou.

Content_120104_13.ContentEN:
The herb grows near a waterfall on the far side of the mountain.
 The Gritblight has spread there as well — and some Wishen have gone missing. The Elder asks you to look into it.

Content_120104_14.ContentEN: You've found the herb needed to heal the young woman. Collect it.

Content_120104_15.ContentEN: While gathering the herb, Snow calls you over — what has she found?

Content_120104_17.ContentEN:
With Fushu's help, you've escaped Oblivion Rift — a lightless realm where only old memory lingers.
 Snow was waiting, worried sick. Go comfort her.

Content_120104_2.ContentEN:
Following the mountain path, you find the Hall of Ephemerality nestled in an apricot grove.
 It's quiet and deserted — your calls go unanswered. Is Fushu really here? You and Snow decide to step inside and take a look.

Content_120104_20.ContentEN:
Drawn by a cry for help, you've fallen into the Oblivion Rift — a lightless realm where everything fades into oblivion.
 Find your way out before you forget those you hold dear.

Content_120104_3.ContentEN:
Following the mountain path, you find the Hall of Ephemerality nestled in an apricot grove.
 It's quiet and deserted — your calls go unanswered. Is Fushu really here? Look around.

Content_120104_4.ContentEN:
The young woman still hasn't stirred since the Bi'an attack. Fushu stayed by her side all night and has dozed off at her sickbed.
 After discussing a remedy, you agree to journey to the Spring of Yu — a mystical realm — to seek a rare herb called Wangyou to heal her wounds.

Content_120104_5.ContentEN: The Spring of Yu has also been plagued by the Gritblight. Use the method Master Gongshang taught you to cleanse the area.

Content_120104_6.ContentEN: You've rescued a young Wishen trapped in the Gritblight. Guide it safely back to the altar.

Content_120104_7.ContentEN: The other two Wishen meant to remain at the altar have gone missing due to the Gritblight. Go find them.

Content_120104_8.ContentEN: Inside the cave, you find a timid young Wishen. Filthoids block the way. Clear the path and guide it back to the altar.

Content_120104_9.ContentEN: Two young Wishen have safely returned to the altar. Time to find the last one.

Content_120105_1.ContentEN:
Outside EverSpring, one of Mr Qiu's men intercepts you with an invitation — to join a so-called "hunting expedition."
 The mercurial black market boss clearly has his own agenda, but the promised reward is hard to turn down.
 Head to The Hidden Loong and hear him out.

Content_120105_14.ContentEN:
The prey's agitation sets off the ancient Myriad-Snare Hunting Array — a spectacular construct erupting from beneath the ground. You and your allies struggle through the trap, finally emerging into the open expanse of Crowsong Hollow.
 To your surprise, the "prey" is actually Yuming, whom you once briefly met. Mr Qiu has deceived you again.
 When you refuse to play along, he invokes the Nine Chapters of Dafeng, forcing Yuming to attack you.
 Defend yourself. Hold your ground.

Content_120105_15.ContentEN:
Mid-battle, Yuming restrains himself — but defying the Nine Chapters worsens his injuries.
 Just then, an unexpected figure arrives: Kezhou, the Drifter you encountered in the Hunting Array, calling out to his shixiong — Yuming. Avoiding what he cannot face, Yuming seizes an opening and retreats.
 The fight is over, but Mr Qiu's deceit won't go unchallenged. Confront them.

Content_120105_16.ContentEN:
Mr Qiu departs, leaving behind a cryptic parting remark.
 Kezhou stands in silence, unusually dispirited. Go talk to him.

Content_120105_2.ContentEN: "Timing is everything," says Mr Qiu, urging you to move out. He'll explain the quest en route to Crowsong Hollow.

Content_120105_3.ContentEN:
Mr Qiu claims you're here to capture a Bi'an as a trophy for his collection.
 It's been driven deep into Crowsong Hollow — but remnants of ancient war-tech may complicate the plan.
 Stay sharp as you head in.

Content_120106_1.ContentEN:
It's been a while since you delivered the Zhuyin Scales. You wonder how Zhiliu is faring with the preparations.
 Head back to EverSpring and see if there's anything you can do to help.

Content_120106_2.ContentEN:
Ominous tremors roll from the direction of the altar. According to Wangchun, Zhiliu has begun the sealing ritual.
 You decide to go to her aid — in times like these, every bit of help counts.

Content_120106_3.ContentEN:
You arrive just in time to find Zhuyin barely contained.
 One segment of the seal falters, and Zhiliu cannot leave her post. You volunteer to inspect and stabilise it.

Content_120106_6.ContentEN:
As you approach, a faint, mournful cry rises from deep within Zhuyin.
 The seal fails — Zhuyin breaks free. In the split second before disaster, you press Zhiliu's coin to their brow, drawing on the last vestiges of sealing power to bring them crashing down. For a heartbeat, fragments of their memories flood your mind.
 No time to dwell — the real battle begins now.

Content_120106_7.ContentEN:
Zhiliu turns on you without warning, binding you in place — the sealing was a ruse. She came to absorb Zhuyin's power, and your unexpected presence nearly spoiled her plan.
 Fushu and Kezhou arrive moments too late. With her goal achieved, Zhiliu withdraws, leaving you amid the wreckage.
 Confer with them on what comes next.

Content_120106_8.ContentEN:
You came to Huaxu by chance — never expecting to be swept into a vast conspiracy.
 No quick answers await. For now, it's best to leave the altar behind and move on.

Content_120111_0.ContentEN: Go to Fina's home to begin the story.

Content_120111_1.ContentEN: The Great Magician has cast the strongest protection spell he knows. Now, be brave — step outside and set off into the wide, wide world.

Content_120111_1_1.ContentEN: A new day dawns. Leaf through yesterday's unfinished story, and imagine the next page.

Content_120111_2.ContentEN: A group of children are playing in a corner of Mist Aken. Go say hello.

Content_120111_3.ContentEN: The game has begun — find the hidden Roasted Potatoes!

Content_120111_4.ContentEN: The game has begun — find the hidden Roasted Potatoes!

Content_120111_5.ContentEN: A new round begins — do your best to find all the Roasted Potatoes this time.

Content_120111_6.ContentEN: Open your spellbook and complete "Farewell to the Cavern of Yesterday" to learn to summon the Great Magician.

Content_120111_7.ContentEN: The Great Magician seems to have found where a Roasted Potato is hiding — follow and see for yourself.

Content_120111_8.ContentEN: The Great Magician seems to have found where a Roasted Potato is hiding — follow and see for yourself.

Content_120111_9.ContentEN: The protection spell only lasts through daylight — get home before nightfall, and rest easy.

Content_120112_0.ContentEN: Go to Fina's home to continue the story.

Content_120112_1.ContentEN: A new day dawns. Step outside and set off on a new adventure.

Content_120112_2.ContentEN: Yesterday, you explored Mist Aken. Today, a brand-new realm awaits discovery.

Content_120112_3.ContentEN: Little Sidekick of the Reticent Detective — move out! Bin No. 7 needs a thorough investigation!

Content_120112_3_1.ContentEN: No clues this time — but a true Little Sidekick always reports back. Return to the Reticent Detective.

Content_120112_3_2.ContentEN: Buoyed by the Reticent Detective's words, you decide to search Big Bin No. 9 for clues!

Content_120112_4.ContentEN: Open your spellbook and complete "Through the Labyrinth of Memory" to learn to summon {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn.

Content_120112_5.ContentEN: {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn seems to know where the clue is hidden — follow and see for yourself.

Content_120112_5_1.ContentEN: Guided by {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn, you arrive at the spot. Look closely — the clue may be nearby.

Content_120112_5_2.ContentEN: You've found a vital clue — hand it to the Reticent Detective for inspection.

Content_120112_6.ContentEN: Today's adventure is complete. Hurry home before nightfall and get some rest.

Content_120112_6_2.ContentEN: {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn has spotted something curious — best follow and find out.

Content_120112_7.ContentEN: Led by {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn, you encountered the real {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn — what a marvellous day. Hurry home and write down today's adventure.

Content_120113_0.ContentEN: Go to Fina's home to continue the story.

Content_120113_1.ContentEN: A new day dawns. Step outside and set off on a new adventure.

Content_120113_2.ContentEN: You met the Reticent Detective in the square yesterday — who might you run into today? Head over and find out.

Content_120113_3.ContentEN: Together with {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn, search the square for the young noblewoman you just met.

Content_120113_4.ContentEN: You've arranged to meet Cassandra. To carry out her commission, hurry home and practise your magic!

Content_120113_5.ContentEN: Open your spellbook and complete "Across the Thorned Vale" to learn to summon Miss Butterfly.

Content_120114_0.ContentEN: Go to Fina's home to continue the story.

Content_120114_1.ContentEN: The day to meet Cassandra has arrived. Find {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn first, and go together.

Content_120114_10_1.ContentEN: The Little Nightingale has found her courage — at last, she spreads her wings.

Content_120114_10_2.ContentEN: The adventure ends in triumph. Now, head back with your friends.

Content_120114_10_3.ContentEN: The adventure ends in triumph. Now, head back with your friends.

Content_120114_10_4.ContentEN: Cassandra has arrived with soldiers from the Security Bureau. It's safe now — go speak with her.

Content_120114_11.ContentEN: You've planned a tea party for tonight — head home and get everything ready.

Content_120114_12.ContentEN: Someone's knocking... go and see who's there.

Content_120114_13.ContentEN: Open your spellbook and complete "Onto the Blooming Fields" to learn to summon the Little Nightingale.

Content_120114_2.ContentEN: The day to meet Cassandra has arrived. Find {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn first, and go together.

Content_120114_3.ContentEN: Head to the rendezvous with {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn to meet Cassandra.

Content_120114_3_1.ContentEN: You've run through the "ruse" with Cassandra. Now wait here while she grabs her friend.

Content_120114_4.ContentEN: You didn't expect Cassandra's friend to be him... Head home and avoid them.

Content_120114_5.ContentEN: The children say Mark might know where Savio is — go and ask him.

Content_120114_5_1.ContentEN: Mark saw Savio head beyond the city — hurry and catch up.

Content_120114_6.ContentEN: Mark saw Savio head beyond the city — hurry and catch up.

Content_120114_7.ContentEN: All signs point to bandits near Lamenting Lake. Go there with {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn.

Content_120114_8.ContentEN: The bandits have taken Savio — find a way to get him out safely.

Content_120114_9.ContentEN: Take down the bandits and free Savio.

Content_120114_9_1.ContentEN: The noise has drawn Filthoids — finish them off too.

Content_200101_1.ContentEN: There's a familiar figure reminiscent of Snow outside Sanctuary.

Content_200101_2.ContentEN: Someone greeted you from behind. Check out who it is.

Content_200101_3.ContentEN:
The one who just stopped you introduced herself as a blacksmith of the Lunarians.
According to Snow, she's an elder, though all Lunarians, irrespective of age, share a similar appearance and stature.
In exchange for her forging expertise, Lunosmith hopes to join you on your journey.
Take her back to Sanctuary.

Content_200101_4.ContentEN:
Lunosmith prides herself on her forging skills.
Time to put her talents to the test.

Content_200102_1.ContentEN: Go to Hypnos' House to check on Psyche as you promised.

Content_200102_2.ContentEN:
The flowers Psyche has tenderly cared for are wilting, seemingly starved of nutrients.
To revive them, special soil from a cave outside Icelake is needed — a simple task for a Phoxhunter.

Content_200102_3.ContentEN:
According to Psyche, this special soil can be found in a cave near Lamenting Lake.
Go collect the right kind of soil for her.

Content_200102_4.ContentEN: The soil at the entrance of the cave is too dry for cultivating flowers. Venture deeper to find suitable soil.

Content_200102_5.ContentEN:
It's been a challenge, but you've finally found soft, suitable soil deep in the cave.
Bring the soil back to Hypnos' House. Psyche is sure to be overjoyed.

Content_200103_1.ContentEN:
Snow's in a fuss again over something at the Sanctuary.
It's likely nothing — but you'd best humour her and see what's going on.

Content_200103_2.ContentEN: Rumour has it there's a giant pig roaming near Icelake. Could it be true? How big could it be? Best see for yourself...

Content_200103_3.ContentEN:
So much for animal lovers — turns out they're wretched poachers. Good thing the pig showed up.
Fight side by side with your new ally and teach them a lesson!

Content_200103_4.ContentEN:
With the poachers dealt with, you finally had time to take a closer look at the pig.
Wait... did it just talk? Or was it someone else?

Content_200103_5.ContentEN: The Geniemons system is now unlocked. Obtain a Geniemon to assist you on your journey ahead.

Content_200104_1.ContentEN:
Word of a giant pig's reached The Asphodel too... Could Truffle still be around?
Better ask Camilla what's going on.

Content_200104_3.ContentEN:
Turns out Truffle's still lingering near the outskirts of Icelake. Could those Geniemon poachers have returned?
Better find her. She might need some help.

Content_200104_4.ContentEN:
So it was those wretched poachers, still trying to harm the Geniemons.
They'll have to pay for this — but first, you need to track them down...

Content_200104_5.ContentEN:
Back to the sewers again... Why do all the baddies love hiding in muck?
Better hurry and find the Geniemons before they get too used to the stink.

Content_200104_6.ContentEN:
The stench is throwing off Filbert's nose... but a smart-looking Geniemon showed up, as if leading the way.
Follow the Geniemon.

Content_200104_7.ContentEN:
Found the Geniemon poachers deep in the sewers. They seem to be reminiscing about the past and dreaming of the future.
Time to beat some sense into them — whatever their backstory is.

Content_200104_8.ContentEN:
You've made lots of new Geniemon friends — which is lovely, but looking after this many might be a challenge.
Better ask Camilla. If anyone can help, it's Camilla. Probably. Hopefully.

Content_200201_1.ContentEN:
Sally is a warm-hearted elderly woman living by the side gate of Icelake. You can always smell the inviting scent of cream of mushroom soup near her.
However, she's seemed rather preoccupied lately. Perhaps it's a good time for a comforting chat.

Content_200201_2.ContentEN: Ms Sally seems to be worrying about a lady she cares for. If you encounter this lady, you can perhaps help her out.

Content_200201_3.ContentEN: Lady Hilin has spent years waiting for a Charon man named Hamel Dickinson. She looks very distressed. Help Lady Hilin find some clues about Hamel Dickinson.

Content_200201_4.ContentEN: Venture into the depths of the pit to find clues regarding Hamel Dickinson's whereabouts.

Content_200201_5.ContentEN:
In the pit's depths, you discovered an old journal with Hamel Dickinson's name on the title page.
It seems to chronicle events related to him. Return to Icelake and deliver it to Lady Hilin.

Content_200201_6.ContentEN:
After reading the journal, Lady Hilin asked for some time alone.
 Speak to her maid, Sally, to collect your reward — and hear the rest of the story.

Content_200201_7.ContentEN:
You kept the journal a secret — perhaps that's for the best.
 Find Lady Hilin's maid, Sally, to claim your reward and learn the story of Lady Hilin and Hamel Dickinson.

Content_200202_1.ContentEN: A man near the city gates is yelling, who seems to be selling something.

Content_200202_2.ContentEN: Claiming to be the King of Scavengers in Icelake, Martin gave you some lost items, and he wants you to find their owners.

Content_200202_3.ContentEN:
Paper stars made with expired train tickets... Maybe the ticket seller is the owner.
However, she looks quite... "polite".

Content_200203_1.ContentEN: The lady, with a hoarse voice and dirty dressy clothes, stopped passers-by over and over again, as if she were trying to find something...

Content_200203_12.ContentEN: Since you left that sorrowful woman behind, someone's been watching you. Seems like he's got something to say.

Content_200203_13.ContentEN: Ask around — someone else might know something.

Content_200203_14.ContentEN: There may be others who know more — try asking around about the doctor's whereabouts.

Content_200203_2.ContentEN:
Ms Elsa's only daughter, Annie, went missing.
Keep an eye out for anyone who might be Annie when you're in Icelake.

Content_200203_3.ContentEN:
Beyond the city walls, a pack of Filthoids has cornered a woman.
Fight them off and get her to safety.

Content_200203_3_2.ContentEN:
The Filthoids lie defeated. The woman you saved now stands before you, as if she has something to say.
Speak with her.

Content_200203_3_3.ContentEN:
Beyond the city walls, a pack of Filthoids has cornered a woman.
 Fight them off and get her to safety.

Content_200203_4.ContentEN:
...Annie has tragically passed away, while the other girl, Alice, who ended up with Annie's clothes, has survived. 
Although Alice made it through the ordeal in the snowy mountains, the severe fevers she suffered afterwards took away her memories.
Now that the truth is revealed, the next thing to do is explain everything to everyone.

Content_200203_5.ContentEN:
Alice remembered everything.
Now we should go tell Ms Elsa about Anne's death...

Content_200203_6.ContentEN:
We've chosen to keep Annie's death a secret.
 Now, bring "Annie" to Lady Elsa so they can be reunited.

Content_200204_1.ContentEN: You have received an invitation from Wells. He wants you to meet him at the The Asphodel.

Content_200204_2.ContentEN: Wells thinks you're capable, and he wants to complete a commission with you.

Content_200204_3.ContentEN:
You agreed to work with Wells on the commission.
Get ready and go with him.

Content_200204_4.ContentEN:
Wells seems to be in trouble...
Do something to get him out of his father-in-law's wrath.

Content_200204_5.ContentEN:
Resignation has long been a quiet undercurrent in Wells' life. Now, all he asks is to share a few drinks with you.
You recognise that smile — too tired to be real — but what more can you do? Open a few kegs, raise a glass, and drink with him. Maybe the bitterness will fade, if only for a while.

Content_200205_1.ContentEN: Outside the tavern, an old man named Brunetto is peddling clues to hidden treasure on a southern island. But fortunes sold for mere silver are rarely genuine. Speak with him — and see if you can bring a little truth to light.

Content_200205_10.ContentEN: You've recovered Brunetto's book and caught a fish native to Purgatorio Island. That should help ease his homesickness for a while. When you're back in Icelake, remember to bring them to him.

Content_200205_2.ContentEN:
Through your conversation, you learn that Brunetto — like you — once came from Purgatorio Island. He left as a young man, chasing tales of the wider world, never expecting that a single boat ride to the Empire would cost him his way home. In the years since, he has survived by trading in stories and false hopes.
When you tell him what became of Purgatorio Island, something stirs deep within him. If you have the chance, go back for him. Find the home he left behind — and bring back something that might ease this ache of nostalgia.

Content_200205_3.ContentEN:
You return to Purgatorio Island. It's as though time has stopped — the village remains just as the Filthoids left it, the ruins still bearing their mark.
Brunetto once lived in a shack at the far eastern edge. Go take a look — perhaps something of his still remains.

Content_200205_4.ContentEN:
Inside Brunetto's old home, you find a well-preserved chest — whatever lies inside must have meant a great deal to him. The key, however, is nowhere in sight.
Search the surrounding area — if fortune favours you, it may yet turn up.

Content_200205_5.ContentEN:
After a careful search, you spot a small key tucked into the corner of a crumbling wall — its shape a perfect match for Brunetto's chest.
Use it to open the chest and retrieve what lies within.

Content_200205_6.ContentEN:
You return to Icelake and once again find Brunetto outside the tavern, handing out flyers for the Icelake Fisheries. It seems he's finally found an honest way to make a living.
Give him what you brought back from Purgatorio Island — he may have something to say.

Content_200205_7.ContentEN: You managed to unlock Brunetto's chest — only to find a single book inside. As you reach for it, the noise from the lock seems to have attracted something. Filthoids are closing in. Get ready to fight.

Content_200205_8.ContentEN:
The place, the scuffle — it all feels familiar. Years ago, you and Brunetto's grandson got into a heated argument here, which turned into a fight. You remember making up in the end, but the details are hazy.
Head up to the rooftop where you used to sit. Maybe it'll help jog your memory.

Content_200205_9.ContentEN: As you sit on the rooftop, another fragment of your life on Purgatorio Island surfaces — three loaves of bread, a hiccupping boy, a mended friendship. Turns out, you and Brunetto go further back than you thought. To honour this odd little connection, catch him a fish native to Purgatorio Island.

Content_20020605_3.ContentEN:
Near Buck's house, you spot an empty milk jug tainted with alcohol, some popcorn half-buried in the snow, and a trail of small footprints.
Since Buck never drinks, these clues should help narrow down the suspect list.

Content_20020606_5.ContentEN: Near the Galea Theatre, you notice three suspicious figures: a drunkard, a curious girl, and a boy selling snacks in the street. Each seems loosely tied to either alcohol or popcorn. Based on the clues you've gathered, deduce who the most likely culprit is.

Content_200206_1.ContentEN: As usual, head to The Asphodel to see if there are new commissions to take on. FYI, the tavern seems unusually "lively" today.

Content_200206_2.ContentEN:
A spirited customer is standing on a table at The Asphodel, spouting incomprehensible words — but interestingly, he doesn't smell of alcohol.
Have a chat with Camilla and learn more about this customer.

Content_200206_3.ContentEN:
As a playwright, Mr Buck is never stingy with his rhetorical flourishes, showcasing his literary prowess as a professional playwright.
Right now, though, it seems Mr Buck is in dire need of a translator rather than applause. Try to make sense of his elaborate dictions.

Content_200206_4.ContentEN:
It turns out Mr Buck is troubled by a nighttime intruder — and just like that, a new commission falls into your lap.
Head to the area near his house and see what you can find.

Content_200206_5.ContentEN: If someone really did break into Mr Buck's home, they must have left something behind. Go take a look — there might be clues worth uncovering.

Content_200206_6.ContentEN:
After speaking with his neighbour, you learn that local children avoid Mr Buck's house — and they're not allowed inside the tavern either. That leaves only one other place where the intruder might have crossed paths with him: the Galea Theatre.
Head there and keep an eye out for any kid matching the Inspiration Stealer's profile.

Content_200206_7.ContentEN:
You've ruled out the drunkard and the girl — leaving only Arnaud, the boy selling beer and popcorn by the theatre.
Talk to him. A few careful questions should be enough to confirm whether he's the one you're looking for.

Content_200206_8.ContentEN:
You've learned why Arnaud sneaked into Mr Buck's home at midnight, but only Mr Buck has the right to decide what to do about it.
Return to The Asphodel with Arnaud and your findings.

Content_200206_9.ContentEN:
Your deduction suggests that a child broke into Buck's home and somehow managed to get him drunk — but their identity remains unclear.
Speak with Buck's neighbour to learn more about the people he's been in contact with.

Content_200207_1.ContentEN:
A remembrance ceremony is underway at the monument in Silverpeace Square, with a school group gathered for the occasion. A student honoured for her good grades will present flowers once the speeches conclude.
Head over and take a look.

Content_200207_2.ContentEN: Emma, the student presenting flowers, seems preoccupied. While she's alone and lost in thought, it might be a good time to ask what's on her mind.

Content_200207_3.ContentEN: Emma recently befriended an elderly Charon woman from the slums. Because of today's event, Emma had to cancel their meeting — and has asked you to deliver a handmade doll on her behalf.

Content_200207_4.ContentEN:
In Mist Aken, you find the elderly woman Emma spoke of — Belinda, a psychic who soothes the hearts of fellow Charons with her words.
Hand over Emma's gift to her.

Content_200207_5.ContentEN:
Belinda noted that you've recently lost someone dear and hinted at an eventual reunion.
She wishes to craft a gift for you — but she'll need an iron item imbued with your presence. Search Glevum Pit to find a suitable piece.

Content_200207_6.ContentEN: You've recovered the iron object carrying your presence from Lulu Lunoloot. Head back to Icelake and bring it to Belinda. Let's see what kind of gift she has prepared for you.

Content_200207_7.ContentEN:
Just as you retrieved the item Belinda asked for in Glevum Pit, Lulu Lunoloot leapt out of nowhere and snatched it right out from under your nose. You still don't know why a psychic would want a piece of iron bearing your presence... but that doesn't mean you're going to let her walk off with it.
Go after Lulu Lunoloot — and give her a lesson she won't forget.

Content_200208_1.ContentEN:
Margie gave you a key with a design that stirs old memories. If you're right, you once saw a matching lock at Henrik's place. What story might be waiting behind that lock?
Head to Hypnos' House and find out.

Content_200208_2.ContentEN:
A woman you don't recognise is tidying Hypnos' House with practised ease. Whoever she is, anyone still here must have ties to Henrik — or to the children he once sheltered.
Speak with her and see if your hunch is right.

Content_200208_3.ContentEN:
You've learned that Lina once worked as a housekeeper at Hypnos' House. The key from Margie may just unlock the box where Henrik kept his most important files.
Find it — and uncover the truth behind Hypnos' House.

Content_200208_4.ContentEN:
Beside the chest Henrik left behind, you spot an ornate wooden box — one that clearly wasn't there before. It stands out far too much, almost as if someone wanted to make sure it would be noticed — and that's not like Henrik at all. But if he wasn't the one who left it here... then who did?
There's only one way to find out. Open it — and see what's inside.

Content_200209_1.ContentEN: At Silverpeace Square, you spot Luna, a local physician, lingering by the roadside, visibly troubled. It might be worth checking if she needs a hand.

Content_200209_2.ContentEN: Dr Luna, clutching a stack of prescriptions, catches your eye. She might be connected to one of the items you received from Margie. Go and speak with her.

Content_200209_3.ContentEN: Something occurs to you. Perhaps if you offer some help to this troubled physician — who so clearly longs to be heard — it might make all the difference.

Content_200209_4.ContentEN: Something occurs to you. Perhaps if you offer some help to this troubled physician — who so clearly longs to be heard — it might make all the difference.

Content_200209_5.ContentEN: There may be useful information hidden inside — or perhaps even the very remedy she needs.

Content_200209_6.ContentEN: Now that you've found the remedy, it's time to return to Luna and share your findings. You're not quite sure what will come of it, though...

Content_200209_7.ContentEN: Drive off the thugs who are harassing her

Content_200210_1.ContentEN: You've made it to the black market, where a shady merchant catches your eye. Go introduce yourself.

Content_200210_2.ContentEN: Follow the black marketeer Harlowe's directions to the specified spot near Lamenting Lake to fulfil the commission.

Content_200210_3.ContentEN: The target area is overrun with Filthoids. Defeat them.

Content_200210_4.ContentEN: You've successfully dealt with the Filthoids. Now, it's time to claim your rightful reward from Harlowe.

Content_200210_7.ContentEN:
Rumours suggest a secret black market operates in Icelake's sewers. Countless shady deals have been made there. 
As a sharp and skilled Phoxhunter, it's your duty to delve into the sewers and investigate.

Content_200211_1.ContentEN: In Icelake, you notice a Sola girl who seems to believe she's a Charon. Might be worth checking out.

Content_200211_2.ContentEN: Faye, upset and bullied by her classmates, ran off with her ears covered. Find this troubled girl and comfort her.

Content_200211_3.ContentEN:
After a brief chat with Faye, you learn that her classmates have been bullying her.
It's time to teach those bullies a lesson and help Faye stand up for herself.

Content_200211_4.ContentEN:
After a brief chat with Faye, you learn that her classmates have been bullying her.
It's time to teach those bullies a lesson and help Faye stand up for herself.

Content_200211_5.ContentEN:
With your help, Faye gathered enough courage and stood up to her bullies. Furious, they brought backup.
 But those thugs were no match for you. Now that they've scattered, check in on Faye.

Content_200212_2.ContentEN:
Near Icelake, you notice a miner looking visibly uneasy, a sack of ore stained with something that might be blood lying beside him.
The whole situation feels off. Report it to Kevin, one of the Escort soldiers stationed at the city gate — it's the safest move.

Content_200212_3.ContentEN: As it turns out, Kevin has already received a report about this. As a helpful resident of Icelake, you agree to guide Kevin back to Larry's location for further investigation.

Content_200212_4.ContentEN:
Larry becomes alarmed at the sight of you and Kevin. He panics and attacks in desperation.
Defeat him to calm the situation.

Content_200212_5.ContentEN:
You've managed to subdue Larry, and he finally calms down.
Now, talk to him to uncover the whole story.

Content_200212_6.ContentEN: That piece of Phoxene is smeared with blood — and Larry's trembling voice and shifty eyes aren't exactly reassuring. He claims to be just a common miner, yet insists he owns a whole sack of Phoxene. Something doesn't add up. It might be worth investigating where that Phoxene really came from.

Content_200212_7.ContentEN:
The sack of Phoxene clearly has a questionable origin. It will hardly look any cleaner no matter whose pocket it ends up in — so really, why shouldn't it be yours?
Head back to Larry.

Content_200212_8.ContentEN: Larry's mind is starting to unravel. His fragile ego and the guilt gnawing at him ever since he committed his crime have torn him apart. Now, faced with the collapse of the life he dreamed of, he lashes out at you in desperation. Defend yourself — and help him face the truth he's been running from.

Content_200213_1.ContentEN:
You've been in Icelake for a while now. Despite the relentless cold, Margie has been a beacon of warmth in the slums — you can always see her distributing supplies to those in need.
It's been a while since you helped her chase down the thief in the sewers. It's time to catch up with her.

Content_200213_2.ContentEN:
As Margie said, things that seem worthless can sometimes hold great value. Even the rubbish bins scattered around the city might hide untold stories.
The 3 items you got from Margie: a prescription, a box of paper stars, and a key, each one holds a mystery of its own. Follow the clues showed on these 3 things to uncover the stories behind them!

Content_200213_3.ContentEN:
Having investigated the stories of the 3 things you got from Margie, your view of Icelake has changed.
Return to Mist Aken and catch up with Margie.

Content_200213_4.ContentEN: After investigating the stories behind the three items, it's time to meet Margie and tell her your findings.

Content_200215_1.ContentEN: Marcus, a chef with a passion for culinary experiments, is always on the lookout for new ingredients. You know of a good fishing spot near Lamenting Lake. Head there and see if you can reel in something special for him.

Content_200215_2.ContentEN: Marcus, a chef with a passion for culinary experiments, is always on the lookout for new ingredients. You know of a good fishing spot near Lamenting Lake. Head there and see if you can reel in something special for him.

Content_200215_3.ContentEN: You've gathered the marinade ingredients Marcus needs. Take them to him.

Content_200215_4.ContentEN:
Even though his dishes are still hard to stomach, you've agreed to be Marcus's culinary partner. 
Now, let's see what his next culinary creation will be.

Content_200215_41.ContentEN: You're still sceptical. But since you caught the fish yourself, might as well give Marcus' cooking a try.

Content_200215_5.ContentEN: Marcus' experimental dishes haven't won over many fans yet, but he's not ready to give up. He's now set his sights on plump Frostspines for his next recipe. Help him gather a few.

Content_200215_6.ContentEN: Excellent work — no one knows their way around a fishing rod like you! Now bring the freshly caught Phoxenetrout to Marcus.

Content_200215_7.ContentEN:
It's been a while since you last saw Marcus. You wonder how the tenacious chef is faring with his culinary creations.
You've heard he's been hanging around the city gate lately. Go see how he's doing.

Content_200215_8.ContentEN: Marcus is sitting on a bench by the gates of Icelake. Go talk to him.

Content_200216_1.ContentEN: You've heard about a sketchy treasure chest outside Icelake. Go check it out.

Content_200216_2.ContentEN:
You find the chest by the roadside, but there doesn't seem to be anything special about it.
No need to overthink it — just go open it.

Content_200216_3.ContentEN:
As you attempt to open the chest, three men suddenly pop out, calling themselves the Imperial Three and claiming ownership of the chest.
Since reasoning with them won't work, it seems you'll have to settle things the hard way.

Content_200216_4.ContentEN: After defeating the Imperial Three, they seem to have something to tell you.

Content_200217_1.ContentEN: Dean, a liquor vendor outside The Asphodel, seems to have some complaints about Camilla. Find out what's going on.

Content_200218_1.ContentEN:
You find yourself back here once again. That sweet girl's last trembling words seem to still echo in the air.
At this moment, a mysterious woman is murmuring under her breath as if in prayer, her whispers like a benediction from Mother Embla, offering solace to the mournful soul lingering over these frostbitten cliffs...

Content_200219_1.ContentEN:
Outside Icelake, the train runs its endless cycle, its whistle welcoming travellers from afar and bidding farewell to those venturing beyond.
Something seems amiss at the ticket booth today — it might be worth investigating.

Content_200219_2.ContentEN: This foreign merchant seems to be in trouble. Go talk to him.

Content_200219_3.ContentEN: As a warm-hearted Phoxhunter, it's unthinkable to ignore a traveller in distress. Time to sort things out with the unfriendly ticket seller.

Content_200219_4.ContentEN: The old scavenger keeps glancing your way, as if he's trying to work up the courage to say something. Might be worth going over for a chat.

Content_200219_5.ContentEN: Join Li An'de in completing the origami — a quiet, heartfelt gesture of good wishes, made by hand.

Content_200220_1.ContentEN: As a dedicated Phoxhunter, you make it a point not to miss any interesting commissions. Head to The Asphodel and pick up some new gigs.

Content_200220_2.ContentEN: You notice an unfamiliar waiter standing by the bulletin board, mumbling to himself. Go introduce yourself and find out what's on his mind.

Content_200220_3.ContentEN: After teaming up with Outsider, Snow suggests a contest to determine who gets the honour of naming your new team.

Content_200220_4.ContentEN:
After teaming up with Outsider, Snow suggests a contest to determine who gets the honour of naming your new team.
According to Snow, Lunoxplorer near Sanctuary knows how the contest works. Go speak with her.

Content_200220_5.ContentEN:
With Lunoxplorer as the judge, the first round is about to begin!
Head to the designated location to start the challenge.

Content_200220_6.ContentEN: The challenge begins! Follow the glowing circles marked by Lunoxplorer to reach the finish line!

Content_200220_7.ContentEN:
With Lunoxplorer as the judge, the second round is about to begin!
Head to the designated location to start the challenge.

Content_200220_8.ContentEN: The challenge begins! Take aim and pop the balloons made by Lunosmith!

Content_200220_9.ContentEN:
Congratulations! You've outmatched Outsider and won the contest.
Now's your chance to come up with a cool name for your new Phoxhunter team.

Content_200221_1.ContentEN: Near the request board at The Asphodel, a young scholar murmurs to herself, looking rather unsettled. Perhaps it's worth seeing if she could use a hand.

Content_200221_2.ContentEN: After agreeing to help Shirley find an interesting subject, you venture into the places most would rather ignore.

Content_200221_3.ContentEN: You didn't expect much from the sewers — yet somehow, you found something after all. Perhaps it's true that inspiration lingers in forgotten corners. The city walls might be worth a look next.

Content_200221_4.ContentEN: A simple detour has led to more than you expected. Shirley is waiting for you by the Icelake city gates, a reward in hand.

Content_200221_5.ContentEN:
There's never a shortage of those in need — and kindness has a way of finding its way back.
Head to The Asphodel and see who might need a helping hand. The young woman standing off to the side — Miss Shirley — seems especially anxious.

Content_200222_1.ContentEN: A free "ride" in the sewers? It all sounds rather dubious... but Dutton seems oddly confident. Since it's free, might as well humour him and see what he's cooked up.

Content_200222_2.ContentEN: Turns out he's recreated Luca's waterslide... in the middle of a sewer. Those pipes look highly questionable, so you wisely decline the honour of first ride. Let Dutton go first.

Content_200222_3.ContentEN: Dutton's nowhere to be seen at the exit. Judging by the loud banging echoing through the pipes, he might be in serious trouble. You'd better track him down quickly.

Content_200222_4.ContentEN: You find Dutton at last. After a ride like that, it's a miracle he's still breathing. Let's hope it hasn't soured his dreams of launching more rides in Mist Aken.

Content_200223_1.ContentEN: Theo — a self-proclaimed young researcher — is eager to study everything about the Charon. Lucky you, you've been chosen as his very first case study.

Content_200224_1.ContentEN: You run into Theo again near the sewer entrance. Might as well hear what curious topic he's chasing this time.

Content_200224_2.ContentEN: For reasons known only to himself, Theo has taken a sudden interest in sewer rats. At his request, you agree to help him track down a nest.

Content_200224_3.ContentEN: You spot one of the rats Theo's been searching for, darting around a bend in the tunnel. Follow it — the nest can't be far now.

Content_200224_4.ContentEN: Theo finally meets his long-awaited research subjects — but they turn out to be far less noble than he imagined. Snarling and aggressive, they lunge at you. You tell Theo to run, and ready yourself for a fight.

Content_200224_5.ContentEN: With the rats taken care of, Theo's study is complete — and he's had a taste of what being a Phoxhunter is really like. Time to see what conclusions he's drawn.

Content_200225_1.ContentEN: You come across Theo again near Hypnos' House. Best hear what strange notion he's chasing this time.

Content_200225_2.ContentEN: Theo wants to understand what life is really like for the Charons. Rather than just tell him, why not show him? Start by taking a few photos of their everyday lives.

Content_200225_3.ContentEN:
Watching the Charons go about their lives, Theo realises they're no different from Solarians — not monsters, but ordinary people, despite what grown-ups have always told him. Inspired, he rushes off to Hypnos' House to meet the lodgers in person.
But you know the truth: the house is empty now. Maybe it's time to reveal to Theo the other reason why the Charons are shunned — Deterioration.

Content_200227_1.ContentEN: A new form of immersive theatre has made its way from Luca to Icelake. The Galea Theatre is looking for volunteers to take part in this artistic venture. If you have a moment, drop by and have a word with the troupe.

Content_200228_1.ContentEN: Lunosmith seems to have something to say. She calls out to you as you pass — best drop by when you have a moment.

Content_200228_2.ContentEN: Preparation is key before any adventure — a rule every fledgling explorer should follow. Head back to the Sanctuary and get yourself ready before setting out.

Content_200228_3.ContentEN: A good weapon is a traveller's trustiest companion. Let Lunosmith show you the ropes — see if you can forge one that sits well in your grip.

Content_200229_1.ContentEN: You hear someone calling your name near the Sanctuary. If you've got a moment, try tracking down the voice — maybe they need your help.

Content_200229_2.ContentEN: Lunosmith's picked up a new dye recipe and wants you to give it a go. Given Amiette's... less-than-reliable reputation, it's only natural to feel a little uneasy about the outcome.

Content_200229_3.ContentEN: Follow the recipe and see the dyeing process through — all in the name of the noble pursuit of beauty, naturally.

Content_200230_1.ContentEN: A flamboyant man bars your way, insisting his teacher awaits. Follow him and see what's afoot.

Content_200230_2.ContentEN: Violetta provided a rough address for the letter's sender. Ask around the area for leads.

Content_200230_3.ContentEN: A sentry is fiddling with his old phonograph. Lend a hand — he may share a clue in return.

Content_200230_4.ContentEN: The phonograph is fixed. Time for the soldier to make good on his word.

Content_200230_5.ContentEN: This zealous admirer of Violetta has the wrong idea — calm him down, even if force is needed.

Content_200230_6.ContentEN: The devoted admirer seems unaware he's troubling his idol. Help him see reason.

Content_200230_7.ContentEN: With matters under control for the time being, return to Violetta and explain the situation.

Content_200231_1.ContentEN: A boy named Lars wants your help. Hear him out.

Content_200231_2.ContentEN: Follow Lars to Donat's home in Mist Aken.

Content_200231_3.ContentEN: Donat isn't home. Lars remembers him mentioning a return to Glevum Pit — head there and search for him.

Content_200231_4.ContentEN: Donat insists on going deeper into the Pit. You gave Lars your word — keep Donat safe and escort him forward.

Content_200231_5.ContentEN: Donat confides his "crime", which appears to tie into a case from sixteen years ago.

Content_200231_6.ContentEN: Filthoids are still prowling nearby. Clear them out before moving on.

Content_200232_1.ContentEN: Eerie singing floats from a nearby street corner. Muster your courage and seek out its source.

Content_200232_2.ContentEN: You've found the source — a peculiar wooden chest. Perhaps you can ask it why it sings at night.

Content_200232_3.ContentEN: A Phoxhunter named Giselle takes interest in your strange encounter. She'll ask around for you — in return, collect some herbs for her.

Content_200232_4.ContentEN: You've gathered the herbs she required. Take them to The Asphodel and ask Camilla about Giselle.

Content_200232_5.ContentEN: What you've seen makes little sense. Return to Giselle and ask her outright.

Content_200232_6.ContentEN: Filthoids are sniffing around the herbs. Clear them out before moving on.

Content_200233_1.ContentEN: Your leads all point to a kidnapping and arson that occurred sixteen years ago. Follow the clues — and uncover the truth buried beneath it all.

Content_200233_2.ContentEN: If your suspicions are correct, Giselle is behind it all — including the "kidnapping" of Violetta's student. Go to the agreed meeting spot and see what she's up to.

Content_200233_3.ContentEN: Violetta's words have shaken Giselle to the edge. Stop her — before she does something she can't take back.

Content_200233_4.ContentEN: Violetta tacitly acknowledges your deduction — though some truths remain unclear. For now, accompany her to a place she has in mind.

Content_200233_5.ContentEN: You chose to conceal the truth — the departed would not have wished their story buried. Let the show go on. Putini plays on at Icelake's theatre.

Content_200233_6.ContentEN: The truth must be known — the departed deserve no false blame. Violetta honours your choice... and closes the curtain with one final swan song.

Content_200234_1.ContentEN: You spot the stray loitering near the square again. It seems to recognise you — and lets out a distant miaow.

Content_200234_2.ContentEN: The cat darts toward the Sanctuary, glancing back as if to beckon you along. Best follow and see where it leads.

Content_200301_1.ContentEN: A rambling old man stops you with cryptic talk. He has a commission for you.

Content_200301_2.ContentEN: At the edge of the Gritblight Expanse, trouble finds you.

Content_200301_3.ContentEN: Someone you never expected appears. And yet, looking back... it almost makes sense.

Content_200302_1.ContentEN: Near EverSpring's gate, raised voices echo from afar. Turns out Starweaver trade in Huaxu is under threat from the Scourge of Zhuyin. If you have time, lend Zhao Qian a hand.

Content_200303_1.ContentEN: A strange man stops you in the black market. He seems to know the source of that voice in your head. Hear what he has to say.

Content_200303_2.ContentEN: Ren Wu's story seems suspect — but there's little harm in a treasure hunt. Follow his lead and see what turns up.

Content_200303_3.ContentEN: The first search yields a little "surprise." What next? Find the site named in the Oracle and take a look.

Content_200303_4.ContentEN: Steering you into danger can't be coincidence. Time to find out what Ren Wu's really after.

Content_200303_5.ContentEN: Ren Wu suddenly reappears and snatches your prize — but something's off. There might be a way to take back what's yours.

DROP_QUEST_East00toNight.ContentEN: Sneak out under cover of darkness

DROP_QUEST_ToNight.ContentEN: Rest on the sofa until nightfall

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_105.ContentEN: Drainage process halted. Please TURN OFF the valve.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_106.ContentEN: Water level exceeds the safety threshold by 90%. Protect the drainage system.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_1061.ContentEN: Water level exceeds the safety threshold by 60%. Protect the drainage system.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_1062.ContentEN: Water level exceeds the safety threshold by 30%. Protect the drainage system.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_107.ContentEN: The drainage system has been destroyed. Mission failed.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_108.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 50s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_109.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 40s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_110.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 30s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_111.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 20s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_112.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 10s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_113.ContentEN: Drainage system self-destructs in 5s. Open the valve now!

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_115.ContentEN: Water level has exceeded the safe threshold. Safety gate locked.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_116.ContentEN: Drainage flow obstructed. Please activate the valve.

DUNGEON_DEFENCE_118.ContentEN: Water level has dropped below the safe threshold. Safety gate unlocked.

DUNGEON_ENGINE_102.ContentEN: Phoxynamo Wheel  No. %s access unlocked. Ready for activation.

DUNGEON_ENTER_FAILED_TOAST.ContentEN: Commission start failed: Insufficient Sanergy of teammate(s) (<H>%s</>)

DUNGEON_EXTERMINATE_101.ContentEN: Terminate a specific number of enemies within the stage.

DUNGEON_EXTERMINATE_102.ContentEN: You may retreat once you have terminated enough enemies.

DUNGEON_EXTERMPRO_100.ContentEN: Complete the request by driving off the required number of enemies

DUNGEON_HIJACK_104.ContentEN: Stay by the vehicle, escort it to the end

DUNGEON_HIJACK_112.ContentEN: Approach to activate the vehicle. Shield will be consumed to maintain activation until the destination is reached.

DUNGEON_HIJACK_113.ContentEN: Obstacles on the route will block the way. Destroy them to proceed.

DUNGEON_HIJACK_114.ContentEN: Enemies at checkpoints will hinder the vehicle's progress. Eliminate all enemies to continue.

DUNGEON_HIJACK_115.ContentEN: Insufficient Shield. Vehicle halted for safety reasons.

DUNGEON_HIJACK_118.ContentEN: Hellfire is unable to activate the vehicle. Proceed anyway?

DUNGEON_HIJACK_119.ContentEN: Defeat the Legion officer at the checkpoint

DUNGEON_HIJACK_121.ContentEN: Eliminate all enemies at the checkpoint

DUNGEON_PAOTAI_103.ContentEN: Garage door has been completely damaged

DUNGEON_RESCUE_101.ContentEN: Locate the <H>Secret Cell</> that's holding the target, crack the mechanism, and secure the target.

DUNGEON_RESCUE_102.ContentEN: Try to avoid detection by the enemy <H>Patrollers</> around the <H>Secret Cells</>. If spotted, defeat them quickly to prevent them from sounding the alarm.

DUNGEON_RESCUE_103.ContentEN: If you fail to stop the Patrollers from sounding the alarm, the target will be in danger. Find the target before the <H>countdown</> expires, or the Commission will fail.

DUNGEON_RESCUE_104.ContentEN: After rescuing the target, escort them to the Evacuation Point. Please vigilantly ensure their safety throughout the trip.

DUNGEON_RESCUE_105.ContentEN: The Commission is considered complete once the target is successfully escorted to the Evacuation Point.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGEPRO_102.ContentEN: Crack the mechanism to expose the device's core

DUNGEON_SABOTAGEPRO_103.ContentEN: Dismantle all three devices within the time limit

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_100.ContentEN: Crack the mechanism to expose the detonator of "Finale Flare"

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_102.ContentEN: (Optional) Locate and defeat the members of The Forsakens

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_103.ContentEN: Destroy the "Finale Flare" trigger to prevent the explosion

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_104.ContentEN: The "Bombaholic" has been defeated. The "Finale Flare" detonator is now more vulnerable.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_105.ContentEN: The "Toymaker" has been defeated. Bouncepads are now available along the retreat route.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_106.ContentEN: The "Deceiver" has been defeated. Elite enemies will no longer appear in this commission.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_110.ContentEN: Find and expose the detonator of Finale Flare

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_111.ContentEN: <Highlight>Bouncepad</> helps you make a swifter retreat.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_112.ContentEN: Before exposing the detonator of Finale Flare, you can defeat the leader of The Forsakens in the area first to make the subsequent challenge easier.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_113.ContentEN: Once the <Highlight>detonator</> of "Finale Flare" is exposed, quickly destroy it to neutralise the mechanism.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_114.ContentEN: After destroying the detonator of "Finale Flare", head to the Evacuation Point as fast as possible for greater rewards.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_115.ContentEN: Bombaholic has been defeated. Several roadblocks have collapsed. "Finale Flare" is fuse has weakened.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_116.ContentEN: Toymaker has been defeated. Water levels are receding across all areas.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_117.ContentEN: Solve the puzzle to expose Finale Flare's detonator and destroy it.

DUNGEON_SABOTAGE_118.ContentEN: Finale Flare destroyed — proceed to the Evacuation Point.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_101.ContentEN: Defeat enemies near the Potion Station to recover Serum

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_102.ContentEN: Once the device is activated, the Serum will begin to drain

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_103.ContentEN: Locate the Potion Station and defeat nearby enemies to recover Serum

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_104.ContentEN: Commission complete once Serum at the Potion Station reaches <Highlight>100%</>

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_106.ContentEN: Serum is draining faster. Eliminate Primander – Corrosion immediately.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALMINIPRO_108.ContentEN: Serum processing complete — proceed to the Evacuation Point

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_100.ContentEN: Entered the range of the Potion Station

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_101.ContentEN: Potion Station too far away. Buff expiring

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_102.ContentEN: Select a Potion Station and head there

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_109.ContentEN: The Potion Station has run out of Serum.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_110.ContentEN: The Potion Station will collect Serum from defeated enemies nearby. The more Serum stored in the Potion Station, the stronger the buffs it provides.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_111.ContentEN: A Primander - Corrosion is about to appear!

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_114.ContentEN: Serum concentration begins at <Highlight>0%</>. Activate the device, then raise it through various means. (Draft)

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_115.ContentEN: There's a chance that enemies will drop Serum when they're defeated. Picking it up increases Serum by <Highlight>5%</>.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_116.ContentEN: Find Serum storage points, each of which increases Serum by <Highlight>15%</>. The icon on the left shows the number of Serum storage points discovered.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_117.ContentEN: When Serum concentration reaches <Highlight>100%</>, you may retreat or press on. If you continue, Serum will reset to 0%. (Draft)

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_118.ContentEN: After interacting with the device, Serum starts to drop continuously; if it falls to <Highlight>0%</>, the commission fails. Quickly locate a Potion Station and extract Serum.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_119.ContentEN: Potion Station provides <Highlight>Resource</>, or grants <Highlight>Healing</> or <Highlight>Attack</> buffs. Different Potion Stations have different functions.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_120.ContentEN: The Potion Station will collect Serum from defeated enemies nearby. The more Serum stored in the Potion Station, the stronger the buffs it provides.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_121.ContentEN: Approach the Potion Station and <Highlight>hold the interaction key to extract Serum to help you survive</>.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_122.ContentEN: After <Highlight>three minutes</>, you can choose to evacuate or continue the battle to earn more rewards.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_123.ContentEN: During this phase, no new enemies or Serum storage points will appear in the battle. Discovered Serum and Serum storage points will also disappear. If you don't reach the Evacuation Point within <Highlight>two minutes</>, the mission fails.

DUNGEON_SURVIVALPRO_124.ContentEN: Buff effect provided by the Potion Station:

DUNGEON_SYNTHESIS_103.ContentEN: Next match has begun. Please proceed to the arena.

DUNGEON_SYNTHESIS_106.ContentEN: Prize Chest about to be destroyed

DUNGEON_SYNTHESIS_109.ContentEN: The ace player from "May the Holy Light Shield You" enters the arena — stop them from destroying the Prize Chest!

DUNGEON_SYNTHESIS_113.ContentEN: Seeded players from other teams found (%d/%d)
