Event_Des_102001.ContentEN:
Huaxu — a tranquil land wreathed in incense.
 You arrive by invitation, awaiting the vision Zhiliu has promised to paint: a scene both timeless and unseen.

Event_Des_103001.ContentEN:
The Abyss of Wonderland: Volume Ⅰ is now unlocked.
Allow me to lead you onto the endless pathways of time.

Event_Des_103005.ContentEN: The merchant Zhiliu from Huaxu, whom you crossed paths with before, has settled briefly in The Asphodel. As a proven Phoxhunter, you've been recommended to help her get ready. Gather what she needs and earn generous rewards.

Event_Des_103006.ContentEN:
"H—H—Hey, wait, WAIT! Let's settle this nice and civil for once, alright!? Like... with a wager! Beat my little challenge and the loot's all yours!"
 
 — Lulu Lunoloot, curled up on the ground, begging for mercy

Event_Des_103007.ContentEN: Precision gunnery training — a trial by fire. Aim, fire, and complete every objective to prove your mettle.

Event_Des_103008.ContentEN: Follow me to stay on course and claim awesome rewards!

Event_Des_103009001.ContentEN: During the event, Demon Wedge drop rates are increased in Noctoyager Manual commissions. Limited-time Demon Wedge commissions are also available.

Event_Des_103010.ContentEN:
When a young nightingale leaves its nest, it sees the vast skies and sweeps across soft meadows — but also faces cold rain and raging winds.
 But the girl has made up her mind: no more turning back. With her magic brush, she'll paint a dream in every hue — and in this harsh, unforgiving world... find a sky forever warm and bright, just like the ones in her favourite fairytales.

Event_Des_105102011.ContentEN: Midsummer night, beneath a sky of stars—a forest where violets and butterfly wings waltzed in delicate steps. A sight she had never seen.

Event_Des_105102012.ContentEN: Behind layered veils, love is whispered in hush while death's fingers trace the edges of eternity.

Event_Des_105102013.ContentEN: Golden sunlight, finely ground, lavishly scattered!

Event_Rule_103002.ContentEN:
<Title>About Immersive Theatre</>
1. Immersive Theatre is divided into three sections: [Classic Repertoire], [Featured Repertoire], and [Immortal Repertoire]. Complete each section to unlock the next.
[Classic Repertoire] are one-time challenges. [Featured Repertoire] and [Immortal Repertoire] rotate with version updates. [Immortal Repertoire] also include permanent stages that can be replayed after meeting certain conditions.
2. Defeat all opponents within the time limit to clear a stage. Completing a stage awards [Stars] and [Ticket Stubs]. Stars unlock milestone rewards. Ticket Stubs can be exchanged for items at the Theatre Gift Shop.
3. [Classic Repertoire] and [Featured Repertoire] include two rounds per stage: [Hero's Odyssey] and [Hero's Way Home]. You must use different teams for each round. Final rewards are based on your total stars earned across both rounds. [Immortal Repertoire] includes only [Hero's Odyssey].
4. Each round consists of 5 rooms that must be cleared in order. Clear all rooms in both [Hero's Odyssey] and [Hero's Way Home] to unlock the next act. Failing to defeat the opponent or running out of time in any room will prevent further progress.
5. All stages feature [Stage Score] — a unique mechanic that grants buffs or debuffs during battle. You can adjust your strategy based on the effects in play.

FeeRefund_MonthlyCard_Tips.ContentEN: (All Monthly Pass purchases count toward total purchase. Remaining Monthly Pass refund available: <highlight>%s</>)

FeeRefund_Rule_Content.ContentEN:
Dear Phoxhunters,

The Second Closed Beta Test is a limited-access, paid test with a full data wipe. In-game top-ups will be available during the testing period, and all spending will be rebated according to the rules outlined below. Please read carefully to ensure you can claim your rewards correctly at launch.

<Title>Top-Up Rebate Rules</>
1. All top-up amounts during the Second Closed Beta Test will be rebated in the official launch version at a fixed rate of: <highlight>¥1 = 10 Phoxene Plumules</>.
① For the portion of your total top-up amount <highlight>up to ¥2,000</>, you will receive <highlight>200%</> of the equivalent value in Phoxene Plumules.
② For the portion <highlight>from ¥2,001 to ¥5,000</>, you will receive <highlight>150%</>.
③ For any portion <highlight>exceeding ¥5,000</>, you will receive <highlight>128%</>.
※ If the calculated rebate includes a decimal, it will be rounded up to the nearest whole number.
Example: 
If a player tops up ¥6,000 during the test, the rebate will be calculated as:
(¥2,000×10×200%)+(¥3,000×10×150%)+(¥1,000×10×128%) = 97,800 Phoxene Plumules

2. Players who purchase <highlight>Lunotress's Monthly Pass</> during the Second Closed Beta Test will receive, in addition to the Phoxene Plumule rebate outlined above, an equivalent subscription duration for free upon the game's official launch. <highlight>A maximum of two purchases will be rebated</>, for a total of 60 days of benefits. Please note that the avatar frame included with the Monthly Pass is exclusive to the beta and will not carry over.
Example: 
If a player purchases two Monthly Passes (¥60 total), they will receive:
¥60×10×200% = 1,200 Phoxene Plumules, plus 60 days of Monthly Pass benefits at launch.

3. Purchases of the following items during the Second Closed Beta Test will be counted towards your total top-up amount and rebated accordingly: Standard Battle Passes, Premium Battle Passes, Battle Pass Upgrade Packs, Top-up Gift Packs, Skins, and top-up amounts made via recharge tiers. Corresponding Phoxene Plumule rebates will be issued based on the rules in Section 1 above. Please note that <highlight>all bonus items included in these purchases are for test use only and will not carry over to the official launch</>.
Example: 
If a player tops up ¥328 via the recharge tier, plus purchases gift pack [XXX] and a Premium Battle Pass, the total spend would be: ¥328+¥XXX+¥128 = ¥XXX
→ At launch, they will receive: ¥XXX×10×[rebate rate]% = [rebated amount] Phoxene Plumules.

※ During the Second Closed Beta Test, players can view their projected rebate via: 
[Event Centre] → [Rebate Preview for the Second Closed Beta Test]

<Title>Rebate Delivery</>
1. Rebate rewards will be delivered via in-game mail. Please log in using <highlight>the same account used for top-ups during the test</>, and ensure the in-game mail function is enabled to receive your rebate.
2. Top-ups made via the official account system can only be claimed by logging in through that system after launch. Top-ups made via the bilibili account system can only be claimed by logging in with the same bilibili account. (Clients downloaded from the official website, TapTap, or Haoyou Kuaibao (3839) use the official account system. Clients downloaded from the bilibili Game Centre use the bilibili account system.)
3. Account data will be shared across PC, iOS, and Android during both the beta and official launch.
4. Players must log in within 365 days of the official launch to claim their rebate via in-game mail. <highlight>The rebate mail will expire after this period</>. Please ensure you claim it in time.

FeinaEvent_DungeonDes_1.ContentEN: Fina steps into a fairytale world, arriving as a guest at the Great Magician's home — only to find him gone. Follow the traces he left behind, and find your way out of the cavern.

FeinaEvent_DungeonDes_2.ContentEN: Leaving the dim-lit cavern behind, Fina steps into a twisting maze. But fear not the shifting traps or winding paths — with the clever {性别:Mr|Miss} Unicorn by her side, she's sure to solve every riddle.

FeinaEvent_DungeonDes_3.ContentEN: The road is broken by a shimmering lake — but such a tiny obstacle won't stop Fina. With help from Miss Butterfly to clear the thorny path, set sail across the water to the far shore.

FeinaEvent_DungeonDes_4.ContentEN: In the forest, mist veils the path... but a nightingale perches on a branch to lead her on. Fina smells flowers on the breeze — and she will walk the green meadows, writing her story's happy ending.

FeinaEvent_DungeonLock_3_2.ContentEN: Unlocks after completing <highlight>Across the Thorned Vale – Part Ⅰ</>

FeinaEvent_DungeonLock_4_2.ContentEN: Unlocks after completing <highlight>Onto the Blooming Fields – Part Ⅰ</>

FeinaEvent_DungeonName_1.ContentEN: Farewell to the Cavern of Yesterday

FeinaEvent_DungeonName_3_1.ContentEN: Across the Thorned Vale – Part Ⅰ

FeinaEvent_DungeonName_3_2.ContentEN: Across the Thorned Vale – Part Ⅱ

FeinaEvent_DungeonName_4_1.ContentEN: Onto the Blooming Fields – Part Ⅰ

FeinaEvent_DungeonName_4_2.ContentEN: Onto the Blooming Fields – Part Ⅱ

FeinaEvent_DungeonTask_1.ContentEN: Collect a total of %d White Bird Plumes

FeinaEvent_Exit_Content.ContentEN: End the challenge and lock in your current collection progress?

GACHA_DES_MUSTUP.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed to obtain a 4★ or better character/weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and the featured 5★ character within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
No more than <highlight>90</> Retraces can be made in the Destined Chrono. After obtaining the featured 5★ character, the Destined Chrono will close.

GACHA_DES_NORMAL.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed a 4★ or higher character or weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and a 5★ character within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
 Retrace counts for the Standard Chrono are tracked separately and do not carry over to other banners.

GACHA_DES_NORMAL_WEAPON.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed a 4★ or higher character or weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and a 5★ weapon within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
 Retrace counts for the Standard Chrono are tracked separately and do not carry over to other banners.

GACHA_DES_START.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed to obtain a 4★ or better character/weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and a <highlight>selected</> 5★ starting character within <highlight>50</> Retraces.
Each account can make no more than <highlight>50</> Retraces in the "Fare Forth Andante" Chrono. The "Fare Forth Andante" Chrono will remain available until all 50 attempts have been exhausted.

GACHA_DES_UP.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed to obtain a 4★ or better character/weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and a 5★ character within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
The probability of winning the featured character in this Chrono is significantly increased.

GACHA_DES_WEAPON_UP.ContentEN:
You are guaranteed to obtain a 4★ or better character/weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces, and the featured 5★ weapon within <highlight>80</> Retraces.
The featured weapon won't be added to the Standard Chrono after its event duration ends.

GACHA_SUBTITLE_100UP.ContentEN: 5★ drop guaranteed to be the featured character

GACHA_WARNING_MUSTUP.ContentEN:
<Title>About Chrono Drop Rates</>
In this Chrono, the base probability of winning a 5★ character is <highlight>0.6%</>, with an overall rate (incl. guarantees) of <highlight>1.6%</>. You are guaranteed to obtain the featured 5★ character "Chrysalis' Daydream" Psyche within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
The base probability of winning a 4★ character/weapon is <highlight>5.1%</> (<highlight>2.55%</> for a 4★ character and <highlight>2.55%</> for a 4★ weapon), with an overall rate (incl. guarantees) of <highlight>13.0%</>. You are guaranteed to obtain a 4★ or better character/weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces. The probability of winning a 4★ character/weapon through a guarantee is <highlight>99.4%</>, and for a 5★ character is <highlight>0.6%</>.
 
<Title>About Duplicate Items</>
On obtaining a 5★ character that you already own, from the 2nd to the 7th time, you'll receive the character's Intron x<highlight>1</> and Brilliant Grit x<highlight>50</>; from the 8th time onwards, you'll receive Brilliant Grit x<highlight>125</>.
On obtaining a 4★ character that you already own, from the 2nd to the 7th time, you'll receive the character's Intron x<highlight>1</> and Brilliant Grit x<highlight>10</>; from the 8th time onwards, you'll receive Brilliant Grit x<highlight>25</>.
Every 5★ weapon won in this Chrono comes with Brilliant Grit x<highlight>25</>; Every 4★ weapon won in this Chrono comes with Brilliant Grit x<highlight>5</>; Every 3★ weapon won in this Chrono comes with Pristine Grit x<highlight>20</>.
 
For any Destined Chrono, the count of Retraces without a 5★ character drop will continue to accumulate within this Chrono type, and it is tallied separately and does not carry over to other Chronos.
Once this Chrono ends, the event-exclusive character "Chrysalis' Daydream" Psyche will not be available in the Standard Chrono "Sojourns Entwined".

Destined Chrono is exclusively available during the character's first drop-rate boost event.

GACHA_WARNING_NORMAL.ContentEN:
<Title>About Chrono Drop Rates</>
 The base drop rate for a 5★ character is <highlight>0.6%</>, with an overall chance (including guarantees) of <highlight>1.6%</>. You are guaranteed a 5★ character within <highlight>90</> Retraces.
 The base drop rate for a 4★ character or weapon is <highlight>5.1%</> (<highlight>2.55%</> for 4★ characters and <highlight>2.55%</> for 4★ weapons). The overall chance to obtain a 4★ character or weapon (including guarantees) is <highlight>13.0%</>. You are guaranteed a 4★ or higher character or a 4★ weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces. When a guarantee is triggered, there is a <highlight>99.4%</> chance to obtain a 4★ character or weapon, and a <highlight>0.6%</> chance to obtain a 5★ character.
 In cases involving rate-ups or guarantees, please refer to the specific banner rules. Otherwise, the base drop rates apply to all characters and weapons.
 
 <Title>About Duplicates</>
 For a 5★ character you already own: on the 2nd to 7th duplicate, you'll receive the character's Intron ×<highlight>1</> and Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>50</>; from the 8th duplicate onward, you'll receive Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>125</>.
 For a 4★ character you already own: on the 2nd to 7th duplicate, you'll receive the character's Intron ×<highlight>1</> and Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>10</>; from the 8th duplicate onward, you'll receive Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>25</>.
 Every 4★ weapon obtained from this banner comes with Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>5</>; every 3★ weapon comes with Pristine Grit ×<highlight>20</>.
 
 Retrace counts for the Standard Chrono are tracked separately and do not carry over to other banners.

GACHA_WARNING_NORMAL_WEAPON.ContentEN:
<Title>About Chrono Drop Rates</>
 In this Chrono, the base drop rate for a 5★ weapon is <highlight>0.8%</>, with an overall chance (including guarantees) of <highlight>1.87%</>. You are guaranteed a 5★ weapon within <highlight>80</> Retraces.
 The base drop rate for a 4★ character or weapon is <highlight>6.6%</>, including a <highlight>3.3%</> for 4★ characters and another <highlight>3.3%</> for 4★ weapons. The overall chance to obtain a 4★ character or weapon (including guarantees) is <highlight>14.8%</>. You are guaranteed a 4★ character or a 4★ or higher weapon within every <highlight>10</> Retraces. When a guarantee is triggered, there is a <highlight>99.2%</> chance to obtain a 4★ character or weapon, and a <highlight>0.8%</> chance to obtain a 5★ weapon.
 In cases involving rate-ups or guarantees, please refer to the specific banner rules. Otherwise, the base drop rates apply to all characters and weapons.
 
 <Title>About Duplicates</>
 For a 4★ character you already own: on the 2nd to 7th duplicate, you'll receive the character's Intron ×<highlight>1</> and Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>10</>; from the 8th duplicate onward, you'll receive Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>25</>.
 Every 5★ weapon obtained from this banner comes with Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>25</>; every 4★ weapon comes with Brilliant Grit ×<highlight>5</>; every 3★ weapon comes with Pristine Grit ×<highlight>20</>.
 
 Retrace counts for the Standard Weapon Chrono are tracked separately and do not carry over to other banners.

GRADEUP_1101_01.ContentEN: Upon using Helix Leap or [Faintlight], Berenica gains 1 stack that increases Skill Efficiency by #1 for #2s, up to 3 stacks.

GRADEUP_1101_02.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to targets with a HP percentage lower than Berenica by #3.

GRADEUP_1101_04.ContentEN: Increases Berenica's Attack by #4 per Combo Level.

GRADEUP_1101_06.ContentEN: When in [Netherflames] state, each attack has a chance to unleash 1 additional Swordwave. The probability equals to #5 of [Ymir]'s Trigger Probability.

GRADEUP_1103_01.ContentEN: [Immersion] gained from [Duo] is increased to #1 of Max Sanity.

GRADEUP_1103_02.ContentEN: When using the 3-hit of [Furious Claws] and [Mournful Howl], decreases Damage Taken by #2 and increases the chance of inflicting [Adagio] through [Concerto] to 100%.

GRADEUP_1103_04.ContentEN: When dealing damage with the 4-hit of [Furious Claws] and Plunging Attack, increases the damage taken by the target who is inflicted with 10 stacks of [Adagio] by #4.

GRADEUP_1103_06.ContentEN: Enables [Presto] to increase Morale by #5. Each time Phantasio gains [Immersion] from [Duo], [Presto]'s duration is extended by 0.2 0.2s.

GRADEUP_1501_01.ContentEN: Using [In the Name of Patience] increases Character ATK by #1 for #2s.

GRADEUP_1501_02.ContentEN: When damage triggers a bonus effect, there is a #3 chance to gain 1 additional combo point.

GRADEUP_1501_03.ContentEN: [In the Name of Patience] Level +2, [Hmph!!] Level +1

GRADEUP_1501_04.ContentEN: When Combo Level increases, gains #4 additional combo points.

GRADEUP_1501_06.ContentEN: After using [That's It!] or [Samael]'s Charged Attack, gains #5 additional Lumino Damage for #6 seconds.

GRADEUP_1502_01.ContentEN: Increases [Interwoven Cries] Effect Trigger Probability by #1 and its max Trigger Probability to #6.

GRADEUP_1502_02.ContentEN:
After [Solar Eclipse] deals damage, the target takes #2 increased damage from [Lunar Hunt] for 3s.
After [Lunar Hunt] deals damage, the target takes #2 increased damage from [Solar Eclipse] for 3s.

GRADEUP_1502_04.ContentEN: Increases Lady Nifle's Healing Received by #3 and Sanity Recovery by #4.

GRADEUP_1502_06.ContentEN: When dealing damage using a ranged weapon, there's a #5 chance to summon either [Lunar Hunt] or [Solar Eclipse] at the target's location. This effect can only be triggered once every second.

GRADEUP_1503_01.ContentEN:
Increases the effect percentage of [Sword Intent]/[String Intent] applied to [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] by #1.

When there is/are 1/2 enemy/enemies within 20 metres, the mutual conversion point between [Sword Intent] and [String Intent] is increased to 3/2 points when Kezhou deals weapon damage.

GRADEUP_1503_02.ContentEN: Restores #2 points of Sanity once every #3s when triggering Bonus Effect.

GRADEUP_1503_03.ContentEN: [Wanderings of Youth] Level +2; [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] Level +1.

GRADEUP_1503_04.ContentEN: When using [Lightswords Slice Starry Streams], Kezhou gains [Blessed by Wind and Moon]: Grants immunity to Hitstun and reduces Damage Taken by #4 for #5s.

GRADEUP_1503_05.ContentEN:
[Lightswords Slice Starry Streams] Level +2;
[Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] Level +1.

GRADEUP_1503_06.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect, Kezhou gains 1 stack that increases his PEN stats by #6 for #7s, up to 6 stacks.

GRADEUP_1601_01.ContentEN: While under [Incandescence], [Dawn Beyond Night]'s Swordwaves deal #1 more damage.

GRADEUP_1601_02.ContentEN: Using [Flare] generates a [Dark Side of the Moon] field with a 10-metre radius, lasting #2s. Continuously reduces the Movement Speed of enemies within by #3.

GRADEUP_1601_04.ContentEN: Using a skill grants +#4 ATK Speed for #5s, stacking up to #6 times.

GRADEUP_1801_01.ContentEN: Targets granted the ability to deal additional elemental damage by [Boisterous Tea Party] gain an effect that increases their PEN stats by #1 for each type of additional damage effect they possess.

GRADEUP_1801_02.ContentEN: Increases the stack cap of [Taleweaver Quill] to 45. When using ["On a Warm Afternoon"], Fina gains 2 additional stacks of [Taleweaver Quill] and gains 1 additional stack of [Taleweaver Quill] per second during [Boisterous Tea Party].

GRADEUP_1801_03.ContentEN: ["On a Warm Afternoon"] Level +2; ["Bad Sorcerers Hate Sunlight!"] Level +1.

GRADEUP_1801_04.ContentEN: Each stack of [Taleweaver Quill] increases Fina's Skill Damage by #2 and Skill Range by #3.

GRADEUP_1801_05.ContentEN: ["Let the Tea Party Begin!"] Level +2; ["Bad Sorcerers Hate Sunlight!"] Level +1.

GRADEUP_1801_06.ContentEN: During [Boisterous Tea Party], when Fina deals weapon damage, for each Bonus Effect the target is suffering, the CRIT Chance of this attack is increased by #4, and the elemental type of the damage is converted to the target's weakness type.

GRADEUP_2101_01.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect, inflicts 1 additional stack of [Poison of Love] on the target.

GRADEUP_2101_02.ContentEN: Increases the maximum number of [Aurelia Aurita] allowed on the field to 5 and the stack cap of [Poison of Love] to 8.

GRADEUP_2101_04.ContentEN: Takes #1 less damage from targets inflicted with [Poison of Love].

GRADEUP_2101_06.ContentEN: When defeating a target inflicted with [Poison of Love], Rebecca gains 1 stack that increases Attack by #2 for #4s, up to #3 stacks. The remaining time of the effect is refreshed with each new stack gained.

GRADEUP_2301_01.ContentEN: Increases the number of [Tentacles] summoned through [Brawl For Justice!] to 12 and the maximum number of [Tentacles] that can exist at the same time to 24.

GRADEUP_2301_02.ContentEN: When [Tentacle] deals damage, there is a #1 chance to reload 1 projectile for Tabethe. This effect can only be triggered once every second.

GRADEUP_2301_03.ContentEN: [Tabethe's Specialty!] Level +2; [Have Tricks, Will Travel!] Level +1.

GRADEUP_2301_04.ContentEN: For each [Tentacle] on the field, increases Tabethe's CRIT Chance by #2.

GRADEUP_2301_05.ContentEN: [Brawl For Justice!] Level +2; [Have Tricks, Will Travel!] Level +1.

GRADEUP_2301_06.ContentEN: Enemies captured by [Tentacle] take Hydro Damage equivalent to #3 of [Tentacle]'s ATK once every 2s.

GRADEUP_2401_01.ContentEN: When Fushu or her nearby teammates are applied with [Nine-Needle Therapy], they ignore the target's DEF by #1 when dealing Skill Damage.

GRADEUP_2401_02.ContentEN: Increases the maximum number of [Yunchi] allowed on the field at the same time to #2.

GRADEUP_2401_04.ContentEN: Increase the stack cap of [Archaeus Revival] to #3.

GRADEUP_2401_06.ContentEN: During the ATK Speed boost effect granted by [Holistic Harmony], Fushu deals #4 additional Hydro Damage.

GRADEUP_3101_01.ContentEN: Grants 6 stacks of [Preload] when battle starts, and increases Morale by #4 for #5s.

GRADEUP_3101_02.ContentEN: During [Gunpowder Revelry], reduces Damage Taken by #1, and decreases the interval of gaining the ATK Speed boost to 0.06s.

GRADEUP_3101_04.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to targets with a HP percentage lower than #3 by #4.

GRADEUP_3101_06.ContentEN: During [Gunpowder Revelry], when triggering Bonus Effect using [Hansel and Gretel], inflicts [Laceration] on the target(s) for #6s.

GRADEUP_3102_01.ContentEN: Increases Hilda's Dodge Attempts by 2 and the effect [Elegant Anger] grants by 30%.

GRADEUP_3102_02.ContentEN:
Increases the length of [Hyperthermal Purgejet] by 50%.
When [Hyperthermal Purgejet] deals damage, inflicts an effect to the target that increases damage taken from Hilda by #3 for #4s.

GRADEUP_3102_04.ContentEN: When using [Wholehearted Service], summons 2 additional [Light Dirtexpellers], and decreases the target's damage by #1 for #2s.

GRADEUP_3102_06.ContentEN: Increases Hilda's PEN stats by #5 during [Pyrolytic Cleaning].

GRADEUP_3103_01.ContentEN: If a [Tot Popper] is detonated by a different type of [Tot Popper], restores #1 point of Sanity for Yale and Oliver; if detonated by the same type, restores #2.

GRADEUP_3103_02.ContentEN: The Movement Speed decrease effect inflicted on enemies in [Nightmare Lab] is increased to #3.

GRADEUP_3103_03.ContentEN: [Tot Popper] Level +2; [The Rules of Bomb] Level +1.

GRADEUP_3103_04.ContentEN: When deploying a [Tot Popper] in [Nightmare Lab], there's a #4 chance to deploy 1 additional [Tot Popper].

GRADEUP_3103_05.ContentEN: [Nightmare's Grasp] Level +2; [The Rules of Bomb] Level +1.

GRADEUP_3103_06.ContentEN: When Yale and Oliver is applied with [Bombing Frenzy], each deployed [Tot Popper] combines the features of both types, dealing higher damage and posing greater Stance reduction.

GRADEUP_3201_01.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to enemies within a 6-metre radius around Hellfire by #1.

GRADEUP_3201_02.ContentEN: Increases the HP recovery granted by [Retributive Resolve] to #2.

GRADEUP_3201_04.ContentEN: Decreases the interval of dealing [Puncture Retribution] Pyro Damage to 1.4s.

GRADEUP_3201_06.ContentEN: For every 5 Sanity-consuming skills used by nearby teammate(s), Hellfire automatically uses [Cage of Despair] 1 time. This effect can only be triggered once every #3s.

GRADEUP_3202_01.ContentEN: Damage from [Spinblades] has a #1 chance to inflict 1 additional stack of [Laceration].

GRADEUP_3202_02.ContentEN: Attacks from [Burgundy Twirl] can block incoming projectiles. Each stack of [Inebriation] reduces Damage Taken by #2.

GRADEUP_3202_04.ContentEN: Damage from [Laceration] detonation is increased by #3.

GRADEUP_3202_06.ContentEN: All weapon and skill damage (excluding [Spinblades] and [Laceration]) detonates 2 stacks of [Laceration].

GRADEUP_3301_01.ContentEN: When [Margie's Combustible Bin] consumes [Jackpot!] stacks, there's a #1 chance to regain the consumed stacks.

GRADEUP_3301_02.ContentEN: When using [Margie's Treasure Shovel], there's a #2 chance to deal additional damage to 1 random enemy within range once.

GRADEUP_3301_03.ContentEN: [Margie's Treasure Shovel] Level +2; [Margie's Recycling Sack] Level +1.

GRADEUP_3301_04.ContentEN: Increases the duration of Zealous Zone created by [Margie's Combustible Bin] to 20s.

GRADEUP_3301_05.ContentEN: [Margie's Combustible Bin] Level +2; [Margie's Recycling Sack] Level +1.

GRADEUP_3301_06.ContentEN: When [Margie's Combustible Bin] deals damage, damage dealt to the target from Margie is increased by #5 for #4s.

GRADEUP_4101_01.ContentEN: [Electric Charge] deals AoE Damage within a 3-metre radius.

GRADEUP_4101_02.ContentEN:
When an enemy with [Electric Charge] is defeated, their [Electric Charge] is transferred to another random target within a 20-metre radius.
The transferred [Electric Charge] retains its remaining duration, allowing the effect to continue on the new target.

GRADEUP_4101_04.ContentEN: At the start of battle, Rhythm gains [Electric Energy] equal to #1 of her Max Sanity.

GRADEUP_4101_06.ContentEN: The number of enemies [Electro Surge] deals damage to per second is increased to 2.

GRADEUP_4102_01.ContentEN: When using [Thunder's Oracle Peal], the effect of [Four Realms Align] is additionally triggered once to generate several strikes of [Zhen-Xun Convergence].

GRADEUP_4102_02.ContentEN: When using the Ultimate Skill, increases the [Talisman] retention chance by #1. The max number of stacks provided by [Mutual Generation] is increased to #2.

GRADEUP_4102_04.ContentEN: When using [Celestial Revelation], increases ATK for Zhiliu and the nearby teammate(s) by #3 for #4s.

GRADEUP_4102_06.ContentEN: When within [Four Realms Align]'s range, increases Zhiliu's PEN stats by #5.

GRADEUP_4201_01.ContentEN:
When in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state, gains 1 extra [Reverse Scale] each time [Precipitous Thunderfall] is used.
Using [Starstorm Descent] increases Weapon Attack Range by #1 and Skill Range by #2 for Yuming and the nearby teammate(s) for #3s.

GRADEUP_4201_02.ContentEN: When Yuming or his teammates unleash [Fish-Dragon Dance], unleashes 2 additional strikes of [Fish-Dragon Dance] within a 10-metre range around the location of the target, with priority given to different target locations.

GRADEUP_4201_04.ContentEN: Plunging Attack deals additional damage equal to #4 of Yuming's Skill Damage, with a maximum of #5.

GRADEUP_4201_06.ContentEN:
When [Starlight Descent] or [Starstorm Descent] deals damage, the damage is increased by #6 for each stack of [Thunderous Onslaught] inflicted on the target.
When using [Starstorm Descent], restores [Xuanjiao]'s Damage Absorption by #7.

GRADEUP_4202_01.ContentEN: When [Barrier] absorbs damage from projectiles, inflicts 1 stack of [Overwork Grudge] on the attacker for 3s, up to 2 stacks. [Overwork Grudge] is only stackable in this way.

GRADEUP_4202_02.ContentEN: Each Randy's level increases his Ultra Shield cap by #1 points.

GRADEUP_4202_04.ContentEN: Target hit by [Impact] immediately takes the damage of [Overwork Grudge] inflicted on the target 1 time.

GRADEUP_4202_06.ContentEN: When dealing non-periodic damage, deals additional Electro Damage equivalent to #2 of Randy's [Shield Points+Ultra Shield Points] 1 time.

GRADEUP_4301_01.ContentEN: When taking damage from [Divine Conqueror] and [Legion's Punishment], [Chaotic Thunderorb]'s damage taken transfer ratio is increased by #3.

GRADEUP_4301_02.ContentEN:
Increases [Might of Thunder] point cap to 600.
Each point of [Might of Thunder] increases [Legion's Punishment] damage by #1.
Each point of [Might of Thunder] increases the damage taken transfer ratio of [Chaotic Thunderorb] by #2.

GRADEUP_4301_04.ContentEN: When [Legion's Punishment] deals damage, there is a #6 chance to trigger its effect once.

GRADEUP_4301_06.ContentEN: When an enemy is first linked to [Chaotic Thunderorb], Sibylle deals an additional instance of [Legion's Punishment] damage to the target. This damage is amplified to 350% of the original damage multiplier and is guaranteed to trigger Bonus Effect: Electro.

GRADEUP_5101_01.ContentEN: Decreases the losing speed of [Passion For Work] by 50%.

GRADEUP_5101_02.ContentEN: When using a skill, applies an Attack boost equivalent to #1 of Truffle's Max HP to her teammates for #2s, with a maximum boost of #5.

GRADEUP_5101_04.ContentEN: Increases the stack cap of [Heavyweight] to 20. When Truffle starts mounting [Filbert], gains 20 stacks of [Heavyweight].

GRADEUP_5101_05.ContentEN: [Tummy Full, Hands Full] Level +2; [Chop-Chop, Commissaries!] Level +1.

GRADEUP_5101_06.ContentEN: After picking up [Activated Sal Volatile], [Tranquilizer Dewdrop], or [Ammo Supply Chest], Truffle gains 1 stack that increases her Skill Damage by #3 for #4s, up to #6 stacks.

GRADEUP_5102_01.ContentEN: Exiting [Stealth] state increases the weapon CRIT Chance by #4 for #3s.

GRADEUP_5102_02.ContentEN: When [Fang for Fang] or [Ravenous Gnaw] generates [Fang Spike], there is a #2 chance to generate 1 additional [Fang Spike].

GRADEUP_5102_04.ContentEN: When in [Stealth] state, increases Movement Speed by #1.

GRADEUP_5102_06.ContentEN: When in [Relentless Hunt] state, Outsider deals additional Anemo Damage by #5.

GRADEUP_5301_01.ContentEN: Using [Chrysalis Dreamweave] or [Phototaxis] restores #3 of Psyche's Max HP and increases Psyche's damage by #2 for #4s.

GRADEUP_5301_02.ContentEN: When [Ethereal Powder] or [Powder Stigma] deals damage, there's a #1 chance to generate 1 [Phantasm] at the target's location.

GRADEUP_5301_04.ContentEN:
When in [Flamboyance] state, Psyche gains [Eclosion].
[Eclosion]: Grants immunity to Hitstun, decreases Damage Taken by #5, and increases Auto Pick-up Range by 15.

GRADEUP_5301_06.ContentEN: During [Flamboyance] state, increases Psyche's PEN stats by #6.

GRADEUP_5401_01.ContentEN: Increases Damage dealt by teammates within the range of [Emerald Effusion] by #3.

GRADEUP_5401_02.ContentEN: During [Emerald Effusion] state, the [Azoth Projectile] Daphne gains per second increases to #1.

GRADEUP_5401_04.ContentEN: Restores #2 points of Sanity for each [Azoth Projectile] consumed.

GRADEUP_5401_06.ContentEN: When a teammate applied with [Purification Formula] deals damage to an enemy inflicted with [Decay Formula], Daphne gains 1 stack that increases Damage Dealt by #4 for #5s, up to #6 stacks. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

HomePianoDes_1001001.ContentEN: Before the final destination is reached, this place will always be home.

HomePianoDes_1001002.ContentEN: Destiny lurks behind the dust and sand.

HomePianoDes_1001003.ContentEN: The island was once a haven of tranquility, until it faded into memory.

HomePianoDes_1001004.ContentEN: The island was once a haven of tranquility, until it faded into memory.

HomePianoDes_1001005.ContentEN: As the first mist of morning rises, so too do you set out.

HomePianoDes_1001006.ContentEN: Till the day we meet again.

HomePianoDes_1002001.ContentEN: No one knows whether being watched by the Goddess of Fate is a blessing or a curse.

HomePianoDes_1002002.ContentEN: We beseech fate to look kindly upon us.

HomePianoDes_1002003.ContentEN: We beseech fate to look kindly upon us — or else raise our swords against it.

HomePianoDes_1003001.ContentEN: Hand in hand, they flee — chasing a single sliver of hope.

HomePianoDes_1003002.ContentEN: Treading the knife's edge of the past.

HomePianoDes_1003003.ContentEN: The struggle of a cornered beast.

HomePianoDes_1003004.ContentEN: If you wish to save all this.

HomePianoDes_1004001.ContentEN: That door does not welcome strangers.

HomePianoDes_1004002.ContentEN: Endless cold and driving snow stand the surest watch upon its walls.

HomePianoDes_1004003.ContentEN: Before the final destination is reached, this place will always be home.

HomePianoDes_1004004.ContentEN: A barbed exchange makes quite the opening remarks.

HomePianoDes_1004005.ContentEN: Congratulations — you've won the chance of running into your {性别:brother from another mother|sister from another mister}.

HomePianoDes_1004006.ContentEN: Drinks, commissions, rumours, secrets — everything that can be traded changes hands here.

HomePianoDes_1004008.ContentEN: Home, sweet home. There's nothing like it.

HomePianoDes_1005001.ContentEN: A novice Phoxhunter's first taste of fortune.

HomePianoDes_1005002.ContentEN: The beginning of a long trek.

HomePianoDes_1005003.ContentEN: In the howling gale, you count every step towards her.

HomePianoDes_1005004.ContentEN: In retrospect, you know it was a tale of the brave.

HomePianoDes_1005005.ContentEN: If you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss also gazes into you.

HomePianoDes_1005006.ContentEN: We laugh when we speak of death, and weep as we go on living.

HomePianoDes_1005007.ContentEN: He brings death — and life as well.

HomePianoDes_1005008.ContentEN: Lost traveller, return to that dream — the Avian Spirit never left.

HomePianoDes_1005009.ContentEN: Lost traveller, leave this dream now — the Avian Spirit has taken flight.

HomePianoDes_1006001.ContentEN: They say Icelake has no summer. You think otherwise.

HomePianoDes_1006002.ContentEN: Even a mayfly has the right to dream.

HomePianoDes_1006003.ContentEN: That flower has yet to come into its own.

HomePianoDes_1006004.ContentEN: The camera is the finest hunter — only it can catch slippery time.

HomePianoDes_1006005.ContentEN: All light races toward its extinguishing.

HomePianoDes_1007001.ContentEN: For the fierce battle soon to come.

HomePianoDes_1007002.ContentEN: Advancing through the belly of the iron behemoth.

HomePianoDes_1007003.ContentEN: A lifeblood called Phoxichor courses through every vein of Hyperborea.

HomePianoDes_1007004.ContentEN: No one knows where the next bullet will come from.

HomePianoDes_1007005.ContentEN: Be brave, and live on — together.

HomePianoDes_1007006.ContentEN: Until the mask is lifted, none can tell whether it hides the face of an angel or a demon.

HomePianoDes_1007009.ContentEN: In the name of justice, the inquisitor casts down a trial by fire.

HomePianoDes_1008001.ContentEN: Her wandering may well have traced the breadth of Atlasia a hundred times over.

HomePianoDes_1009001.ContentEN: Weave logic into a web to catch a shard of truth.

HomePianoDes_1009002.ContentEN: Young, ardent hearts throb for a future in full colour.

HomePianoDes_1009003.ContentEN: Even the finest drama is but a fragment of life.

HomePianoDes_1009004.ContentEN: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

HomePianoDes_1009005.ContentEN: Look up again — only phantoms refracted in shattered glass.

HomePianoDes_1009006.ContentEN: If we are forsaken by the gods, where then is redemption?

HomePianoDes_1009007.ContentEN: For the first time, I open my heart and embrace the world's gentle indifference.

HomePianoNAme_1006007.ContentEN: For What Dream Does Chrysalis Weave

HomePianoNAme_1006008.ContentEN: On What Breeze Do Wings Rise

MESSAGE_BossLinen_ShieldTip_PC.ContentEN: Break the boss's shield. Destroying dormant cannons deals damage to the shield.

MESSAGE_INTERACTIVE_Phone.ContentEN: You are now close to the boss enemy! Perform "Ask's Retribution" now

MESSAGE_LOADING_10_PC.ContentEN: A secluded isle perched atop the open seas at the border of Hyperborea and Elysium. The Elysian built a shrine there a millennium ago, but now only ruins whisper of its past glory.

MESSAGE_LOADING_11_PC.ContentEN: A city on the northern frontier of the Hyperborean Empire, intrinsically linked to the empire's genesis and formerly a major Phoxene hub. Its relentless cold and snowstorms serve as its staunchest guardians.

MESSAGE_LOADING_12_PC.ContentEN: A race born with "magic", bearing the ominous title of "Demon's Children" within the Hyperborean Empire.

MESSAGE_LOADING_13_PC.ContentEN: Among the Charons, those with unique talents possess varied magical powers, branded as "demonic arts" within the Hyperborean Empire.

MESSAGE_LOADING_14_PC.ContentEN: These monsters, widespread and often roaming in packs across the wilds, pose a danger not to be underestimated by ordinary beings.

MESSAGE_LOADING_15_PC.ContentEN: A friendly race that is also called the Lunos and coexists with human beings, resembling human children but distinguished by their moonlight-white hair, hence the name. Known for their well-intentioned but often misguided attempts to help humans, their actions sometimes lead to more chaos than aid.

MESSAGE_LOADING_16_PC.ContentEN:
An imperial nation located in the northern part of Atlasia. Venerating martial conquest and alchemical prowess, it is constantly embroiled in conflict with the Elysian Church.
Beneath its glorious crown thrives a legacy of valour and iron. All glory to the Emperor.

MESSAGE_LOADING_17_PC.ContentEN: Situated in the southern reaches of Atlasia is a realm devoted to the divine, heeding the decrees of nine deities and preserving an ancient, orderly governance. The resplendent, most enduring land, like a piece of Phoxene perched upon high branches, promises unparalleled joy and a bright tomorrow.

MESSAGE_LOADING_18_PC.ContentEN:
To the east of Atlasia lies a land with magnificent pavilions and palaces that dominate the skyline. It is the ancestral land of the Starweavers, known across the continent for their talent for commerce.
Guided by stars, they craft beauty from the earth's bounty; their sublime chants become poetry, an ode to serene solitude.

MESSAGE_LOADING_19_PC.ContentEN: Crouch and slide to navigate through low, narrow gaps.

MESSAGE_LOADING_1_PC.ContentEN: Press &Slide& and then &Jump& to Helix Leap over cliffs or cover long distances

MESSAGE_LOADING_1_Phone.ContentEN: Hold the Jump button and swipe upwards to the right to Helix Leap over cliffs or cover long distances.

MESSAGE_LOADING_20_PC.ContentEN: Use Helix Leap for rapid movement, which also allows access to usually unreachable places.

MESSAGE_LOADING_21_PC.ContentEN:
Upon completely disrupting an elite enemy's Stance, you can unleash Ask's Retribution to deal substantial damage.
Ask is the revered Father God among the Charons.

MESSAGE_LOADING_22_PC.ContentEN: Try talking to people in various cities. Regular interactions might gradually influence others' "impressions" of you.

MESSAGE_LOADING_23_PC.ContentEN: When taking damage, Shield doesn't account for DEF stats. The Shield will regenerate after a period of time without damage.

MESSAGE_LOADING_24_PC.ContentEN: Once an elite enemy's Stance is disabled, they'll briefly cease actions and start recovering Stance, during which they'll receive increased damage. Make the most of this phase for a faster victory.

MESSAGE_LOADING_29_PC.ContentEN:
Slash: Deals higher damage to target's Shield.
Spike: Deals higher damage to target's HP.
Smash: Further weakens target's Stance.

MESSAGE_LOADING_2_PC.ContentEN: &Attack& when in mid-air to perform Plunging Attack

MESSAGE_LOADING_2_Phone.ContentEN: While in mid-air, tap the Attack button to execute a quick Plunging Attack upon landing.

MESSAGE_LOADING_31_PC.ContentEN: Equipping Demon Wedges significantly empowers your characters and weapons. Some rare Wedges can even adorn the bearer's skill effects.

MESSAGE_LOADING_32_PC.ContentEN: Demon Wedges place a strain on the bearer, and the maximum amount of strain a bearer can handle is known as Tolerance. Elevating your character and weapon levels can increase this limit, allowing for more Wedges to be equipped for greater combat leverage.

MESSAGE_LOADING_33_PC.ContentEN: Each Demon Wedge has an affinity that resonates with certain Charons, which is known as Track. When a Wedge's Track matches the bearer's (character/weapon), it requires less Tolerance, while mismatching requires more.

MESSAGE_LOADING_34_PC.ContentEN: The latest innovation in Demon Wedge technology from the Imperial Alchemy Academy capable of altering the Track of slots.

MESSAGE_LOADING_35_PC.ContentEN: The Asphodel's specific quests for Phoxhunters. These commissions typically offer handsome rewards. Complete them to enhance team combat power.

MESSAGE_LOADING_36_PC.ContentEN: Don't let the endless enemy waves slow you down. Locating your target ASAP is key to nailing the commission quickly.

MESSAGE_LOADING_37_PC.ContentEN: Utilize Bouncepads to reach the Evacuation Point more quickly after dealing with the evil "Finale Flare" bomb.

MESSAGE_LOADING_3_PC.ContentEN: &Attack& when sliding to perform Sliding Attack

MESSAGE_LOADING_3_Phone.ContentEN: Hold the Jump button and swipe left to execute a Sliding Attack.

MESSAGE_LOADING_4_PC.ContentEN: Raising an alarm will attract more enemies

MESSAGE_LOADING_5_PC.ContentEN: If your character gets stuck, go to "Reset Location" in "Settings" to get free

MESSAGE_LOADING_6_PC.ContentEN: Attacking mechas can also deal damage to enemies

MESSAGE_LOADING_7_PC.ContentEN: Filthoids are violent creatures widely spread on the Atlasia Continent. Many of them are highly aggressive.

MESSAGE_LOADING_8_PC.ContentEN: The Hyperborean Empire is located in the northwest of the Atlasia Continent, with formidable military and highly-advanced Phoxichor technology.

MESSAGE_LOADING_9_PC.ContentEN: Phoxene is the most common mineral on the Atlasia Continent and also the foundation of Phoxichor technology.

MESSAGE_TRACKQUEST_30_PC.ContentEN: Follow the pipes to locate the mechanism. Navigation to be configured.

MESSAGE_WALLJUMP_PC.ContentEN: Consecutively press &Jump& to jump up the wall

MESSAGE_WALLJUMP_PHONE.ContentEN: Consecutively tap the button to jump up the wall

MOD_ATTR_ExtraComboLevel.ContentEN: When performing a Charged Attack, Combo Level +#1.

MOD_ATTR_ExtraComboProb.ContentEN: When gaining Combo Point through attacking, there is a #1 chance to gain 1 additional Combo Point.

MOD_DESC_101001.ContentEN: Upgrades Sword Normal Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_101002.ContentEN: Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to deal double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_101003.ContentEN: Upgrades Sword Charged Attack to hurl a thunderblade that explodes after a short delay, damaging enemies in a large AoE. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_102001.ContentEN: Upgrades the Polearm Charged Attack to throw 5 polearms forward, attacking enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_102002.ContentEN: Upgrades the Polearm Plunging Attack to trigger a bigger shockwave on impact, dealing double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_102003.ContentEN: Upgrades Polearm Normal Attack to summon phantom spears that strike the target. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_102004.ContentEN: Upgrades Polearm Charged Attack to launch a forward dash, damaging enemies in the user's path for double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_103001.ContentEN: Upgrades the Greatsword Normal Attack to unleash 3 Swordwaves upon final hit, cleaving through enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_103002.ContentEN: Upgrades the Greatsword Charged Attack to allow movement during charging while capturing controllable monsters along the path (up to 4). Spending combos extends the charging window, culminating in a powerful AoE attack upon release or timeout that deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_103003.ContentEN: Upgrades Greatsword Normal Attack to summon rotating gears that unleash a flurry of strikes. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_104001.ContentEN: Upgrades the Dual Blades Sliding Attack into a lethal dash, slashing through all enemies in your path for double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_104002.ContentEN: Upgrades Dual Blades Normal Attack to combine the blades into a returning throw. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_104003.ContentEN: Upgrades Dual Blades Charged Attack to combine the blades and hurl them forward, damaging enemies in their path. Deals double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_106001.ContentEN: Upgrades the Katana Charged Attack. Upon striking an enemy, the character leaps into the air and slams down, dealing multiple hits to surrounding foes for double the damage of the standard attack.

MOD_DESC_1311.ContentEN: Decreases Damage Taken by #1. Defeating an enemy grants 1 stack that increases ATK by #2 for #3s, up to #4 stacks. This effect duration refreshes with each new stack gained.

MOD_DESC_1312.ContentEN: Increases Skill Damage by #1 for #2s when battle starts during commissions or Nocturnal Echoes.

MOD_DESC_1313.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt by #1 when facing less than 2 enemies within a 20-metre range.

MOD_DESC_1314.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt by #1 per enemy within a 20-metre range (up to #2).

MOD_DESC_1315.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt by #1 when attacking off-balance enemies.

MOD_DESC_1316.ContentEN: Increases your ATK by #1 with each revival during commissions or Nocturnal Echoes (up to #2).

MOD_DESC_1400.ContentEN: Morale: The higher the HP percentage, the higher the damage dealt, up to #1.

MOD_DESC_1410.ContentEN: Malaise: The lower the HP percentage, the higher the damage dealt, up to #1.

MOD_DESC_1420.ContentEN: Skill Damage -#1. When attacking with a weapon, deals #2 additional damage of the same element type.

MOD_DESC_1430.ContentEN: Restores additional Sanity by #1 for you and your teammates every 3s.

MOD_DESC_1440.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt by you and your teammate by #1.

MOD_DESC_1500.ContentEN: Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1502.ContentEN: When performing a Helix Leap, deals Anemo Damage equal to #1 of ATK to nearby enemies. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1512.ContentEN: After defeating an enemy in mid-air, reset the character's air jump count, up to a maximum of #1 times. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1513.ContentEN: Upon landing from a height, deals Smash Damage equal to #1 of ATK to nearby enemies. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1522.ContentEN: While taking damage in mid-air, the damage taken is reduced by #1. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1523.ContentEN: Survives Fatal damage, reducing the character's HP to 1. This effect can only be triggered once every #1s max. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1524.ContentEN: When taking damage, there is a #1 chance to reduce the damage taken by #2. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1525.ContentEN: When using an Ultimate Skill, restores HP equal to #1 of max HP to the character and teammates within a 10-metre range. This effect can only be triggered once every #2s. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1526.ContentEN: Gains immunity to Hitstun, but Damage Dealt is reduced by #1 (unaffected by other modifiers). Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1532.ContentEN: When performing a Dodge, deals Pyro Damage equal to #1 of ATK to enemies near the starting point. Increases the character's max Tolerance by 2.5 times the Demon Wedge's required Tolerance.

MOD_DESC_1601.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Arbiter] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1602.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Bahamut] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1603.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Ifrit] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1604.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Summanus] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1605.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Hastur] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1606.ContentEN: Increases the stats of Demon Wedges prefixed with [Sphinx], [Siren], [Griffin], [Typhon], [Covenanter], and [Helios] by 20%.

MOD_DESC_1700.ContentEN: This Demon Wedge can be equipped in multiples.

MOD_DESC_1710.ContentEN: Activates only when at least 4 Demon Wedges aligned to Track #1 are equipped.

MOD_DESC_1801.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Sword equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1802.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Polearm equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1803.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Greatsword equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1804.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Dual Blades equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1805.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Whipsword equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1806.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Katana equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1807.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Pistol equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1808.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Dual Pistols equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1809.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Grenade Launcher equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1810.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Shotgun equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1811.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Assault Rifle equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1812.ContentEN: Increases your Damage Dealt by #1 per Bow equipped by you or your Combat Partner (up to #2; does not apply when acting as Combat Partner).

MOD_DESC_1911.ContentEN: When an Umbro character consumes Sanity, they gain 1 stack that increases weapon CRIT Chance by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_1921.ContentEN: Hydro characters' summon gains an ATK Speed boost equal to #1 of the summoner's melee weapon ATK Speed and a Skill Range boost equal to #2 of the summoner's Skill Range.

MOD_DESC_1922.ContentEN: When a Hydro character uses skills, all teammates within range get an ATK Increase equal to #2 of the character's ATK, with a maximum increase of 275, for #1s.

MOD_DESC_1931.ContentEN: When a Pyro character deals damage, gains 1 stack that increases ATK by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_1941.ContentEN: When an Electro character uses skills, they gain 1 stack that increases Skill Damage by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_1951.ContentEN: When an Anemo character uses Combat Skills, it gains a #2 Skill Damage Increase for #1s.

MOD_DESC_1952.ContentEN: When an Anemo character's Ranged Weapon triggers bonus effects, teammates within range get a Malaise Increase by #2 for #1s.

MOD_DESC_1961.ContentEN: Increases Damage taken by enemies near a Lumino character by #1. For each elemental Bonus Effect inflicted on the target, further increases the said damage taken by #1.

MOD_DESC_1962.ContentEN: Increases the Lumino characters' ATK by [their current Skill Duration x #1], up to #2.

MOD_DESC_2301.ContentEN: Each Combo Level increases CRIT Chance by #1.

MOD_DESC_2302.ContentEN: Each Combo Level increases Trigger Probability by #1.

MOD_DESC_2311.ContentEN: When defeating an enemy, gains 1 stack that increases ATK Speed by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_2312.ContentEN: Increases Movement Speed by #2 for #1s after defeating an enemy.

MOD_DESC_2321.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect: Smash, gains 1 stack that increases CRIT Damage by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_2322.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect, gains 1 stack that increases ATK Range by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_2421.ContentEN: #1 chance to get 1 additional Combo when dealing damage with Sliding Attack.

MOD_DESC_2501.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to Filthoids by #1.

MOD_DESC_2502.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to Hyperborean soldiers by #1.

MOD_DESC_2503.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt to members of The Elysian Church by #1.

MOD_DESC_2504.ContentEN: Increases Damage Dealt to members of The Forsakens by #1.

MOD_DESC_3301.ContentEN: After reloading, increases ATK Speed by #1 for #2s.

MOD_DESC_3311.ContentEN: Triggers an explosion at the target location upon defeating an enemy, dealing #1 of your Ranged Weapon damage to enemies within a #2-metre range.

MOD_DESC_3321.ContentEN: When dealing CRIT damage, gains 1 stack that increases Trigger Probability by #1 for #2s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_3322.ContentEN: When dealing CRIT Damage, there is a #1 chance to disarm the target.

MOD_DESC_3331.ContentEN: When triggering Bonus Effect, gains 1 stack that increases Multishot by #2 for #1s, up to #3 stacks.

MOD_DESC_3332.ContentEN: Upon triggering Bonus Effects, there is a #1 chance to reload 1 bullet.

MOD_DESC_3341.ContentEN: When dealing damage, increases the damage according to the percentage of the remaining projectiles. The higher the percentage, the greater the increase, up to #1.

MOD_DESC_3604.ContentEN: Decreases Damage Dealt by #1 (unaffected by other modifiers).

MOD_DESC_6111.ContentEN: Grants +#2 bonus Umbro Damage when Skill Duration is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6113.ContentEN: Grants +#2 CRIT Chance to self and allies when Skill Duration is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6121.ContentEN: Grants +#2 ATK when Skill Range is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6123.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Skill Damage to self and allies when Skill Efficiency is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6131.ContentEN: Grants +#2 ATK when Skill Range is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6133.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Skill Damage to self and allies when Skill Efficiency is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6141.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Skill Damage when Skill Efficiency is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6143.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Berserker to self and allies when Max Sanity is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6151.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Skill Damage when Skill Efficiency is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6153.ContentEN: Grants +#2 Berserker to self and allies when Max Sanity is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6161.ContentEN: Grants +#2 bonus Lumino Damage when Skill Duration is ≥ #1.

MOD_DESC_6163.ContentEN: Grants +#2 CRIT Chance to self and allies when Skill Duration is ≥ #1.
