Pack_Des_Shop_WeiTuo_01.ContentEN: A standard supply bundle containing various Commission Manuals

Pack_Des_Walnut_Order_001_015.ContentEN: Grants one Secret Letter: Order randomly selected from Nos. 001–015

Pack_Des_Weapon_Decompose.ContentEN: Grants either Coins or Weapon Ascension materials in a random amount

Pack_Name_Shop_Accessory_03.ContentEN: Verses on Strings Bundle: Opaque White

Pack_Name_Shop_Shuimu02.ContentEN: Veils and Whispers Bundle: Opaque White

Pack_Name_Weapon_ForgeA_Normal.ContentEN: Repulsive Crystal & Gold Sand Supply Pack Ⅰ

Pack_Name_Weapon_ForgeA_Plenty.ContentEN: Repulsive Crystal & Gold Sand Supply Pack Ⅱ

Pack_Name_Weapon_ForgeB_Normal.ContentEN: Sharpening Potion & Bomb Supply Pack Ⅰ

Pack_Name_Weapon_ForgeB_Plenty.ContentEN: Sharpening Potion & Bomb Supply Pack Ⅱ

PaotaiGame_Exit_Content.ContentEN: End the challenge and lock in your current score?

PartyReward_Description_110101.ContentEN: Beneath its bitter, inedible peel lie the sweet and sour grains of memory.

PartyReward_Description_110102.ContentEN: A broken feather, tinged with the salty tang of the sea and a faint trace of blood — evidence of a young girl's naivety and courage.

PartyReward_Description_110103.ContentEN: Even from within a cage, there are still those who gaze upon the horizon.

PartyReward_Description_110104.ContentEN: The fleeting moments of happiness are forever gone. But thankfully, there is always tomorrow.

PartyReward_Description_110301.ContentEN: Meticulously crafted in both size and form to perfectly conceal broken horns, allowing a Charon boy to pass as an ordinary Sola.

PartyReward_Description_110302.ContentEN: A journalist, with an abundance of flowery language, tells the tale of a wealthy merchant's legendary life, extolling his wisdom, elegance, and generosity — as though tantalisingly waving a golden straw before the world.

PartyReward_Description_110303.ContentEN: The cold metal bears the engraved number "47" — so worn it is barely legible. The name this soul once held has long since been erased, never to be known again.

PartyReward_Description_110304.ContentEN: Bright, warm, and tender, they beckon to the children lingering in the night, guiding them home. Yet for a beast lost to the shadows, such lights will forever remain out of reach.

PartyReward_Description_150201.ContentEN: The dark crimson liquid inside had long since solidified, clinging to the transparent shards. It was once a miracle desperately sought by a young girl.

PartyReward_Description_150202.ContentEN: A scroll holding the unfulfilled dreams of a young man and woman. It is a legacy, timeless and pure, that they have entrusted to the generations that follow.

PartyReward_Description_150203.ContentEN: Made from fresh game meat and vegetables, this stew once warmed a heart that had briefly ceased to beat on a cold, unforgiving winter night.

PartyReward_Description_150204.ContentEN: In this dream, there is neither the cruelties of life nor the sorrows of death. Regrets remain unwritten, mistakes yet to unfold — she is simply there, cradled by the warmth of sunlight and the soft murmur of the stream.

PartyReward_Description_180101.ContentEN: A pile of spent casings, which, with a touch of imagination, transform into pistols, cannons, airships, and mighty robots — keys to unlocking a world of dreams.

PartyReward_Description_180102.ContentEN: Fairy tales don't always end in happiness. After the bird turned into a burning star, does she still weep in the night sky?

PartyReward_Description_180103.ContentEN: Though the cold rains of the past have yet to cease, she still feels warmth from another's palm.

PartyReward_Description_180104.ContentEN: How far must she journey before she pens a beautiful ending to this tale?

PartyReward_Description_210101.ContentEN: Drink it down. Swallow the bitterness in the glass, and embrace the sweetness of love.

PartyReward_Description_210102.ContentEN: The jellyfish twirls in the glass under the light, sinking silently into the depths, failing to find a companion before it dissipates upon reaching the sea floor.

PartyReward_Description_210103.ContentEN: Relationships often mirror this drink: starting with warmth, followed by bitterness, and ending with a chill. Like water and fire, some things were never meant to blend.

PartyReward_Description_210104.ContentEN: This drink is simple in appearance and straightforward in flavour, for true love requires no embellishments — it exists in the gaze of the beloved.

PartyReward_Description_230101.ContentEN: Down it goes! The tart sweetness pops on your tongue like children's laughter, crackling and bursting on the porch.

PartyReward_Description_230102.ContentEN: Sweet and salty aren't opposites, just as innocence and mischief can coexist.

PartyReward_Description_230103.ContentEN: The initial sourness knits your brow, but as your taste buds adjust, a smooth sweetness blooms — much like understanding the world: hope always follows the storm.

PartyReward_Description_240101.ContentEN: A compendium cataloguing 1,890 medicinal substances — nearly half of them herbs. The author's name reads: Fufeng.

PartyReward_Description_240102.ContentEN: Nearly identical in appearance to Oneirowort, yet known to induce hallucinations. If hallucinations are waking dreams, then their likeness begins to make sense.

PartyReward_Description_240103.ContentEN: Bizarre in appearance, yet in Huaxu, it's a cherished symbol of longevity.

PartyReward_Description_240104.ContentEN: Though the silver lamp yet burns, I fear our reunion was but a fleeting dream.

PartyReward_Description_310101.ContentEN: A fiery, bold drink for those who crave a stronger kick. The first sip sparks your appetite, the second ignites your mood — a perfect icebreaker.

PartyReward_Description_310102.ContentEN: What's shared over drinks stays at the bar — an unspoken rule of any good drinking session.

PartyReward_Description_310103.ContentEN: Icelake may be small — a tiny speck on the Empire's map; yet Icelake is vast — memories of it linger no matter how far one travels.

PartyReward_Description_310201.ContentEN: Beneath petals lie thorns, and beneath the hem of a maid's dress? Bullets.

PartyReward_Description_310202.ContentEN: Disguises aren't magic but an art form — capable of transforming not just your appearance, but also your state of mind.

PartyReward_Description_310203.ContentEN: Be grateful the scissors in the maid's hand target only withered flowers.

PartyReward_Description_310204.ContentEN: A cup of flower tea, a maid's solemn vow.

PartyReward_Description_310301.ContentEN: The names may differ, but every toy on this list promises a spectacular explosion.

PartyReward_Description_310302.ContentEN: A potent energy drink that sweeps away the fatigue of weary travellers. With a clear mind, the heart may finally see what it truly wants.

PartyReward_Description_310303.ContentEN: A drink with a powerful calming effect, perfect for soothing the nerves of those left waiting. Only through patient waiting does the heart learn what it truly wants.

PartyReward_Description_310304.ContentEN: Filled with Kaboom Spinners, Whizpop Fireworks, and Starshatterers, this giant toy chest marks a brand-new chapter for Snap 'n' Spark.

PartyReward_Description_320102.ContentEN: You never imagined the stuff was actually drinkable.

PartyReward_Description_320103.ContentEN: A thick, luscious syrup whose sweetness clings to the palate long after the last drop.

PartyReward_Description_320104.ContentEN: A cheap spirit — some drank it to feel alive, others to dull the ache. Yet whenever their glasses were raised, the same words rang out: "The Unyielding — to those who never yield."

PartyReward_Description_330101.ContentEN: After a long day's work scavenging Kossak's mansion, you and Margie have gathered a trove of treasures. Hopefully, they're worth the sore arms.

PartyReward_Description_330102.ContentEN: A composition written for the Charon community, long-forgotten in the dark. It wasn't until Margie spread its melody through Icelake that it found its true purpose again.

PartyReward_Description_330103.ContentEN: A thoughtful birthday gift from a doting father. This multifunctional helmet comes with its own little surprise.

PartyReward_Description_330104.ContentEN: This grey furball, speckled with black spots, recalls the sight of a proud cat with a lush tail strutting across the snowfields.

PartyReward_Description_410101.ContentEN: The "Daily Duties" column is always crammed with trifles, sometimes spilling onto a second page. Such was Rhythm's life in the Escort.

PartyReward_Description_410102.ContentEN: A tidy scrapbook filled with newspaper clippings — cleaner, kitchen hand, scribe, fisher, bartender, mason... and even an animal trainer?

PartyReward_Description_410103.ContentEN: Each tricky passage is neatly marked, with careful notes in the margins. It clearly belongs to a diligent — if not yet seasoned — player. Look closer, and you'll spot a cute little lightning doodle in the corner.

PartyReward_Description_420201.ContentEN: Forget the grind and shake off your weariness — start your well-deserved break with a chilled, sweet indulgence!

PartyReward_Description_420202.ContentEN: A high-end drink aged for 20 years, "Triumph" has become a symbol of refinement and prestige among Hyperborea's elite. Yet, beneath the luxurious packaging, the bitterness is hard to mask.

PartyReward_Description_420203.ContentEN: The pistol serves as both a symbol of responsibility, weighing heavily on a father's shoulders, and a badge of honour passed down through generations.

PartyReward_Description_420204.ContentEN: Sometimes, the best ideas strike while showering, sleeping, or sipping tea. The actions taken in pursuit of such inspiration might appear a little... eccentric to the outside world.

PartyReward_Description_430101.ContentEN: The 13th Legion stands as a symbol of authority, the vessel for the emperor's will and violence.

PartyReward_Description_430102.ContentEN: Habit is a powerful thing. It makes us accept the abnormal and drift even further from the norm.

PartyReward_Description_430103.ContentEN: Beneath the glory of this medal lies a path strewn with thorns.

PartyReward_Description_510101.ContentEN: This classic beverage was born from a mishap, yet became a staple across Atlasia for its versatile charm. After generations of refinement, it has transcended its original purpose of quenching thirst and staving off hunger, becoming a symbol of our pursuit of culinary delight.

PartyReward_Description_510102.ContentEN: Ripened by time and cloaked in snowy white, Twisty Pods quietly await harvest, offering nature's bounty.

PartyReward_Description_510103.ContentEN: Freshly squeezed Borealberry juice, with the tartness filtered away, leaving only rich sweetness. The real magic in making it even tastier is sharing it with your best friend!

PartyReward_Description_510104.ContentEN: One filbert per question — that's the deal you made with the girl. So when in doubt, why not ask the Magic Filbert?

PartyReward_Description_510201.ContentEN: No need for words — the drink says it all.

PartyReward_Description_510202.ContentEN: After a long day, it's not the flavour that makes a good drink — it's the clean finish, and someone to talk it over with.

PartyReward_Description_510203.ContentEN: Steep those unbearable memories in the drink. Then down it in one go.

PartyReward_Description_510204.ContentEN: Every problem has its fix. But the more you stew over it, the harder it is to see the road ahead.

PartyReward_Description_530101.ContentEN: Children huddle together, dreaming of futures just beyond their reach.

PartyReward_Description_530102.ContentEN: "Please see the world through your eyes for me."

PartyReward_Description_530103.ContentEN: The coin has been tossed. No one can predict the outcome — heads or tails, death or rebirth.

PartyReward_Description_540101.ContentEN: A bouquet of dew-kissed blooms, offered to a patient in goodwill. Yet true pain is not so easily eased by kind gestures.

PartyReward_Description_540102.ContentEN: A scalpel still tainted with blood, bearing silent witness to a tragedy labeled "accident." But she knows it was no accident. The true culprit wasn't any one person — or perhaps, it was everyone.

PartyReward_Description_540103.ContentEN: A small voice recorder, preserving her resolve at the moment of departure.

PartyReward_Name_210103.ContentEN: Drink: A Song of Ice and Fire

PartyReward_Name_230104.ContentEN: Drink: Demon Tabethe the Red Hand

PartyTopic_Description_110101.ContentEN: She poured strange ingredients into the pot, mixing in the purest love and care.

PartyTopic_Description_110102.ContentEN: You are the reason I must be strong.

PartyTopic_Description_110103.ContentEN: This shore is my whole world, a cage forged just for me.

PartyTopic_Description_110104.ContentEN: All has ended, and all begins anew.

PartyTopic_Description_110301.ContentEN: A playwright once told me that to drive a protagonist into action, you must first strip away all their hope. How I wish reality didn't work that way.

PartyTopic_Description_110302.ContentEN: When hope is shattered and every path of retreat is severed, the protagonist can never return to the life they once knew. I once tried to delay that moment for as long as I could.

PartyTopic_Description_110303.ContentEN: Audiences love twists and surprises, so the stories playwrights weave must ebb and flow. But my story... it seems to have but one direction — downward, ever deeper, an endlessly spiralling descent.

PartyTopic_Description_110304.ContentEN: Perhaps I was never destined for a beautiful story — but even so, I have the right to choose how it ends.

PartyTopic_Description_150201.ContentEN: Sometimes, false hope is more cruel than despair itself, as it prolongs yesterday's suffering into a future where closure should have already been found.

PartyTopic_Description_150202.ContentEN: Though the winds of tomorrow will one day erase every trace we leave behind, the moments of glory we once shared will forever glow in the memories of those who remain.

PartyTopic_Description_150203.ContentEN: We choose to walk the path that leads to the cliff's edge, for along the way, we will be greeted by beautiful wildflowers.

PartyTopic_Description_150204.ContentEN: Countless tales intertwine, weaving the endless journey that is her life.

PartyTopic_Description_180101.ContentEN: She whispered her magical wishes to her friends.

PartyTopic_Description_180102.ContentEN: She sent her long-lost dreams skyward upon the stars.

PartyTopic_Description_180103.ContentEN: She buried her memories in distant lands.

PartyTopic_Description_180104.ContentEN: She entrusts her hopes for tomorrow to the blank pages.

PartyTopic_Description_210101.ContentEN: Thump, thump, thump — did you hear that? It's the sound of love flowing through.

PartyTopic_Description_210102.ContentEN: Love is meant to be tested. Rather than sweet nothings, a drop of poison feels like a far more honest trial. Whether forever apart or happily ever after — why not find out now?

PartyTopic_Description_210103.ContentEN: Even monsters have vulnerabilities. They aren't heartless demons — just lonely misfits lost among the crowd.

PartyTopic_Description_210104.ContentEN: Love is a blade that cuts through all barriers, whether across mountains, seas, or a single drop of lethal poison.

PartyTopic_Description_230101.ContentEN: Camouflage offers protection; mimicry punishes the wicked.

PartyTopic_Description_230102.ContentEN: Others may define good and bad, but it's up to you to decide right from wrong.

PartyTopic_Description_230103.ContentEN: Once you open your eyes, a broader world unfolds.

PartyTopic_Description_230104.ContentEN: Even in chaos, there is warmth to be found.

PartyTopic_Description_240101.ContentEN: A healer who once slumbered for a century now offers to treat your sleeplessness.

PartyTopic_Description_240102.ContentEN: A single blade of grass may veil the eyes — and all that lies before them becomes a waking dream of what is long past.

PartyTopic_Description_240103.ContentEN: You saw her, plain as day — a healer, a nonconformist, and a sister.

PartyTopic_Description_240104.ContentEN: The Hall of Ephemerality stands empty — and yet, so long as memory endures, it remains the home she holds dear.

PartyTopic_Description_310101.ContentEN: Life is simple — eat to live, not the other way around. Keep that straight, and you'll be fine.

PartyTopic_Description_310102.ContentEN: There's something almost magical about high voltage — it dares you to flirt with danger and uncover its risky secrets.

PartyTopic_Description_310103.ContentEN: More sorrowful than losing one's home is seeing it intact but forever out of reach.

PartyTopic_Description_310201.ContentEN: A maid's duties cover every aspect of life — including a few that might involve a bit of... bloodshed.

PartyTopic_Description_310202.ContentEN: First impressions matter, and nothing speaks more directly than what you wear. Fashion, after all, is a timeless art.

PartyTopic_Description_310203.ContentEN: Snip, snip. Trim the flowers, and with them, trim away the woes.

PartyTopic_Description_310204.ContentEN: No matter how well you hide, "growing up" always finds a way to catch up with you.

PartyTopic_Description_310301.ContentEN: Everything he says circles back to explosions — that's one explosive way to make a first impression.

PartyTopic_Description_310302.ContentEN: An unexpected visit, a conflicted conversation.

PartyTopic_Description_310303.ContentEN: They may be sworn enemies, but also inseparable halves of the same whole.

PartyTopic_Description_310304.ContentEN: Trapped in darkness, the warmth they share is the only light that dispels the gloom.

PartyTopic_Description_320101.ContentEN: A haunted house, a guest with secrets, and an amateur bartender.

PartyTopic_Description_320102.ContentEN: A strong spirit distilled from concentrated botanical extracts. Despite the name, its flavour is far from purely bitter — it's layered, evolving, and surprisingly complex.

PartyTopic_Description_320103.ContentEN: Craving sweetness is instinctual — people are drawn, often unconsciously, to memories of joy and warmth, even if overindulgence may take its toll on the body.

PartyTopic_Description_320104.ContentEN: It burns down the throat like a blade — and only the drinker knows what it cuts open inside.

PartyTopic_Description_330101.ContentEN: A good mood can work wonders on your efficiency, and the key to staying cheerful is knowing when to take care of yourself.

PartyTopic_Description_330102.ContentEN: Even discarded or forgotten items can find a new purpose.

PartyTopic_Description_330103.ContentEN: The bond between father and daughter goes beyond habits, profession, bloodline, and worldview — it also includes sharing the moniker "idiot."

PartyTopic_Description_330104.ContentEN: Paths diverge between a human and a cat. Perhaps it's best to embrace farewells with a smile and look forward to a reunion.

PartyTopic_Description_410101.ContentEN: She keeps reminding herself: turning a blind eye is the cruellest thing of all — so she must act, even if only in small ways.

PartyTopic_Description_410102.ContentEN: Sometimes, to see the road ahead — and go farther — you must stop and catch your breath.

PartyTopic_Description_410103.ContentEN: No more chasing notes scribbled by others — turn to a blank page, and begin your own movement.

PartyTopic_Description_420201.ContentEN: When smart people speak, there's always an agenda behind their words. Efficiency is their craft, and in a way, that's its own form of honesty.

PartyTopic_Description_420202.ContentEN: A gentleman is not born but forged — shaped by education, refined by environment, and polished with a little family "guidance."

PartyTopic_Description_420204.ContentEN: One last dance before the clock strikes twelve.

PartyTopic_Description_430101.ContentEN: The true test of loyalty lies in the ever-present sword, ready to fall.

PartyTopic_Description_430102.ContentEN: War never truly ends — it merely changes form.

PartyTopic_Description_430103.ContentEN: Since humanity first roamed forests and plains, tools have ensured survival. Whether for creation or destruction, their purpose remains unchanged.

PartyTopic_Description_510101.ContentEN: Eating is the most basic of needs for all living creatures, but the art of eating is far from simple.

PartyTopic_Description_510102.ContentEN: "Waste not, want not" — a simple maxim, harder to follow as we age.

PartyTopic_Description_510103.ContentEN: Filbert may seem like an ordinary pig to others, but to Truffle, she means the world.

PartyTopic_Description_510104.ContentEN: Everyone defines happiness differently, but no matter what, a full stomach gives us the energy to chase it.

PartyTopic_Description_510201.ContentEN: True friends don't expect anything in return. A warm meal and a kind word — that's more than enough.

PartyTopic_Description_510202.ContentEN: Even the trickiest rules can be worked around. But people? The ones who stir up trouble — they never change. Get too used to them, and you'll find your life tied up in knots.

PartyTopic_Description_510203.ContentEN: Some secrets are fine to share — over a drink, with the right friend. It lightens the load, brings people closer. But others? They're meant to stay buried. Deep, dark, and untouched. Best if they never see the light of day.

PartyTopic_Description_510204.ContentEN: It's not my real name — but I've grown to prefer "Outsider."

PartyTopic_Description_530101.ContentEN: It is not the length of life that matters, but how we choose to live it.

PartyTopic_Description_530102.ContentEN: Death is not the worst thing, as long as one is remembered.

PartyTopic_Description_530103.ContentEN: No one knows what tomorrow holds, yet even with life's uncertainties, we face the unknown, hoping for a better future.

PartyTopic_Description_540101.ContentEN: Prolonged pain or instant death — I do not know which is crueller. But perhaps... we still have a chance to overcome the former.

PartyTopic_Description_540102.ContentEN: Turn back — now! This isn't the tower I dreamed of. My dreams held no blood... no wails!

PartyTopic_Description_540103.ContentEN: As the long night nears its end, I too shall set forth. I believe what awaits me ahead is not meaningless death — but something beyond it. Something I must find.

PartyTopic_Name_150203.ContentEN: The Scenery Along the Wrong Path

PartyTopic_Name_180103.ContentEN: The Wish for a Bird's-Eye View

PartyTopic_Name_230103.ContentEN: The Line Between Good and Evil

PartyTopic_Name_310304.ContentEN: Eternal Light in the Black Box

Pet_AffixSlot_LockToast.ContentEN: Upgrade the rarity of this Geniemon to unlock this slot

Pet_Affix_AutoLock_ReConfirm.ContentEN: Also <highlight>lock</> the Geniemon currently equipped with this Trait?

Pet_Affix_Replace_ReConfirm.ContentEN: Replace the current Trait with the selected one?

Pet_Break_LevelReset.ContentEN: Upon ascension, the Geniemon's level will be reset to Lv. 1.

Pet_Break_ReConfirm.ContentEN: Consuming an ascended Geniemon will not return used materials. Proceed anyway?

Pet_IpDes_401.ContentEN: Often found near battlefields, ruins, or graveyards, this Geniemon feeds on the remains of the fallen. Its twin horns and grim habits have earned it a reputation as an ill omen across many regions.

Pet_IpDes_402.ContentEN: Floating through the air, Dripplet, with an affinity to water, normally curls its translucent body, making it nearly invisible in sunlight. Only when it rains does it unfurl gracefully, blossoming like an ethereal flower in mid-air.

Pet_IpDes_403.ContentEN: Mostly comprised of heat-producing glands, Zippyro releases waves of intense heat whenever it opens its mouth.

Pet_IpDes_404.ContentEN: Commonly found in highlands, Cubolts were once hunted for their highly conductive fur. So when encountering humans, they curl into a ball and roll away at incredible speed.

Pet_IpDes_405.ContentEN: A parasitic Geniemon that grows inside fungi, gradually taking control of its host. The puffing sound it makes is caused by wind passing through the hollow space between its body and the husk of its host.

Pet_IpDes_406.ContentEN: Agile, mischievous, and greedy, Lumi are lovers of shiny things. If you spot one, check your valuables!

Pet_IpDes_407.ContentEN: An introverted, carrion-feeding Geniemon that indiscriminately hoards anything it can encompass, using some for sustenance while stashing others away as materials for its nest.

Pet_IpDes_408.ContentEN: A remarkably agile Geniemon. Its comically large ears not only fail to hinder its coordination but actually create a sleek, aerodynamic form that helps it move with incredible speed.

Pet_IpDes_409.ContentEN: A lazy but incredibly long-lived Geniemon that spends over 98% of its time in slumber. Perhaps that's the secret to its longevity.

Pet_IpDes_411.ContentEN: Often spotted drifting through abandoned castles and forgotten ruins, this Geniemon resembles a lone wisp of ghostly flame from afar.

Pet_IpDes_412.ContentEN: Squishy as pudding and cute as a button, the Frosted Bunny Geniemon was once a continental sensation — until a scholar from Aethyrie revealed that its adorable little "eyes"... weren't eyes at all, but part of its internal anatomy. Let's just say it's been less popular ever since.

Pet_IpDes_413.ContentEN: Wreathed in flames and native to scorching regions, this fiery Geniemon leaves a faint whiff of grilled meat wherever it goes.

Pet_IpDes_414.ContentEN: Always crackling with static, this poor Geniemon is often shunned by others. No one truly knows what it looks like — all you ever see are a pair of lonely eyes, peeking out from behind a tiny toy car.

Pet_IpDes_415.ContentEN: Light as thistledown and never still, this tiny, lively Geniemon floats endlessly from place to place, carried by a single seed — forever chasing the end of a journey that doesn't exist.

Pet_IpDes_416.ContentEN: Radiant as a burning star, this Geniemon is known to light the way for weary travellers. Just don't stare at it too long — its periodic flashes can be blinding.

Pet_IpDes_421.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of obsidian. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_422.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of iolite. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_423.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of carnelian. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_424.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of amethyst. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_425.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of emerald. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_426.ContentEN: A Geniemon of legendary rarity, its body gleams with the lustre of opal. Long believed to exist only in bardic ballads and the dreams of minstrels.

Pet_IpDes_491.ContentEN: A Geniemon that has mimicked the form of a Healing Drone. Though the mechanisms behind Geniemon mimicry remain an enigma, this variant has fully adapted to life in the Aeolipile, evolving traits optimised for survival.

Pet_IpDes_492.ContentEN: A Geniemon that has mimicked the form of a Magnetix Drone. Though the mechanisms behind Geniemon mimicry remain an enigma, this variant has fully adapted to life in the Aeolipile, evolving traits optimised for survival.

Pet_IpDes_493.ContentEN: A burrowing Geniemon that thrives in the cracks between layers of soil. It feeds on rot and decay, enriching the land by returning nutrients to the earth.

Pet_LevelUp_ExpOverflow_Content.ContentEN: Excess EXP will be converted into following materials. Proceed?

Pet_PremiumTransform_Lock.ContentEN: Eldritch Geniemon not found. Cannot use this item.

Pet_RarePet_ReConfirm.ContentEN: <highlight>This is a rare Geniemon</>. Use anyway?

Pet_ResourcePet_LockToast.ContentEN: You don't have any Inactive Geniemon

Pet_SameAffix_UnableAdd.ContentEN: Cannot add Trait with the same name

PhantomTalk_1101_Chest.ContentEN: There's a chest here. Want to open it together?

PhantomTalk_1102_Chest.ContentEN: Unexpected fortune... Perhaps it was always meant for you.

PhantomTalk_1103_Chest.ContentEN: Not all surprises hide behind the curtain. Some step right into the light.

PhantomTalk_1104_Chest.ContentEN: There may be treasure here. Go on, my young friend — add it to your trove.

PhantomTalk_1501_Chest.ContentEN: A chest? Smash it, Samael—! Wait, no, no. We're not doing this today...

PhantomTalk_1502_Chest.ContentEN: A keepsake... perhaps left behind by a soul drifted to the Misty Sea.

PhantomTalk_1503_Chest.ContentEN: Be a shame to leave this treasure buried in the dirt. Go on — take it.

PhantomTalk_1801_Chest.ContentEN: Fina's friends say... they smell the King's treasure!

PhantomTalk_2101_Chest.ContentEN: Romance thrives on surprises... and here's one now.

PhantomTalk_2301_Chest.ContentEN: Ooh, found something shiny! Heehee — wanna guess what's inside?

PhantomTalk_2401_Chest.ContentEN: Unexpected fortune in the wilds... Could be enough to buy a dose or two of healing.

PhantomTalk_3101_Chest.ContentEN: Well, that's a surprise. Maybe luck's finally turning.

PhantomTalk_3102_Chest.ContentEN: Like I said — clean-up comes with the occasional surprise.

PhantomTalk_3103_Chest.ContentEN: Um... Oliver says there's something sh—shiny nearby.

PhantomTalk_3201_Chest.ContentEN: No one's claimed it? Then go ahead — it's not against justice to keep it.

PhantomTalk_3202_Chest.ContentEN: Luck is another means of accumulating wealth. Go on — there's no shame in accepting it.

PhantomTalk_3301_Chest.ContentEN: I smell treasure! Feels like a good haul today!

PhantomTalk_4101_Chest.ContentEN: Perimeter clear. Recovered some abandoned supplies.

PhantomTalk_4102_Chest.ContentEN: Earth below, fire above — gold, born of toil. The signs did not deceive.

PhantomTalk_4201_Chest.ContentEN: Such worldly things are of no use to me. They're yours.

PhantomTalk_4202_Chest.ContentEN: Treasure? Nice. Think they'll let me trade it for a day off?

PhantomTalk_4301_Chest.ContentEN: Treasure, just lying around? Hmph. I've no interest in prey that doesn't resist.

PhantomTalk_5101_Chest.ContentEN: You found something, Filbert? Wait—this isn't food! Spit it out!

PhantomTalk_5102_Chest.ContentEN: Look what I found! Let's split it 50-50, as always.

PhantomTalk_5301_Chest.ContentEN: Do you think... this little box might be holding someone's memories?

PhantomTalk_5401_Chest.ContentEN: Found some supplies. Let's restock before we head out again.

Piano_NoMusic.ContentEN: No pieces available. Collect scores to play.

Positioning_Des_Control.ContentEN: Applies effects that restrict enemy actions.

Positioning_Des_DEF.ContentEN: Primary skill effects scale with the character's DEF.

Positioning_Des_ES.ContentEN: Grants Shields or Ultra Shields to allies.

Positioning_Des_HP.ContentEN: Primary skill effects scale with the character's Max HP.

Positioning_Des_MaxSP.ContentEN: Primary skill effects scale with the character's Max Sanity.

Positioning_Des_Minion.ContentEN: Summons allied units to fight alongside the character.

Positioning_Des_Support.ContentEN: Provides a range of buffs or utility effects.

QuestDesc_10020101.ContentEN:
On that fateful day at Purgatorio Island, luck favoured you, and you lived to see another day. Awakening anew, Berenica was gone, leaving you amidst an unfamiliar snowy landscape.
A lady clad in red, who introduced herself as Camilla, together with a girl named Snow, invited you to come with them to Icelake.
After considerable thought, you decided to join them...

QuestDesc_10020102.ContentEN:
On that fateful day at Purgatorio Island, luck favoured you, and you lived to see another day. Awakening anew, Berenica was gone, leaving you amidst an unfamiliar snowy landscape.
A lady clad in red, who introduced herself as Camilla, together with a girl named Snow, invited you to come with them to Icelake.
After considerable thought, you decided to join them...

QuestDesc_10020103.ContentEN: The overturned vehicle and scattered cargo on the bridge have attracted Filthoids. Repel these unwelcome visitors.

QuestDesc_10020104.ContentEN: Having successfully driven away the Filthoids, you and Snow continue your journey towards Icelake.

QuestDesc_10020105.ContentEN: Despite a slight hiccup with the guard checking for travel permits, Ms Camilla's savvy negotiations ensured your entry into Icelake.

QuestDesc_10020106.ContentEN:
Ms Camilla suggests you lodge at the Hypnos' House.
Despite its eerie tales, you decide to delve deeper...

QuestDesc_10020107.ContentEN:
Ms Camilla suggests you lodge at the Hypnos' House.
Despite its eerie tales, you decide to delve deeper...

QuestDesc_10020108.ContentEN:
Henrik, the owner of the Hypnos' House, is a brooding and aloof man.
Persuaded by a spirited young girl, he reluctantly offers you shelter for the night.
Time to head to the house mentioned by the girl.

QuestDesc_10020109.ContentEN:
Henrik, the owner of the Hypnos' House, is a brooding and aloof man.
Persuaded by a spirited young girl, he reluctantly offers you shelter for the night.
Time to head to the house mentioned by the girl.

QuestDesc_10020110.ContentEN: A rare moment of rest. Time to sort out your swirling questions and the situation at hand.

QuestDesc_10020111.ContentEN: You have some questions for Psyche.

QuestDesc_10020112.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.
Psyche reveals that "The Asphodel", a tavern run by Camilla, offers a way to earn cash through commissions without requiring travel permits.

QuestDesc_10020201.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.
Psyche reveals that "The Asphodel", a tavern run by Camilla, offers a way to earn cash through tasks without requiring travel permits.

QuestDesc_10020202.ContentEN:
Before embarking on your quest to find Berenica, you need to gather some funds and secure a travel permit.
Psyche reveals that "The Asphodel", a tavern run by Camilla, offers a way to earn cash through tasks without requiring travel permits.

QuestDesc_10020203.ContentEN:
In the square, you witnessed an atrocity — such is the norm for the "Charons" with unique horns and spines.
To avoid embroiling Ms Camilla, who vouched for you, in trouble, you held your peace.
Continue to "The Asphodel".

QuestDesc_10020204.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie has encountered some difficulties.
Ask about her situation.

QuestDesc_10020205.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie has encountered some difficulties.
Ask about her situation.

QuestDesc_10020206.ContentEN:
The scavenger girl named Margie was robbed by a thief.
Help her retrieve her money bag. Not just to help her, but to also pass Camilla's test.

QuestDesc_10020207.ContentEN:
A scavenger girl named Margie had her money bag stolen.
After leaving The Asphodel, try asking around the square to see if anyone has spotted the thief.

QuestDesc_10020208.ContentEN:
An old man named Badi near the square claims to have seen the thief.
He suggests searching around Bin #3.

QuestDesc_10020209.ContentEN:
Indeed, you found traces of the thief near the rubbish bin, leading to the rooftop. 
Head up there to investigate further.

QuestDesc_10020210.ContentEN: You've reached the rooftop. Search the area for signs of the thief.

QuestDesc_10020211.ContentEN:
You confronted the thief on the rooftop, but he fled abruptly.
There's no time to lose — chase after him! Wait, something seems off near the manhole...

QuestDesc_10020212.ContentEN:
Following the trail into the sewers, the thief has left traps to slow you down.
Find a way to disable these mechanisms and continue the chase.

QuestDesc_10020213.ContentEN:
You've managed to throw the switches, successfully lowering the water level. 
Time to resume the chase.

QuestDesc_10020213_1.ContentEN:
The thief ambushed you with a set of pre-rigged traps. Margie and Snow were caught off guard and took a few hits.
Keep searching the area — he can't have gone far.

QuestDesc_10020214.ContentEN: The thief used a small gadget to release a thick fog and vanished into it. You'll need a spare key to continue the pursuit.

QuestDesc_10020215.ContentEN:
At last, you've spotted the thief again. This time, he won't get away.
Defeat the thief and capture him.

QuestDesc_10020221.ContentEN: You've completed Margie's request. Head back to The Asphodel for your reward.

QuestDesc_10020222.ContentEN: All Commissions for Phoxhunters are on the bulletin board in The Asphodel. Go check it out.

QuestDesc_10020223.ContentEN: Wells misunderstood you and embarrassed himself. He decided to buy you a drink to show his apologies...

QuestDesc_10020224.ContentEN: The Geniemons system is now unlocked. Capture a Geniemon to assist you on your journey ahead.

QuestDesc_10020301.ContentEN:
Henrik, owner of the Hypnos' House, has placed a lucrative bounty for Phoxhunters to retrieve Crystallo of Stella from Glevum Pit.
The bounty perfectly covers your travel expenses to the south, so you decide to take a chance...

QuestDesc_10020302.ContentEN:
Psyche decides to join our journey to show us the way to Glevum Pit.
Set out with Psyche for Glevum Pit.

QuestDesc_10020303.ContentEN:
Psyche seems to have made up her mind — she's coming with you on this little "adventure."
Make your way to Glevum Pit together.

QuestDesc_10020304.ContentEN:
Glevum Pit's gates have long been closed.
Search for an alternate passage.

QuestDesc_10020305.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020306.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020307.ContentEN:
You've made it inside Glevum Pit, but a sealed gate blocks the path ahead.
Search the nearby area — there might be a way to open it.

...
A Phoxhunter once mentioned tunnel lamps and signposts in their journal.
If you have time to spare, consider restoring them — they might light the way for those who come after you.

QuestDesc_10020308.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.
There are Filthoids standing in the way. Defeat them and move forward.

QuestDesc_10020309.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.
Operate the device to open the door, and explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020310.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've entered the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots persist after years of exploitation, echoing a bygone era of abundance.
Explore the depths of this forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella sought by Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020311.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've reached the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots now persist after years of exploitation — echoes of a bygone era of abundance. Yet the loose rocks and sharp, jagged crystal spikes scattered throughout hint at dangers ahead.
Explore the forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella that Henrik seeks.

QuestDesc_10020312.ContentEN:
Traversing the deserted tunnels, you've reached the depths of Glevum Pit.
Where a majestic Heaventree once stood, only tiny remnants of its roots now persist after years of exploitation — echoes of a bygone era of abundance. Yet the loose rocks and sharp, jagged crystal spikes scattered throughout hint at dangers ahead.
Explore the forsaken mine to find the Crystallo of Stella that Henrik seeks.

QuestDesc_10020313.ContentEN:
Your arrival has awakened the giant Filthoid dwelling in the depths of Glevum Pit.
Now that it has come to this, the first order of business is to defeat it.

QuestDesc_10020314.ContentEN:
Beneath the fearsome corpse of the giant Filthoid lies a gem aglow with starlight.
Pick it up and take it along.

QuestDesc_10020315.ContentEN:
Your first adventure in Glevum Pit concludes successfully — despite the unpleasant complications with Outsider.
Outsider took the Crystallo of Stella. He seems eager to speak with you. You've agreed to meet him at his residence.

QuestDesc_10020316.ContentEN:
Your first adventure in Glevum Pit concludes successfully — despite an unpleasant complication involving Outsider.
Outsider took the Crystallo of Stella. He seems eager to speak with you, and you've agreed to meet him at his residence.
Meanwhile, someone is waiting at the gates of Icelake — and he looks none too pleased...

QuestDesc_10020401.ContentEN:
Outsider requested an exclusive meeting, so Snow left first.
According to Outsider, his home is in the slums, marked by a bird on the door.

QuestDesc_10020402.ContentEN:
You were invited to a modest yet sweet "tea party" with Outsider and his sister Fina.
After the meal, Outsider wanted to discuss some serious matters with you in private.

QuestDesc_10020403.ContentEN:
You were invited to a modest yet sweet "tea party" with Outsider and his sister Fina.
After the meal, Outsider wanted to discuss some serious matters with you in private.

QuestDesc_10020404.ContentEN:
In exchange for a travel permit, you were requested by Outsider to investigate the Hypnos' House under the pretext of delivering the Crystallo of Stella.
But first, a well-deserved rest.

QuestDesc_10020405.ContentEN:
According to Outsider, the Hypnos' House run by Henrik may harbour horrible secrets — a Phoxhunter named Hunt is said to have gone missing within its walls.
You decided to investigate this inn.

QuestDesc_10020406.ContentEN:
Henrik grudgingly opened the door because of the Crystallo of Stella.
Time to delve inside for a probe.

QuestDesc_10020407.ContentEN:
Henrik went back to his office to verify the authenticity of the Crystallo. Now's the chance to explore the inn.
Psyche just greeted you; attend to her first.

QuestDesc_10020408.ContentEN:
You received a gift from Psyche. She said that flowers would bring good luck.
You've also learned that all lodgers at the Hypnos' House suffer from some kind of ailment, and Henrik seems to be secretly researching something.
Better investigate some other areas of the inn.

QuestDesc_10020409.ContentEN: The lodgers of the Hypnos' House seem to be an unusual bunch. Ask around and find out what they know about Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020410.ContentEN:
You've learned that Henrik's locked office is off-limits within this building.
You've learned that Henrik consistently goes out at 5 PM on the 20th of each month.
You've confirmed that Hunt, the missing Phoxhunter, indeed once lodged here—
Henrik should be back any minute now.

QuestDesc_10020411.ContentEN:
Though you couldn't get into the office, you've managed to gather some useful intel.
Go back and share your findings with Outsider.

QuestDesc_10020412.ContentEN:
Though you couldn't get into the office, you've managed to gather some useful intel.
Go back and share your findings with Outsider.

QuestDesc_10020501.ContentEN:
There's still plenty of time before the 20th arrives.
 Check The Asphodel's bulletin board and complete Commission: Mediation to gain some experience.

QuestDesc_10020502.ContentEN:
As you gradually settle into the city and learn the ropes of being a Phoxhunter...
In Dismania, the Imperial Capital, the Legion is plotting something.

QuestDesc_10020503.ContentEN:
Outside Icelake, Outsider is busy laying traps on a clearing on the outskirts while waiting for you.
You might want to see what he's up to.

QuestDesc_10020504.ContentEN: Per Outsider's instructions, defeat the approaching Filthoids to complete your combat training.

QuestDesc_10020504_1.ContentEN: You've defeated all the Filthoids. Speak with Outsider.

QuestDesc_10020505.ContentEN:
Outsider has somehow attracted a host of Filthoids. 
Well, no use complaining — just help him take care of them.

QuestDesc_10020505_1.ContentEN:
You agreed to meet Outsider for the Phoxhunter combat training on the outskirts, but Outsider has somehow attracted a host of Filthoids.
Now that you've taken care of the Filthoids, go see what he is up to.

QuestDesc_10020506.ContentEN:
According to Outsider, the next round of combat training involves protecting this loudly blaring device.
Simply clear out the Filthoids and prevent them from damaging it.

QuestDesc_10020507.ContentEN:
Henrik should be leaving the house soon.
Join Snow near the Hypnos' House, who's been tasked with covertly watching Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020601.ContentEN:
Henrik should be leaving the house soon.
Join Snow near the Hypnos' House, who's been tasked with covertly watching Henrik.

QuestDesc_10020602.ContentEN:
Henrik appears to be heading outside the city.
Follow him to see what he's up to.

QuestDesc_10020603.ContentEN:
Henrik stops by a florist, buys a bouquet, and continues on his way.
Follow him.

QuestDesc_10020604.ContentEN:
Outsider has infiltrated the locked room via the chimney.
Explore the secrets of this room.

QuestDesc_10020605.ContentEN:
You and Snow discovered Henrik's box hidden under the water.
The contents seem to have dissolved.
Go back and see what Outsider has found out.

QuestDesc_10020606.ContentEN:
Outsider sneaked into Henrik's office and discovered a document titled "The Slumber Project".
The document bears a list of names of people who have gone missing, and Psyche's name is also on the list.
It appears that Henrik might hurt Psyche. Concerned for her safety, you decide to intervene and head to the Hypnos' House for further investigation.

QuestDesc_10020607.ContentEN: You hear quiet sobbing coming from Psyche's room. Go check on her.

QuestDesc_10020608.ContentEN:
For some reason, Psyche seems upset, though Henrik claims she's just feeling a bit under the weather.
Feeling the need for a private conversation, you invite her for a stroll by Lamenting Lake. It's just outside Icelake. Now go and take a walk with Psyche.

QuestDesc_10020609.ContentEN:
You notice Psyche's vision seems severely impaired, but she is reluctant to talk about it.
Psyche wishes for you to accompany her to the old tree roots by Lamenting Lake, a place laden with her childhood memories.

QuestDesc_10020610.ContentEN: According to Psyche, a secret lies beneath these roots. It's time to unearth it.

QuestDesc_10020611.ContentEN:
Psyche gave you the camera she once buried as a child. She can no longer see, but she hopes you'll capture the world through its lens.
It seems Psyche's got more on her mind. Walk with her by Lamenting Lake and hear her out.

QuestDesc_10020612.ContentEN:
Your conversation with Psyche has been abruptly interrupted by Henrik's arrival. You told Psyche that you'll be waiting by the ticket booth at 2 AM for her.
Now, it's time to return to Icelake and prepare for her rescue.

QuestDesc_10020613.ContentEN: While returning to Icelake, you encounter a sketchy soldier. Alarmed by your presence, he attacks without warning...

QuestDesc_10020614.ContentEN:
A bout of "friendly" fisticuffs calmed the soldier named Kevin down.
He seems to have something to say.

QuestDesc_10020615.ContentEN:
Kevin confessed he was trying to secretly bury a Deteriorator, who used to be his neighbour. He begged you to keep it a secret.
He also explained what "Deterioration" is and shared Henrik's backstory.
Armed with this fresh intel, you decide to return to Icelake to discuss it with Outsider and Snow.

QuestDesc_10020701.ContentEN:
Night has fallen. As promised, you're to meet Psyche by the ticket booth south of Hypnos' House at 2 AM. Outsider seems ready.
There's no time to waste. Head to the rendezvous point now.

QuestDesc_10020702.ContentEN:
On your way to meet Psyche, a sudden scream came from the direction of Hypnos' House — it sounded like Snow.
It sent a chill down your spine, urging you to investigate the source of the disturbance.

QuestDesc_10020703.ContentEN:
According to Snow, Psyche is exhibiting signs of Deterioration. Meanwhile, a boy from Hypnos' House implores you to help Henrik.
Follow the boy into Hypnos' House to understand the situation fully.

QuestDesc_10020704.ContentEN: The usually locked office on the ground floor of Hypnos' House is now wide open, suggesting that Henrik's office is the epicentre of the ongoing incident.

QuestDesc_10020705.ContentEN:
Gravely injured, Henrik divulges the truth in his final moments, pleading with you to save Psyche, who has lost her senses. This is the collective wish of everyone at Hypnos' House.
Snow directs you to where Psyche fled. Head to Lamenting Lake to find her.

QuestDesc_10020706.ContentEN:
Butterflies flutter along the path Psyche took, as if guiding you. 
Follow them to find her.

QuestDesc_10020707.ContentEN:
Following the butterflies, you arrive at Lamenting Lake, where raging winds seem intent on blocking your way. 
Fortunately, the gusts follow a pattern. Stay vigilant and carefully cross the icy lake.

QuestDesc_10020708.ContentEN:
Psyche's condition worsens. By the time you finally catch up to her, she has morphed into a Filthoid known as the Eclosioner.
Defeat the Eclosioner and awaken Psyche from her slumber.

QuestDesc_10020709.ContentEN:
Psyche lies asleep at the eye of the storm. Amid the howling winds, you sense the cruelty of fate, yet your hands persist in their efforts. 
In the end, all you can offer is a bouquet for the slumbering girl.

QuestDesc_10020801.ContentEN: The blizzard suddenly lifts, and Psyche finds herself in a familiar place...

QuestDesc_10020802.ContentEN: A corridor woven from memories stretches before her. At the end lies a familiar yet strange shadow from the past.

QuestDesc_10020803.ContentEN:
The shadow relentlessly gnaws at Psyche's mind, but your voice calls her back.
As her brand-new wings unfold, a quiet resolve settles in her heart.

QuestDesc_10020804.ContentEN:
Psyche's story concludes with a single bullet from the city's Escort.
Rhythm, the Warrant Officer, mistook you for victims attacked by the Filthoid and now looks at you with concern.

QuestDesc_10020805.ContentEN: Following Charon tradition, you lay Psyche to rest in the water, letting her soul return to the Misty Sea.

QuestDesc_10020806.ContentEN:
Together with Outsider, you find a secluded spot near Lamenting Lake to bid Psyche a final farewell.
You're certain she would have loved this place — a serene, beautiful resting spot away from sorrowful cries or the clamour of machinery. Only the gentle breeze offers its silent tribute.

QuestDesc_10020807.ContentEN:
Sleep eludes you, so you set out for a walk in the Thawing Caverns.
It was once where you gathered fertile soil for her, and one of the few places beyond the city walls sheltered from the wind and snow.

QuestDesc_10020808.ContentEN:
Amid lingering pain and farewells, the long day finally comes to an end.
Sleep evades you tonight — perhaps a quiet walk through the city will help you clear your mind.

QuestDesc_10020809.ContentEN: Here, in the narrow space between reality and dreamland, passersby open their eyes, and echoes from clamorous deserts find their way back.

QuestDesc_10029701.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.

You can earn EXP by:
1. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)
2. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

QuestDesc_10029801.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.

You can earn EXP by:
1. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)
2. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

QuestDesc_10029901.ContentEN:
Raise your Trial Rank to progress in the main story.

You can earn EXP by:
1. Completing <H>Lunosmith's Demon Wedge 101</> tutorials
2. Completing <H>Commissions</> (excluding Noctoyager Manual Commissions)
3. Interacting with local residents and completing <H>Side Quests</>

QuestDesc_10030101.ContentEN: After days adrift in darkness, your consciousness finally begins to stir...

QuestDesc_10030102.ContentEN: You awaken in the Sanctuary after five days of unconsciousness. The first face you see is Camilla's. Speak with her — she may be able to fill you in on what happened while you were out.

QuestDesc_10030103.ContentEN: Camilla tells you that you were the sole survivor of the attack five days ago. As for the details, she remains tight-lipped. Instead, she suggests heading to The Asphodel to hear the truth from your concerned friends.

QuestDesc_10030104.ContentEN: The streets of Icelake are festooned with festive decorations, yet oddly quiet. A few flustered passersby hurry along — the uneasy calm beneath the surface is unmistakable. If you want the truth, you'd best head to The Asphodel and talk to your friends.

QuestDesc_10030105.ContentEN: Rhythm, too, is investigating the Charon Hunt. After weighing your options, you decide to follow her — this might be your chance to secure peace in Icelake, and perhaps learn something about Berenica from the Legion.

QuestDesc_10030106.ContentEN: You and Rhythm agree to join forces on the Charon Hunt case. First step: comb the scene for clues that could lead to the culprit's whereabouts.

QuestDesc_10030107.ContentEN: Clues from the scene suggest a link to either the theatre or the factory. As captain of the Noctoyagers, you lead your squad to the Galea Theatre, while Rhythm goes to investigate the factory on her own.

QuestDesc_10030108.ContentEN: An elderly woman waves you over from a distance — most likely the theatre manager. Speak with her and see if you can glean some clues about the case.

QuestDesc_10030109.ContentEN:
Madam Putsch seems more preoccupied with the Silvercandle Carnival rehearsal than the ongoing case. After a brief exchange, she returns to her work — but at least she doesn't stop you from looking around.
The props master, who oversees all material deliveries, might have more useful intel.

QuestDesc_10030110.ContentEN: According to the props ledger, the troupe's been rehearsing non-stop all month — hardly suspicious. You turn your attention instead to the elegant woman on stage and the anxious young man beside her. His jittery demeanour raises suspicions — could he be involved?

QuestDesc_10030111.ContentEN: The troupe appears to lack both the motive and the opportunity to commit the crime. With no useful leads here, it's time to regroup and see if Rhythm found anything at the factory.

QuestDesc_10030112.ContentEN: Rhythm tells you about a recent Phoxichor theft at the factory — the real stock replaced with fish oil. That would explain the heavy Phoxichor staining on the assailant. You now suspect the fishermen at the Icelake Fisheries. Head to Mist Aken and track them down.

QuestDesc_10030113.ContentEN: You take the fish oil from Rhythm — and the cat instantly perks up, purring and swishing its tail as if to beckon you forward. It clearly wants you to follow. Might as well see where it leads.

QuestDesc_10030114.ContentEN: The cat leads you straight to a visibly shaken fisherman. Before you can even speak, he drops to his knees, sobbing and begging to confess. Something's not right — time to dig deeper.

QuestDesc_10030201.ContentEN: You've arrived at the sewers near the factory. Which way next? Best consult Rhythm — she may have some ideas.

QuestDesc_10030202.ContentEN: A few steps into the sewers, Outsider suddenly hears strange noises up ahead. Best move in with caution.

QuestDesc_10030203.ContentEN: Cries for help echo through the tunnel. Before you can react, Rhythm dashes toward the sound. Stay close and follow her lead.

QuestDesc_10030204.ContentEN: You've rescued the first trapped civilian and opened the sealed gate. Time to press on — there's still someone else who needs help.

QuestDesc_10030205.ContentEN: According to the civilian, his companion is just up ahead. Move quickly.

QuestDesc_10030206.ContentEN: You hear the second civilian calling out nearby. Hurry over and check on him.

QuestDesc_10030207.ContentEN: Both civilians are safe. Talk to Rhythm — see how she's holding up after the rescue.

QuestDesc_10030208.ContentEN: With the wastewater drained, you can hear the culprit's snarls echoing through the dark. Stay sharp and keep moving.

QuestDesc_10030210.ContentEN: No one expected the Charon Hunt to involve not one, but two attackers. Rhythm was badly injured shielding you from the second assailant. With reinforcements arriving, the Legion will take it from here. After some discussion, the Noctoyagers agree to visit her at the medical centre — partly for the bounty, mostly to thank her for saving your life.

QuestDesc_10030211.ContentEN: No one expected the Charon Hunt to involve not one, but two attackers. Rhythm was badly injured shielding you from the second assailant. With reinforcements arriving, the Legion will take it from here. After some discussion, the Noctoyagers agree to visit her at the medical centre — partly for the bounty, mostly to thank her for saving your life.

QuestDesc_10030212.ContentEN: The Legion promised to send an escort — but when you arrive, there's no one in sight. Instead, the walls are riddled with bullet holes, evidence of a fierce firefight. It seems the soldiers stationed here crossed paths with the culprit. Since you're heading out anyway, best follow the trail and see where it leads.

QuestDesc_10030213.ContentEN: You discover a tunnel likely used by the attacker during their escape. It leads all the way to the sewer's outer exit. Move in carefully.

QuestDesc_10030214.ContentEN: A heavy, uneasy stillness hangs in the air near the sewer's end. Something clearly happened here. Stay alert.

QuestDesc_10030215.ContentEN: The exit is a scene of carnage. Poison traces — not standard issue for Imperial forces — hint at something far darker behind the Charon Hunt. After some discussion, Outsider stays to report to the Legion. You and Snow stick to the plan and head to the hospital to visit Rhythm.

QuestDesc_10030216.ContentEN: Days later, Rhythm finally wakes from her coma. After you bring her up to speed on everything that happened, she thanks you — and, as a gesture of gratitude, asks you to retrieve a silver seal from her secret base. Though still bedridden, she plans to write personal letters to trusted allies, hoping to gather more news about Berenica for you.

QuestDesc_10030217.ContentEN: Days later, Rhythm finally wakes from her coma. After you bring her up to speed on everything that happened, she thanks you — and, as a gesture of gratitude, asks you to retrieve a silver seal from her secret base. Though still bedridden, she plans to write personal letters to trusted allies, hoping to gather more news about Berenica for you.

QuestDesc_10030218.ContentEN: You've arrived at Rhythm's hidden base. Search the place — the silver seal bearing her name should be somewhere inside.

QuestDesc_10030219.ContentEN: You've arrived at Rhythm's hidden base. Search the place — the silver seal bearing her name should be somewhere inside.

QuestDesc_100302sp101.ContentEN: Two civilians have been trapped in the sewers by a monster — likely the Charon Hunt culprit. You're definitely on the right track. The creature's gone for now, so focus on unlocking the gate and getting the civilians to safety.

QuestDesc_100302sp102.ContentEN: To reactivate the control panel, you'll need to clear the blocked pipes in this area. But the moment the drainage system activates, Filthoids swarm in. Hold them off and protect the civilian!

QuestDesc_100302sp103.ContentEN: All blocked pipes have been cleared. Try unlocking the gate again.

QuestDesc_100302sp104.ContentEN: To reactivate the control panel, you'll need to clear the blocked pipes in this area. But the moment the drainage system activates, Filthoids swarm in. Hold them off and protect the civilian!

QuestDesc_100302sp201.ContentEN: The second civilian is trapped behind sewer defences. Disable the security mechanisms from the control panel and get them out safely.

QuestDesc_100302sp202.ContentEN: Same problem again — the control panel is sealed behind blocked pipes. Open the valves, clear the blockage, and bring the system back online.

QuestDesc_100302sp203.ContentEN: The second civilian is trapped behind sewer defences. Disable the security mechanisms from the control panel and get them out safely.

QuestDesc_100302sp301.ContentEN: The Charon Hunt perpetrator bursts forth with a savage roar. Face them head-on — it's time to end this.

QuestDesc_10030301.ContentEN: Back at Rhythm's secret base, you come across the silver seal — along with a few keepsakes from her past. As you sift through them, something shifts: maybe the distance between you was never as great as it seemed. Bring the seal back and hear what she has to say.

QuestDesc_10030302.ContentEN: To avoid any unnecessary trouble, it's best to cooperate with the 13th Legion's actions in Icelake for now.

QuestDesc_10030303.ContentEN: The Charon Hunt has entered a new phase. Following Clive's orders, you make your way into the sewers beneath Silverpeace Square. Once there, re-establish contact and await further instructions.

QuestDesc_10030304.ContentEN: After you finish updating Rhythm about Berry, Commander Lynn of the 13th Legion barges into the ward. She bluntly announces that her unit is taking over the Charon Hunt. Fortunately, she seems unaware of your ties to Sibylle — and even extends an offer to cooperate. Now is not the time to raise suspicions. Best play along for now, and maintain the appearance of cooperation.

QuestDesc_100303sp101.ContentEN: You've agreed to assist with the Charon Hunt investigation. Wasting no time, Lynn assigns your first task: meet Clive of the 13th Legion outside Icelake and help process the arriving supplies.

QuestDesc_100303sp102.ContentEN: Several days later, you finally complete the 13th Legion's assignments. But Rhythm doesn't show at the agreed meeting point. Could something have happened? Search the area and make sure she's safe.

QuestDesc_100303sp103.ContentEN: To help locals whose lives were disrupted by the 13th Legion, Rhythm is gathering essential supplies. As her ally, you offer to assist.

QuestDesc_100303sp104.ContentEN: Fishing complete. You've got everything the townsfolk need — time to deliver the goods.

QuestDesc_100303sp105.ContentEN: No sooner have you handed the supplies to Margie than a new order arrives from Clive. Seems the 13th Legion is on the move — head out and report in.

QuestDesc_100303sp201.ContentEN: Soldiers from the 13th Legion are stationed throughout the sewers, each patrolling their assigned section. The tunnels are thick with tension. Head to the area Clive designated for the Noctoyagers.

QuestDesc_100303sp202.ContentEN: Soldiers from the 13th Legion are stationed throughout the sewers, each patrolling their assigned section. The tunnels are thick with tension. Head to the area Clive designated for the Noctoyagers.

QuestDesc_100303sp203.ContentEN: The area Clive assigned to you is currently inaccessible — same old story: the control panel is sealed off by wastewater. Drain it to lift the lockdown and proceed to your designated sector.

QuestDesc_100303sp204.ContentEN: After a few delays, you finally gain access to the area Clive assigned. Move in quickly.

QuestDesc_100303sp205.ContentEN: You try reporting back to Clive after surveying the area — but Rhythm's comms terminal fails, cutting the message short. See if you can fix it.

QuestDesc_100303sp206.ContentEN: The moment the radio comes back online, you learn the perpetrator has broken through the Legion's blockade and is headed your way. Fortunately, Lynn arrives with backup. Now — finish it.

QuestDesc_10030401.ContentEN: Though the Legion has declared the case closed and returned to the capital in triumph, you and Rhythm know the truth: it's far from over.

QuestDesc_10030402.ContentEN: Reviewing the clues so far, you suspect the killer had a connection to opera. That eerie tune he hummed may have come from an aria — and identifying it could narrow the search. Rhythm's younger brother, Blues, is an avid opera fan. He left behind a collection of cassette recordings at their secret base. It's a long shot — but worth a try.

QuestDesc_10030403.ContentEN: Now comes the hard part. Time to put your memory and your ears to the test — one tape at a time.

QuestDesc_10030404.ContentEN: Hours slip by as you comb through the recordings. Rhythm has stepped out for some air. The search is slow, tedious — and draining. For now, take a break. Go see how she's doing.

QuestDesc_10030501.ContentEN: There was never any glory in becoming a Laurelled Charon — the title was nothing but bait. What awaited in the inner city was the cold slab of the Alchemy Academy's operating table. Now, as a monster, all you can do is obey.

QuestDesc_10030502.ContentEN: No longer human. No thoughts. No will. Only the task remains: eliminate the target.

QuestDesc_10030503.ContentEN: No longer human, you have neither thought nor choice. Proceed to the testing grounds. Eliminate the target.

QuestDesc_10030504.ContentEN: No longer human, you have neither thought nor choice. Proceed to the testing grounds. Eliminate the target.

QuestDesc_10030505.ContentEN: No longer human, you have neither thought nor choice. Proceed to the testing grounds. Eliminate the target.

QuestDesc_10030506.ContentEN: That naive fool actually pulled it off... There's no turning back. Get out — and do it as a human.

QuestDesc_10030507.ContentEN: That naive fool actually pulled it off... There's no turning back. Get out — and do it as a human.

QuestDesc_10030508.ContentEN: That naive fool actually pulled it off... There's no turning back. Get out — and do it as a human.

QuestDesc_10030601.ContentEN: The title of Laurelled Charon is nothing but a cruel ruse. You can't let Rhythm chase a dream spun from deceit. Tell her the truth about the Alchemy Academy... then do what must be done.

QuestDesc_10030602.ContentEN: At the Galea Theatre, the Silvercandle Carnival is in full swing. The place swirls with masks and outlandish costumes — the perfect veil for a monster like you. Slip through the revelry and find your contact.

QuestDesc_10030603.ContentEN: Days have passed since the 13th Legion's departure. Rhythm seems to be recovering — if only just — from the loss of Blues. She may still have more to say. Go, and listen.

QuestDesc_10030604.ContentEN: The Charon Hunt is over. The Forsakens' reach into the Cocytus Region has been cut short. But this is no ending — merely the next quiet before the storm.

QuestDesc_1003plus01.ContentEN:
Amid lingering pain and farewells, the long day finally comes to an end.
Sleep evades you tonight — perhaps a quiet walk through the city will help you clear your mind.

QuestDesc_1003plus02.ContentEN: You learn from Outsider and Snow that you were caught in the Charon Hunt — a string of murders that took place five days ago. Before you can make sense of it all, Rhythm appears unannounced and abruptly ends the conversation. You can't avoid her now — best hear what she has to say.

QuestDesc_1003plus03.ContentEN: You've gathered several promising clues — all possibly linked to the Charon Hunt. When the trail runs cold, try combining them. A new lead might surface.

QuestDesc_1003plus04.ContentEN: You and Rhythm agree to join forces on the Charon Hunt case. First step: comb the scene for clues that could lead to the culprit's whereabouts.

QuestDesc_1003plus05.ContentEN: A row of oversized posters at the theatre entrance immediately catches your eye. They may shed light on recent happenings — worth a look.

QuestDesc_1003plus06.ContentEN: The props master firmly denies that the curtain found at the crime scene came from the Galea Theatre. She claims all items are carefully logged — and a list signed by multiple staff members supports her. Better take a look yourself.

QuestDesc_1003plus07.ContentEN: A tired-looking actor explains the troupe has been rehearsing nonstop for the upcoming Silvercandle Carnival. A nearby attendance sheet records everyone's rehearsal hours — take a look.

QuestDesc_1003plus08.ContentEN: As you finish reviewing the log, a sound from above draws your attention. Go take a look.

QuestDesc_1003plus09.ContentEN: You've arrived at the fishermen's quarters. Time for a proper door-to-door sweep.

QuestDesc_1003plus10.ContentEN: No one answers — but a cat appears behind you, meowing urgently like it's picked up a scent. Might be worth following up.

QuestDesc_1003plus11.ContentEN: You've caught the Phoxichor thief — but he's not the killer. Still, he gives you a lead: the culprit may be hiding in the sewers. Hand him over to the Security Bureau, then regroup with Rhythm to decide your next move.

QuestDesc_1003plus12.ContentEN: With the fisherman handed over, you join Rhythm in the sewers to track the true suspect. Only once you've confirmed their whereabouts can she call for support from the 6th Legion — and bring the Charon Hunt to its end.

QuestDesc_1003plus13.ContentEN: You've secured the civilians — but just as relief sets in, a monstrous roar rises from below. Sounds like the creature they warned you about. Drain the wastewater and continue the pursuit.

QuestDesc_1003plus14.ContentEN: A few days later, Rhythm finally wakes. Bring her up to speed on what happened while she was unconscious.

QuestDesc_1003plus15.ContentEN: You've arrived at Rhythm's hidden base. Search the place — the silver seal bearing her name should be somewhere inside.

QuestDesc_1003plus16.ContentEN: You've arrived at Rhythm's hidden base. Search the place — the silver seal bearing her name should be somewhere inside.

QuestDesc_1003plus17.ContentEN: Soldiers from the 13th Legion are stationed throughout the sewers, each patrolling their assigned section. The tunnels are thick with tension. Head to the area Clive designated for the Noctoyagers.

QuestDesc_1003plus18.ContentEN: You've arrived at the sector Clive assigned to your team. Take a careful look around and assess the surroundings.

QuestDesc_1003plus19.ContentEN: Go over the clues you've gathered — one of them might point to the killer's identity. With fresh eyes, perhaps the missing link will reveal itself.

QuestDesc_1003plus20.ContentEN: Rhythm hums a melody — hauntingly similar to the one the killer sang that night. It's from Children From the Snowfield, a well-known opera. You were just discussing how to use that clue to lure the killer out... but it seems they've come to you first.

QuestDesc_1003plus20_1.ContentEN: Rhythm hums a melody — hauntingly similar to the one the killer sang that night. It's from Children From the Snowfield, a well-known opera. You were just discussing how to use that clue to lure the killer out... but it seems they've come to you first.

QuestDesc_1003plus21.ContentEN: At the Galea Theatre, the Silvercandle Carnival is in full swing. The place swirls with masks and outlandish costumes — the perfect veil for a monster like you. Slip through the revelry and find your contact.

QuestDesc_1003plus22.ContentEN: Your Forsakens contact should be close. Head over and make the rendezvous.

QuestDesc_1003plus23.ContentEN: The Forsakens are yet another looming threat to this city. Eliminate them.

QuestDesc_1003plus24.ContentEN: Just as the battle ends, soldiers from the 13th Legion burst in. If it's a fight they want, then a fight they'll get — none of them are walking away from this.

QuestDesc_1003plus25.ContentEN: You don't know how Rhythm and the Phoxhunters tracked you down — but there's no time to dwell on that. The Legion's still here, and the battle isn't over yet.

QuestDesc_1003plus26.ContentEN:
Your performance as Blues was flawless. Rhythm will never know that she killed her own brother. Neither the 13th Legion nor the Forsakens will trace the bloodshed back to her or the Phoxhunters.
But the curtain on that role has fallen. It's time to take the stage one last time — this time, as Parsifal.

QuestDesc_1003plus27.ContentEN: Let the curtain rise — and with it, let all things end.

QuestDesc_1003plus28.ContentEN: The noise from draining the wastewater has drawn a swarm of Filthoids. Drive them away.

QuestDesc_1003plus29.ContentEN: The noise from draining the wastewater has drawn a swarm of Filthoids. Drive them away.

QuestDesc_1003plus30.ContentEN: The area Clive assigned to you is currently inaccessible — same old story: the control panel is sealed off by wastewater. Drain it to lift the lockdown and proceed to your designated sector.

QuestDesc_1003plus31.ContentEN: Rhythm seems to have questions about the Phoxichor found in the snow. Speak with her and share your findings — it may lead to new discoveries.

QuestDesc_1003plus32.ContentEN: After a brief search, nothing noteworthy is found near the entrance corridor. Move deeper inside and speak with the staff of Galea Theatre.

QuestDesc_1003plus33.ContentEN: Following the cries for help, you find the second trapped citizen. Find a way to free him.

QuestDesc_1003plus34.ContentEN: After a brief exchange, you decide to cooperate with the 13th Legion. Now hear Commander Lynn’s orders for you.

QuestDesc_1003plus35.ContentEN: When you meet Clive, he is already driving off snow wolves near the drop-off point. Assist him in securing the area and wait together for the delivery crew.
