SKILL_180102_DESC.ContentEN:
Creates a [Boisterous Tea Party] field in front of Fina. [Boisterous Tea Party] continuously consumes Sanity and ends when Sanity drops to 0 or when this skill is held.

During [Boisterous Tea Party], using the skill again will switch the field effects in the order of the [Tea Party Guests] — [Nightingale], [Hound], [Unicorn], and [Butterfly].
Using the skill again outside the range of [Boisterous Tea Party] will relocate it to Fina's current location.

SKILL_180103_DESC.ContentEN: Fina gains the ability to deal additional Lumino Damage throughout the battle. When using ["On a Warm Afternoon"], gains 3 stacks of [Taleweaver Quill]. During [Boisterous Tea Party], gains 1 stack of [Taleweaver Quill] per second, up to 30 stacks.

SKILL_180104_DESC.ContentEN: When using ["On a Warm Afternoon"], increases the CRIT Chance of Fina's and her nearby teammates' weapon attack based on the number of [Taleweaver Quill] stacks gained.

SKILL_180191_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases Weapon DMG for the character and their nearby teammates mastering in Sword or Assault Rifle.

SKILL_20101_DESC.ContentEN: Character ATK +<H>#1</>. When shooting with this weapon, there is a chance to fire an extra projectile without consuming Ammo based on its Trigger Probability, dealing AoE Damage equal to <H>#2</> of its ATK.

SKILL_20102_DESC.ContentEN: Defeating targets with this weapon grants a <H>#1</> chance to reload 1 projectile.

SKILL_20103_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with this weapon triggers Bonus Effect, increases Damage Dealt by Melee Weapons by <H>#1</> for #2s.

SKILL_20201_DESC.ContentEN: When shooting with this weapon, grants 1 stack that increases ATK Speed by <H>#1</>, up to <H>#2</>. The duration refreshes on each new stack gained. This effect is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_20203_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Duration +<H>#1</>. When its projectiles hit enemies or the environment, they bounce once. When dealing damage with this weapon, increases Dual Pistols Damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s.

SKILL_20205_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing CRIT Damage with this weapon, grants 1 stack that increases Multishot by <H>#1</> for <H>#2</>s, up to <H>#3</> stacks.
This effect is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_20301_DESC.ContentEN:
Explosion Range +<H>#1</>. When its projectiles explode, they split into 8 additional projectiles that explode and deal damage. When defeating a target with this weapon, grants 1 stack that increases CRIT Damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to <H>#4</> stacks.
This effect is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_20302_DESC.ContentEN: Multishot +<H>#1</>. When a Pyro character performs a Dodge, grants 1 stack that increases Skill Damage and Ranged Weapon Damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to <H>#4</> stacks.

SKILL_20303_DESC.ContentEN: After switching to this weapon, increases the user's ATK, up to <H>#1</>, with the increase effect weakening over time. This effect can only be triggered once every 10s. When switching to another weapon, immediately removes this effect.

SKILL_20304_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Damage +<H>#1</>. When its projectiles hit enemies or the environment, they split into 2 additional projectiles that continue to travel. After switching to this weapon, increases Multishot by <H>#2</>, which decreases over time. This effect can only be triggered once every 10s and is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_20305_DESC.ContentEN:
When attacking with this weapon triggers Bonus Effect, grants 1 stack that increases ATK Speed by <H>#1</> for <H>#2</>s, up to <H>#3</> stacks.
This effect is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_20401_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with this weapon, the closer to the target, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20402_DESC.ContentEN: Smash ATK +<H>#1</>. The projectile it shoots attaches to the target and explodes after 3s. Projectiles attached to one another in the same position will stack up, increasing the damage and the range of the incoming explosion. When 1/2/3 projectiles are stacked, it deals <H>#2</>/<H>#3</>/<H>#4</> of the original damage.

SKILL_20403_DESC.ContentEN: Once the projectiles are fired, they follow the crosshair. When dealing damage with this weapon, the further away from the target, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20405_DESC.ContentEN: Character ATK +<H>#1</>. When charging, fires a special projectile that travels slowly and explodes after a short delay, dealing AoE damage. When shooting by a quick press, fires normal projectiles that can prematurely detonate the special projectile on hit. When defeating a target with this weapon, increases Skill Efficiency by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s.

SKILL_20501_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage using this weapon, the more the percentage of the remaining projectiles left in Magazine, the higher the damage it deals, with a maximum increase of <H>#1</>.

SKILL_20502_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Chance +<H>#1</>. Fires a beam that can ricochet to up to 4 surrounding enemies after hitting an enemy. When dealing CRIT Damage with this weapon, grants 1 stack of [Exiled Thunderwyrm] that increases damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to <H>#4</> stacks.

SKILL_20503_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with this weapon triggers Bonus Effect, there is a <H>#1</> chance to reload 1 projectile.

SKILL_20504_DESC.ContentEN: Multishot +<H>#1</>. When dealing damage with this weapon, the lower the remaining Ammo percentage, the higher the damage dealt, up to a maximum increase of <H>#2</>, with full effect when the Ammo count is below <H>#3</>.

SKILL_20507_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Damage +<H>#1</>. Projectiles that hit the environment or travel a certain distance return to the user's position and increase the Ammo count by 1. For each additional Ammo count gained, the damage dealt by this weapon is increased by <H>#2</>, up to a maximum increase of <H>#3</>.

SKILL_20509_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Range +<H>#1</>. When a Lumino character deals additional damage, it will have a <H>#2</> chance to grant 1 stack that increases ATK for the nearby teammates by <H>#3</> for <H>#4</>s, up to <H>#5</> stacks.

SKILL_20510_DESC.ContentEN: Skill Duration +<H>#1</>. Projectiles that hit the environment or travel a certain distance return to the user's position and increase the Ammo count by 1. When a Lumino character triggers Bonus Effect, grants 1 stack that increases ATK by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to <H>#4</> stacks. Using an Ultimate Skill refreshes the duration of all stacks to <H>#3</>s.

SKILL_20601_DESC.ContentEN: For each enemy hit by a single arrow it shoots, the damage it deals is increased by <H>#1</>, with a maximum increase of <H>#2</>.

SKILL_20602_DESC.ContentEN: CRIT Chance +<H>#1</>. When the user deals CRIT Damage with this weapon, their nearby teammate(s) will be granted one of the following enhancements for <H>#2</>s: Attack +<H>#3</>, DEF +<H>#4</>, Skill Damage +<H>#5</>, or Skill Duration +<H>#6</>.

SKILL_20603_DESC.ContentEN:
Trigger Probability +<H>#1</>. While charging, gradually locks onto enemies within range; upon release, fires tracking arrows at the locked targets. When dealing damage with this weapon triggers Bonus Effect, grants 1 stack that increases CRIT Damage by <H>#2</> for <H>#3</>s, up to <H>#4</> stacks.
This effect is removed when switching to another weapon.

SKILL_210001_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Hydro teammate(s).

SKILL_210003_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Hydro teammate(s).

SKILL_210101_DESC.ContentEN: Summons 1 [Aurelia Aurita]. A maximum of 3 can exist at the same time.

SKILL_210102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Hydro Damage to nearby enemies; the damage is increased based on the number of [Poison of Love] stacks inflicted on the enemies.

SKILL_210103_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing damage with a melee weapon or [Aurelia Aurita]'s attack, inflicts 1 stack of [Poison of Love] on the target, up to 6 stacks.

SKILL_210104_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing damage with a Normal Attack using a melee weapon, there's a chance to have [Poison of Love] inflicted on the target to deal additional damage once.
Dealing damage with [Lada Lovedew] will always trigger this effect.

SKILL_230101_DESC.ContentEN:
Commands all [Tentacles] to attack 1 time and increases the Damage Dealt from this attack.
Grants Tabethe and her nearby teammate(s) the ability to deal additional Hydro Damage.

SKILL_230103_DESC.ContentEN:
Dealing CRIT Damage using a ranged weapon has a chance to summon 1 [Tentacle] near the target, which can only be triggered once per second.
A maximum of 18 [Tentacles] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_230104_DESC.ContentEN: When summoning [Tentacles], Tabethe gains 1 stack that increases her CRIT Chance, up to 10 stacks.

SKILL_240101_DESC.ContentEN: Summons 1 [Yunchi]. A maximum of 2 [Yunchi] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_240102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Hydro Damage to nearby enemies. Grants Fushu an Ultra Shield and increases her ATK Speed. In addition, Fushu's nearby teammates also receive an Ultra Shield and gain [Nine-Needle Therapy].

SKILL_240103_DESC.ContentEN: Using a Combat Sill or Ultimate Skill (either it's Fushu or her nearby teammates) gains 1 stack that increases Skill Speed, up to 10 stacks. The remaining time of the effect is refreshed with each new stack gained.

SKILL_240104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases Skill Damage based on the number of [Yunchi] on the field.

SKILL_240191_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases Skill DMG for the character and their nearby teammate(s) when 2 or more characters in the team share the same element type.

SKILL_310001_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Pyro teammate(s).

SKILL_310003_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Pyro teammate(s).

SKILL_310101_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Pyro Damage to enemies in front and inflicts [Laceration].

SKILL_310102_DESC.ContentEN:
Switches the ranged weapon to [Hansel and Gretel]. In this state, Lynn can shoot and use skills, but cannot move.
Shooting deals damage to all enemies in front, during which Lynn gains 1 stack that increases Lynn's ATK Speed every 0.2s, up to 35 stacks.
Using [Hansel and Gretel] continuously consumes Sanity, during which Lynn is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. When Sanity drops to 0 or the skill is used again, sheathes [Hansel and Gretel].

SKILL_310103_DESC.ContentEN:
When not shooting, Lynn gains 1 stack of [Preload] per second, up to 6 stacks.
When shooting, consumes all stacks of [Preload] to gain [Suppressing Fire] for a period of time.
[Suppressing Fire]: Increases the damage based on the number of the consumed [Preload] stacks. 
Cannot gain [Preload] stack during [Suppressing Fire].

SKILL_310104_DESC.ContentEN: Immediately removes [Laceration] and deals damage once the [Lacerated Wound] count reaches its maximum.

SKILL_310201_DESC.ContentEN:
Commands all [Dirtexpellers] to continuously revolve around Hilda and fire [Hyperthermal Purgejets], during which the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers] pauses.
[Hyperthermal Purgejets] deal Pyro Damage to enemies, and defeating an enemy has a chance to restore Sanity for Hilda during the [Hyperthermal Purgejets] firing.

SKILL_310202_DESC.ContentEN:
Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and inflicts [Disarm] on them. For each target hit, summons 1 [Light Dirtexpeller] around Hilda and resets the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers].
Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] around. [Heavy Dirtexpellers] and [Light Dirtexpellers] automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage.
A maximum of 6 [Light Dirtexpellers] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_310203_DESC.ContentEN:
Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] that automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage.
When dodging, Hilda reloads her ranged weapon Magazine to maximum and gains [Elegant Anger] for a period of time.

SKILL_310204_DESC.ContentEN:
[Dirtexpeller] has a chance to fire 1 additional projectile, the probability equals to [30%+20%×Hilda's Ranged Weapon Multishot].
Increases the damage of [Hyperthermal Purgejet] by [30%+20%×Hilda's Ranged Weapon Multishot].

SKILL_310301_DESC.ContentEN: Drops a bomb named [Tot Popper], assuming the form of either [Tot Popper: Yale's Make] or [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. Upon landing, the bomb explodes after 2s, dealing Pyro Damage to enemies within a cross-shaped area and detonating any other [Tot Poppers] within range. A maximum of 10 [Tot Poppers] can exist at the same time.

SKILL_310302_DESC.ContentEN: Generates [Nightmare Lab] around Yale and Oliver. Using the skill again can close [Nightmare Lab] in advance.

SKILL_310303_DESC.ContentEN: When a [Tot Popper] is deployed, if it's no less than 2 metres above the ground, it deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies upon landing.

SKILL_310304_DESC.ContentEN:
Each time a [Tot Popper] is deployed, Yale and Oliver gains 1 stack of [Bombing Frenzy], up to 3 stacks.
[Bombing Frenzy]: Increases Skill Efficiency.

SKILL_320102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and taunts them.

SKILL_320103_DESC.ContentEN: Increases Max HP and continuously restores HP.

SKILL_320104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases damage dealt to enemies taunted by Hellfire.

SKILL_320201_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Pyro DMG to enemies in front and gains 1 stack of [Inebriation]. Tap repeatedly or hold the Attack button to unleash a flurry of attacks. Holding the button triggers [Burgundy Twirl], dealing Pyro DMG to nearby enemies and launching all [Spinblades].

SKILL_320202_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Pyro DMG to enemies in front and summons 8 [Spinblades] to orbit the user, dealing damage to enemies along their path.

SKILL_320203_DESC.ContentEN: Damage from [Spinblades] inflicts 1 stack of [Laceration], stacking up to 20 times.

SKILL_320204_DESC.ContentEN: Triggering [Laceration] grants 1 [Tipsy Mark]. Restores Sanity once every 20 Marks gained.

SKILL_330101_DESC.ContentEN: Attack enemies within range in front, dealing Pyro Damage and stunning them. When using this skill by holding, Margie makes a continuous attack.

SKILL_330102_DESC.ContentEN:
Casts 3 [Margie's Combustible Bins] forward. They immediately explode upon hitting any target or obstacle, dealing AoE Pyro Damage and consuming a certain stacks of [Jackpot!] for enhancement:
When consuming 3 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Increases the explosion range and damage.
When consuming 6 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Creates a Zealous Zone after the explosion, dealing Pyro Damage once every 2s to enemies within the zone.
When consuming 9 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Deals additional AoE Pyro Damage 2 times after the explosion.

SKILL_330103_DESC.ContentEN: When Margie or her nearby teammate(s) pick up any item, Margie gains 1 stack of [Jackpot!] that persists, which increases Margie's Skill Damage, up to 20 stacks.

SKILL_330104_DESC.ContentEN: Increases the ATK for nearby teammate(s).

SKILL_410001_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Electro teammate(s).

SKILL_410003_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and their nearby Electro teammate(s).

SKILL_410101_DESC.ContentEN:
Rhythm leaps forward, dealing Electro Damage to enemies along the path.
When the [Electric Energy] point is no less than 30, consumes 30 points to increase the leap speed and [Volt Rush]'s damage, and grants an effect that increases the damage dealt by Rhythm.

SKILL_410102_DESC.ContentEN:
Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range and enters [Electro Surge] state, during which it continuously consumes Sanity.
[Electro Surge] state ends when Sanity drops to 0 or when the skill is used again.

SKILL_410103_DESC.ContentEN: When consuming Sanity, converts a percentage of consumed Sanity into [Electric Energy]. The upper limit of [Electric Energy] is equal to the max Sanity.

SKILL_410104_DESC.ContentEN: When consuming [Electric Energy], converts 50% of the consumed [Electric Energy] into Sanity.

SKILL_410201_DESC.ContentEN:
Press: 
Zhiliu uses [Celestial Revelation: Zhen], dealing Electro Damage to enemies within range in front, which grants Zhiliu 1 [Talisman: Zhen].

Hold:
Zhiliu uses [Celestial Revelation: Xun], dealing Electro Damage to enemies within range in front, which grants Zhiliu Ultra Shield and 1 [Talisman: Xun].

SKILL_410202_DESC.ContentEN:
When Zhiliu has fewer than 2 [Talismans], deals Electro Damage to enemies within range. 
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans], this skill is replaced with another skill based on the type of [Talismans].

SKILL_410203_DESC.ContentEN:
Obtains [Talismans] through [Celestial Revelation], up to 2 [Talismans]. When the number of [Talismans] exceeds the limit, the earliest obtained [Talisman] will be removed.
When consuming [Talisman] after using [Thunder's Oracle Peal], [Myriad Things Thrive], or [Fortune's Clarity], each [Talisman] has a chance to be retained based on Zhiliu's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.

SKILL_410204_DESC.ContentEN: When Zhiliu or her nearby teammate(s) deal Electro Skill Damage, gains 1 stack that increases Morale, up to 12 stacks.

SKILL_420101_DESC.ContentEN:
Yuming leaps into the air, and the next Plunging Attack is replaced with [Starlight Descent]. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state grants Yuming 1 [Reverse Scale].
When the amount of [Reverse Scale] reaches its maxium, [Starlight Descent] is enhanced to [Starstorm Descent].

SKILL_420102_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to enemies in front and enters [Xuanjiao Manifest] state.

SKILL_420103_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing Skill Damage, inflicts 1 stack of [Thunderous Onslaught] on the target, up to 3 stacks.
[Thunderous Onslaught]: reduces Electro Resistance.

SKILL_420191_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases Morale for you and Electro teammates within range.

SKILL_420201_DESC.ContentEN:
Deploys a [Barrier] in front of Randy and deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.
[Barrier] consumes Sanity over time, during which Randy cannot move or use any weapon and is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. [Barrier] inflicts [Overwork Grudge] on nearby enemies.
When this skill is used again, the [Barrier] is retracted.

SKILL_420202_DESC.ContentEN:
Throws 1 [Bespoke Shield] forward, causing [Impact] 1 time when it halts. [Bespoke Shield] triggers [Impact] once every 3s when it's on the field.
[Impact] deals damage only against target's Shield based on Randy's DEF, and grants an Ultra Shield based on Randy's DEF to teammate(s) within range.
For targets with 0 Shield point, [Impact] paralyses them.

SKILL_420203_DESC.ContentEN: When Randy successfully grants an Ultra Shield to a teammate, applies 1 stack that increases their DEF based on Randy's DEF to them, up to 10 stacks.

SKILL_420204_DESC.ContentEN: Once [Barrier] has absorbed damage equivalent to 70% of Randy's Max HP, consumes Sanity to reset the [Barrier] and deals the same barrier deployment damage of [Legitimate Slackness] 1 time.

SKILL_430101_DESC.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range in front and creates a field of [Legion's Punishment] at the locations.

SKILL_430102_DESC.ContentEN:
Summons [Chaotic Thunderorb]. A maximum of 1 can exist at the same time. 
Consumes [Might of Thunder] to summon an enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb]. The interval for the enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb] to trigger [Devastating Storm] is reduced to 2s, and its Link Damage is increased.

SKILL_430103_DESC.ContentEN:
When the damage dealt triggers Bonus Effect, Sibylle gains certain points of [Might of Thunder], up to 300 points.
[Divine Conqueror] and [Stormcaller] can be empowered by consuming [Might of Thunder] points.

SKILL_430104_DESC.ContentEN: Damage dealt by [Divine Conqueror] and [Legion's Punishment] has a chance to trigger Bonus Effect based on Sibylle's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.

SKILL_510001_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and nearby Anemo teammates.

SKILL_510003_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases ATK for the character and nearby Anemo teammates.

SKILL_510101_DESC.ContentEN:
Commands [Filbert] to charge forwards, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacles, deals AoE Anemo Damage at the endpoint. When using this skill, heals Truffle and Filbert and her nearby teammates and increases their damage.
When Truffle rides on [Filbert], this skill is replaced with [Trotters Charge-Charge].

SKILL_510102_DESC.ContentEN:
Truffle rides on [Filbert] and gains 100 points of [Passion For Work] and a Movement Speed boost, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path when moving.
When riding on [Filbert], Truffle is unable to use any weapon but can command [Filbert] to attack. When this skill is used again, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

SKILL_510103_DESC.ContentEN:
Gains 1 stack of [Heavyweight] for every second Truffle keeps moving, up to 10 stacks.
[Heavyweight]: Increases Damage Dealt and decreases Damage Taken.

SKILL_510104_DESC.ContentEN: When dealing skill damage, there is a chance to drop 1 [Ammo Supply Chest].

SKILL_510191_DESC.ContentEN:
<H>[Only effective when deployed as a Combat Partner]</>
Increases Malaise for the character and nearby teammates when 2 or more characters in the team share the same element type.

SKILL_510201_DESC.ContentEN:
Enters [Stealth] state and exits [Relentless Hunt] state. 
Generates 2 [Fang Spikes] to attack nearby enemies when exiting [Stealth] state or using [Stealthy Prowl] again in [Stealth] state.

SKILL_510202_DESC.ContentEN:
Retracts all [Fang Spikes] and enters [Relentless Hunt] state.
For each [Fang Spike] retracted, Outsider loses certain HP, which is converted into an equivalent amount of Ultra Shield, and it additionally extends the duration of [Relentless Hunt] state.
When losing HP due to this effect, the minimum HP will not drop below 1.

SKILL_510203_DESC.ContentEN: When taking damage, Outsider generates 1 [Fang Spike] to attack the damage dealer. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

SKILL_510204_DESC.ContentEN: When not in [Relentless Hunt] state, there is a chance to generate 1 [Fang Spike] to attack the target while dealing damage with a melee weapon. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

SKILL_530101_DESC.ContentEN: Creates 1 [Phantasm] and then flashes forward. This skill can be used at any time without interrupting Psyche's current action. In [Flamboyance] state, this skill is replaced with [Phototaxis].

SKILL_530102_DESC.ContentEN:
Enters [Flamboyance] state and gains the ability to fly.
When in [Flamboyance] state, Psyche can only use skills and shoot. [Flamboyance] state continuously consumes Sanity, and when Sanity drops to 0 or this skill is used again, [Flamboyance] state ends.

When Psyche's HP percentage is above 15%, [Flamboyance] state consumes HP insteand of Sanity. The consumed HP will be converted into Ultra Shield at a certain percentage.

SKILL_530103_DESC.ContentEN:
When dealing CRIT damage, Psyche gains one of the following buffs at random: ATK Boost, Skill Damage Boost, or Malaise Boost.
Increases Psyche's damage for each buff she gains, up to 12 buffs.

SKILL_530104_DESC.ContentEN:
When using [Fluorescent Eclosion], if Psyche's HP percentage is no less than 75%, gains [Ephemeral as Dew].
[Ephemeral as Dew]: When triggering the effect of Morale/Malaise, it regards Psyche's HP percentage as 1%. This effect can only be triggered once every 120s.

SKILL_540101_DESC.ContentEN:
Daphne enters the [Emerald Effusion] state, during which an alchemical mist permeates the area around Daphne, continuously healing Daphne and the teammate(s) within range and decreasing the Movement Speed of the enemies in the mist.
During [Emerald Effusion] state, Daphne gains 2 [Azoth Projectiles] per second.

SKILL_540102_DESC.ContentEN:
Heals and applies [Purification Formula] to Daphne and the nearby teammate(s). Temporarily immobilises and inflicts 1 stack of [Decay Formula] on enemies around, up to 3 stacks.
Daphne gains [Azoth Projectiles] equal to the total number of affected teammates and enemies, up to 12 projectiles.

SKILL_540103_DESC.ContentEN:
Increases Daphne's Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability when she possesses [Azoth Projectile].
Daphne can hold up to 30 [Azoth Projectiles], and each ranged weapon attack consumes 1 [Azoth Projectile].

SKILL_540104_DESC.ContentEN: When Daphne possesses [Azoth Projectile] and her ranged weapon attack deals damage, target hit by the ranged weapon attack incurs the DoT of [Decay Formula] 1 time. The damage is based on a certain percentage of Daphne's Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability.

SKILL_DESC_1103SspCost.ContentEN: [Bestial Fury: Devotion] Immersion Cost per second

SKILL_DESC_1503Passive2LastTime.ContentEN: [Yet the Drifter Marks the Change] Duration

SKILL_DESC_1503Skill02Damage03Range.ContentEN: [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams] DMG Radius

SKILL_DESC_1503Skill02SpCost01.ContentEN: [Lightswords Slice Starry Streams] Sanity Cost Decrease

SKILL_DESC_1503Skill02SpCost03.ContentEN: [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams] Sanity Cost Decrease

SKILL_DESC_1503Skill02SpCostClose.ContentEN: [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams] Sanity Cost

SKILL_DESC_2101Skill02.ContentEN:
DMG Boost
per stack of [Poison of Love]

SKILL_DESC_3103DomainBuffRate.ContentEN: Explosion DMG Bonus per [Tot Popper] Detonated

SKILL_DESC_3202Skill01Buff02.ContentEN: +[Spinblade] Spin Speed & Launch Speed per [Inebriation] Stack

SKILL_DESC_5102Skill02BuffAdd.ContentEN: Each [Fang Spike] Extends [Relentless Hunt] Duration by

SKILL_DESC_5102Skill02Hp.ContentEN: HP Lost for Each [Fang Spike] Retracted

SKILL_TOAST_CommonFail.ContentEN: Prerequisite(s) not met to use skill

SURVIVALPRO_LONGPRESS_PC.ContentEN: Approach the Potion Station, hold &Interactive& to acquire the Serum

SURVIVALPRO_LONGPRESS_PHONE.ContentEN: Approach the Potion Station, hold the button to acquire the Serum

SkinGacha_Des_Normal.ContentEN: You are guaranteed a Purple- or higher-tier item within every <highlight>10</> Weaves, and a Golden-tier item is guaranteed within <highlight>90</> Weaves. Weave counts for the "%s" banner are tracked independently and do not carry over to other Myriad banners.

SkinGacha_Des_Special.ContentEN: You are guaranteed a Purple- or higher-tier item within every <highlight>10</> Weaves, and Iridescent Prism ×25 is guaranteed within <highlight>90</> Weaves.

SkinGacha_Warning_Normal.ContentEN:
<Title>Guaranteed Golden-tier Item</>
Current Weaves: <highlight>%d</>/90

<Title>Standard Myriad Drop Rates</>
The base drop rate per Weave for a Golden-tier item is <highlight>0.3%%</>. The overall rate, including guarantee, is <highlight>1.42%%</>. A Golden-tier item is guaranteed within <highlight>90</> Weaves. 
The drop rates for each item are as follows:
Tideborn Rhapsody: <highlight>0.427%%</>
Sunrise Scherzo: <highlight>0.427%%</>
Veils and Whispers: <highlight>0.285%%</>
Sunlit Gristmill: <highlight>0.285%%</>

The base drop rate per Weave for a Purple-tier item is <highlight>5.1%%</>. The overall rate, including guarantee, is <highlight>12.46%%</>. A Purple-tier item is guaranteed within <highlight>10</> Weaves;
When the guarantee triggers, the chance of receiving a Purple-tier item is <highlight>99.7%%</>, and a Golden-tier item is <highlight>0.3%%</>.
In cases involving rate-ups or guarantees, please refer to the specific banner rules.

<Title>About Duplicates</>

On obtaining a skin you already own, it converts into Lucent Prism:
Each duplicate Golden-tier character skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>60</>.
Each duplicate Golden-tier weapon skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>40</>.
Each duplicate Purple-tier skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>4</>.
Each duplicate Blue-tier skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>1</>.

<Title>About Pity System</>
The count of Weaves for the <highlight> Starlight Rondo</> is tallied separately and does not carry over to other Myriad banners.

SkinGacha_Warning_Special.ContentEN:
<Title>Guaranteed Golden-tier Item</>
Current Weaves: <highlight>%d</>/90

<Title>Event-Exclusive Myriad Drop Rates</>
The base drop rate per Weave for a Golden-tier item is <highlight>0.3%%</>. The overall drop rate, including guarantee, is <highlight>1.42%%</>. A Golden-tier item is guaranteed within <highlight>90</> Weaves. 
The drop rates for each item are as follows:
Minuet Reverie：<highlight>0.641%%</>
Iridescent Prism × 25: <highlight>0.641%%</>
Iridescent Prism × 50：<highlight>0.142%%</>

The base drop rate per Weave for a Purple-tier item is <highlight>5.1%%</>. The overall drop rate, including guarantee, is <highlight>12.46%%</>. A Purple-tier item is guaranteed within <highlight>10</> Weaves.
When the guarantee triggers, the chance of receiving a Purple-tier item is <highlight>99.7%%</>, and a Golden- or higher-tier item is <highlight>0.3%%</>.
In cases involving rate-ups or guarantees, please refer to the specific banner rules.

<Title>About Duplicates</>
On obtaining a Golden-tier skin: Minuet Reverie you already own, it converts into Iridescent Prism ×<highlight>25</>.
On obtaining other skins you already own, they convert to Lucent Prism:
Each duplicate Purple-tier skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>4</>.
Each duplicate Blue-tier skin converts to Lucent Prism ×<highlight>1</>.

<Title>About Pity System</>
The count of Weaves for the <highlight>Summer Dreams Aflutter</> is tallied separately and does not carry over to other Myriad banners.

StarterQuest_Des_102001_8_2.ContentEN: Complete "Classic Repertoire Act Ⅴ" in Immersive Theatre

StarterQuest_Des_102001_9_3.ContentEN: Enhance at least 10 different Purple-tier or better Demon Wedges to Lv. 5 (duplicates do not count)

System_Des_Achievement.ContentEN: <Highlight>Achievements</> is now unlocked. A testament to our endeavours.

System_Des_Archive.ContentEN: <Highlight>Archive</> is now unlocked — a showcase of your adventures and the stories they tell.

System_Des_Armory.ContentEN: <Highlight>Armoury</> is now unlocked. Set up your loadouts and prepare for more challenges ahead.

System_Des_Bag.ContentEN: <Highlight>Inventory</> is now unlocked. You can view all the items you possess there.

System_Des_BattlePass.ContentEN: <Highlight>Bard's Tome</> is now unlocked. Share your adventures with Lirico to help complete her ballad collection!

System_Des_BattleWheel.ContentEN: <Highlight>Tactical Backpack</> is now unlocked. Make good preparations for any imminent battles.

System_Des_CardLevel.ContentEN: <Highlight>Introns</> is now unlocked. Trace back to the origins and unlock more Trait.

System_Des_Chat.ContentEN: <Highlight>Chat</> system is now unlocked. Time to catch up with a friend.

System_Des_DailyGoal.ContentEN: <Highlight>Memo</> is now unlocked. Achieve your goals and rise to new heights!

System_Des_Dispatch.ContentEN: <Highlight>Expedition</> is now unlocked — dispatch companions to handle tasks and collect resources.

System_Des_Enterntainment.ContentEN: <Highlight>Ripples of Talk</> is now unlocked. It's always a delight to spend some quality time with a companion.

System_Des_ExploreBadgeShop.ContentEN: <Highlight>Lunoxplorer's Gift</> is now unlocked. Trade your discoveries for extra supplies!

System_Des_Forging.ContentEN: <Highlight>Forge</> is now unlocked. Try crafting more powerful weapons and useful items.

System_Des_Friend.ContentEN: <Highlight>Friends</> is now unlocked. Join hands with friends for an adventure across the land of Atlasia.

System_Des_Gacha.ContentEN: <H>Myriad</> is now unlocked. A glimpse through the prism; a world remade in every hue.

System_Des_GameEvent.ContentEN: <Highlight>Events</> is now unlocked. Check it regularly so you won't miss out.

System_Des_GuideBook.ContentEN: <Highlight>Tutorials</> is now unlocked. You can revisit the tutorials you have missed or forgotten here.

System_Des_HardBoss.ContentEN: <Highlight>Nocturnal Echoes</> is now unlocked. Face the enemies from your past — what doesn't break you makes you stronger.

System_Des_Invite.ContentEN: <Highlight>Invite</> is now unlocked. In your downtime, why not invite a friend over for a chat?

System_Des_Mail.ContentEN: <Highlight>Mailbox</> is now unlocked. Let's see who's thinking of you today~

System_Des_Map.ContentEN: <Highlight>Map and Teleport</> are now unlocked. Summon the Avian Spirit to record the Avian Towers to revisit these places in a flash.

System_Des_Match.ContentEN: <Highlight>Match</> is now unlocked. Join forces to defeat powerful enemies.

System_Des_Mod.ContentEN: <Highlight>Demon Wedges</> is now unlocked. Strategically equip various Demon Wedges to greatly empower your characters and weapons.

System_Des_ModArchive.ContentEN: <Highlight>Demon Wedge Casket</> unlocked — track your Demon Wedges and discover synergy tips to optimise your combat build.

System_Des_ModDungeon.ContentEN: <Highlight>Noctoyager Manual</> is now unlocked — a key source of Demon Wedges.

System_Des_Notice.ContentEN: <Highlight>Notices</> is now unlocked. For the latest game updates, this is the place to check.

System_Des_Pet.ContentEN: <Highlight>Geniemons</> is now unlocked. Embark on an adventure with these marvellous creatures!

System_Des_PhotoCamera.ContentEN: <Highlight>Camera</> is now unlocked. Capture every memorable moment so it will last forever.

System_Des_Play.ContentEN: <Highlight>Commissions</> is now unlocked. Complete more commissions to become an excellent Phoxhunter.

System_Des_Polarity.ContentEN: <Highlight>Track Adjustment</> is now unlocked. Time to maximise the potential of your Demon Wedges.

System_Des_Quest.ContentEN: <Highlight>Quests</> is now unlocked, where you can check all your ongoing quests.

System_Des_Rouge.ContentEN: <Highlight>Mystic Maze</> is now unlocked. Step into the tangled pathways of time — explore, fight, and grow stronger.

System_Des_Shop.ContentEN: <Highlight>Shop</> is now unlocked. Go stock up on supplies for unexpected needs.

System_Des_Skill.ContentEN: <Highlight>Skills</> is now unlocked. Time to empower your characters greatly.

System_Des_StarterQuest.ContentEN: <Highlight>Beginner's Guide</> is now unlocked. Complete Ms Camilla's commissions to earn reputation in Icelake!

System_Des_SwitchMaster.ContentEN: The <Highlight>Protagonist Switch</> function is now unlocked. You can now set the protagonist as your playable character.

System_Des_Temple.ContentEN: <Highlight>Avian Spirit Trials</> is now unlocked. Delve into the realm of dreams and face the trials ahead.

System_Des_Uweapon.ContentEN: <Highlight>Consonance Weapons</> is now unlocked. Time to empower your characters greatly.

System_Des_WalnutBag.ContentEN: <Highlight>Covert Commissions</> is now unlocked — take on covert assignments to earn generous rewards.

System_Des_Wiki.ContentEN: <Highlight>Atlasium</> is now unlocked — a comprehensive compendium of characters, customs, and civilisations.

TARGET_DUNGEON_102.ContentEN: Prepare the serum to complete the commission

TARGET_DUNGEON_104.ContentEN: Head to the Evacuation Point now!

TARGET_DUNGEON_Abyss_Boss.ContentEN: Head to the Final Trial and defeat the high-threat enemy

TARGET_DUNGEON_Abyss_Interact.ContentEN: Crack the mechanism to start the Trial

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_103.ContentEN: Catch up to and defeat the designated target.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_104.ContentEN: Approach the target and hold the interaction key <Highlight>within the time limit</> to complete the capture.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_105.ContentEN: Then, go to the Evacuation Point to complete the commission.

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_106.ContentEN: The target is about to break free

TARGET_DUNGEON_CAPTURE_107.ContentEN: Commission fails if the target manages to make their escape.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_108.ContentEN: Protect <Highlight>Lunoxplorer</> from the <Highlight>three waves</> of enemy attacks. The commission fails if the device she's inspecting is destroyed.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_109.ContentEN: You can choose to evacuate after every three waves or continue.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_110.ContentEN: Protect <H>Lunoxplorer</> before the countdown ends. The Commission fails if the device she's inspecting is destroyed.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_111.ContentEN: After successfully defending Lunoxplorer for a period of time, you can choose to retreat or continue.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_112.ContentEN: Protect <Highlight>Lunoxplorer</> from the <Highlight>three waves</> of enemy attacks. The commission fails if the device she's inspecting is destroyed.

TARGET_DUNGEON_DEFENCE_113.ContentEN: You can choose to evacuate after every three waves or continue.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_102.ContentEN: Continue to activate the Excavator and collect modules to keep it running

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_104.ContentEN: Go activate the Excavators. <Highlight>Three</> Excavators can be activated in each round. Excavators with different levels have different excavation efficiency.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_105.ContentEN: Excavators require <Highlight>Excavator Modules</> to run, which can be obtained by <Highlight>defeating</> certain monsters.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_106.ContentEN: After collecting an Excavator Module, approach an Excavator for automatic installation.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_107.ContentEN: Keep an eye on the <Highlight>excavation progress</> and the remaining number of Excavator Modules. Safeguard the Excavators to ensure their uninterrupted operation.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_108.ContentEN: Excavators dispense <Highlight>Coins</> during excavation. The commission is completed after three Excavators have been activated and at least one of them reaches full excavation progress.

TARGET_DUNGEON_EXCAVATION_109.ContentEN: Completing an Excavation commission allows for a choice between retreating or continuing to activate new Excavators for more Coins.

TARGET_DUNGEON_RESCUE_102.ContentEN: Find the cell that's holding the target

TARGET_DUNGEON_RESCUE_103.ContentEN: Escort the target to the Evacuation Point

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_103.ContentEN: Head to the next level of the Abyss

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_109.ContentEN: Head to the next level of the Abyss

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_109_Sub.ContentEN:
Optional: Make a trade with the Mysterious Merchant
Optional: Get supplies from the Avian Spirit

TARGET_DUNGEON_RougeLike_111.ContentEN: Interact with the campfire to see the flickering reflection

TERMEXP_1103_Combo.ContentEN: Grants a certain amount of [Immersion]. This effect can only be triggered once every 0.1 seconds.

TERMEXP_1103_Finish.ContentEN: Increases Phantasio's damage based on the target's [Adagio] stacks, then removes all [Adagio] stacks. When there are 10 [Adagio] stacks on the target, restores Phantasio's Sanity and grants a certain amount of [Immersion]. This effect can only be triggered once every attack.

TERMEXP_1103_HyperForm.ContentEN:
When in [Bestial Fury: Devotion] state, continuously consumes [Immersion] instead of Sanity to maintain the [Bestial Fury] state and increases Movement Speed, Skill Speed and ATK based on Phantasio's Max Sanity.
When in [Bestial Fury: Devotion] state, Phantasio cannot gain [Immersion] per second through [Bestial Fury] state.

TERMEXP_1103_Skill01.ContentEN:
Dashes forward, dealing Umbro Damage to enemies along the path, and gains [Presto].
[Presto]: Increases Skill Range and grants immunity to Hitstun.

TERMEXP_1501_Buff01.ContentEN: Grants immunity to Hitstun and reduces Damage Taken.

TERMEXP_1502_Skill01.ContentEN:
Summons [Lunar Hunt] and replaces this skill with [Solar Eclipse]. 
[Lunar Hunt]: Deals Umbro Damage to all enemies within range when summoned and reduces their Movement Speed.

TERMEXP_1503_Skill02.ContentEN: Ends [Aspect Manifestation] state and deals Lumino Damage to enemies in front.

TERMEXP_1503_Skill02_01.ContentEN:
Inherits all stats from Kezhou's melee weapon and gains increased Attack Range.
[Phanosword] has Normal Attack modes for Sword, Greatsword, Polearm, and Dual Blades. After executing the final hit of [Phanosword], it switches to a random attack mode and launches all [Phanoplumes].

TERMEXP_1503_Skill02_02.ContentEN:
Kezhou can have a maximum of 7 [Phanoplumes] at the same time. When launched, each [Phanoplume] selects a random enemy to orbit and homes towards them to attack, dealing Lumino Damage to enemies along the path. After attacking the enemy 4 times, the [Phanoplume] dissipates.

Targets hit by [Phanoplume] take additional damage, which is equivalent to a certain percentage of the DoT of Bonus Effect: Lumino multiplied by Kezhou's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.

TERMEXP_1801_Skill02.ContentEN:
Generates an elemental field that corresponds to the element type of the [Tea Party Guests], with [Nightingale] for Hydro, [Hound] for Pyro, [Unicorn] for Electro, and [Butterfly] for Anemo.

When [Boisterous Tea Party] starts, grants Fina and all her nearby teammates the ability to deal additional elemental damage based on the element type of the field. In addition, the [Boisterous Tea Party] field deals corresponding elemental damage to enemies within range once every 2 seconds.

TERMEXP_2101_Dot.ContentEN:
Deals Hydro Damage once every 2s.
When defeated, enemies inflicted with [Poison of Love] transfer their [Poison of Love] to nearby enemies based on the current stack count and remaining duration.

TERMEXP_2101_Summon.ContentEN: Inherits 100% of Rebecca's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies.

TERMEXP_2301_Summon.ContentEN: Inherits 100% of Tabethe's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies and capturing up to 2 enemies to immobilise them.

TERMEXP_2401_Skill02Buff.ContentEN: Increases Skill Damage by a percentage of [Fushu]'s Skill Damage.

TERMEXP_2401_Summon.ContentEN:
Inherits 100% of Fushu's stats and deals Hydro Damage to the nearest 5 enemies once every second.
[Yunchi] restores HP and Sanity for nearby teammates once every 3s.

TERMEXP_3101_Debuff.ContentEN:
When under the influence of [Laceration], every time the enemy takes ranged weapon damage from [Lynn], the [Lacerated Wound] count is increased by 1.
When the [Laceration] duration ends, deals Pyro Damage equivalent to [Lacerated Wound] count × [Laceration] DMG to the enemy once.

TERMEXP_3102_Buff.ContentEN: Increases the ATK Speed of [Dirtexpeller], the Rotation Speed of [Pyrolytic Cleaning] and the ATK Speed of ranged weapons.

TERMEXP_3103_Skill02.ContentEN:
When in the area of [Nightmare Lab]:
The Movement Speed of enemies within range is decreased.
The detonation timers of [Tot Poppers] on the ground are paused, and they won't be detonated by other [Tot Poppers].

When [Nightmare Lab] closes:
Detonates all [Tot Poppers] within range and the lab explodes to deal Pyro Damage to the enemies within range. For each [Tot Popper] detonated, increases the explosion damage of [Nightmare Lab] and restores Sanity for Yale and Oliver.

TERMEXP_3103_Summon01.ContentEN: When dealing damage, causes greater Stance reduction to the target(s). The greater the difference between Yale and Oliver's Skill Range and the Skill Damage provided by equipped Demon Wedges, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Yale's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Yale's Make].

TERMEXP_3103_Summon02.ContentEN: Deals higher damage. The greater the difference between Yale and Oliver's Skill Damage and the Skill Range provided by equipped Demon Wedges, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make].

TERMEXP_3201_Skill01.ContentEN:
Deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.
If Hellfire takes damage during [Retribution], extends the state duration and deals [Puncture Retribution] Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.

TERMEXP_3202_Passive01.ContentEN: All weapon and skill damage (excluding [Spinblades] and [Laceration]) detonates 2 stacks of [Laceration], dealing bonus elemental damage. Max 20 detonations per second.

TERMEXP_3202_Skill01.ContentEN: Gains increased Skill Speed. [Spinblades] spin faster and their duration is paused. Gains immunity to Hitstun. All [Inebriation] stacks are removed when [Burgundy Flurry] ends.

TERMEXP_3202_Skill02.ContentEN: Each [Spinblade] completes one orbit around the character every 2s. When launched, it travels up to 25m at 15 m/s before returning. If struck by [Burgundy Twirl] while returning, it redirects toward a random enemy within 20m. Each launch refreshes its speed based on [Inebriation] stacks. A maximum of 8 [Spinblades] can exist at once.

TERMEXP_4101_Skill02_01.ContentEN: Increases Movement Speed for Rhythm and her nearby teammate(s). Deals Electro Damage to 1 random enemy within range per second and alternately inflicts [Positive Charge] and [Negative Charge] on them, prioritizing enemies without [Electric Charge].

TERMEXP_4101_Skill02_02.ContentEN:
Target with [Positive Charge] selects 1 random target with [Negative Charge] within range every 3s, both being pulled towards the midpoint between their positions and taking Electro Damage. If no [Negative Charge] targets are around, selects 1 random target to take Electro Damage together. 
When a target with [Electric Charge] is inflicted with the same charge type again, the duration of the [Electric Charge] on them is refreshed, and they cannot be applied with the opposite [Electric Charge] type.

TERMEXP_4102_Skill02_01.ContentEN:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Zhen], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Thunder's Oracle Peal]. 
[Thunder's Oracle Peal]: Consumes all [Talismans], dealing Electro Damage to enemies in a straight line ahead.

TERMEXP_4102_Skill02_02.ContentEN:
When Zhiliu has 1 [Talisman: Zhen] and 1 [Talisman: Xun], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Myriad Things Thrive].
[Myriad Things Thrive]: Consumes all [Talismans], dealing periodic damage to enemies within range in front, then creates a [Four Realms Align] field at the location.
[Four Realms Align]: Selects several enemies within range every 3s and inflicts 1 strike of [Zhen-Xun Convergence] on them.
[Zhen-Xun Convergence]: Deals AoE Electro Damage.

TERMEXP_4102_Skill02_03.ContentEN:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Xun], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Fortune's Clarity].
[Fortune's Clarity]: Consumes all [Talismans] to deal Electro Damage to enemies around and increase Zhiliu's Skill Damage.

TERMEXP_4201_BonusAttack.ContentEN: Unleashes 5 strikes of [Raging Thunder] at the location of the target attacked by [Starlight Descent] or [Starstorm Descent], dealing AoE Electro Damage, with priority given to different target locations.

TERMEXP_4201_FallAttack.ContentEN: Plunges at high speed, dealing AoE Electro Damage on impact. This attack is regarded as a melee weapon Plunging Attack. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state triggers [Wyrmcall Clouds].

TERMEXP_4201_Marks.ContentEN: Reverse Scale persists, with a maximum of 6 scales existing at the same time. The scales are removed when the [Xuanjiao Manifest] state ends.

TERMEXP_4201_Skill2Buff.ContentEN: When dealing Skill DMG to a target afflicted with [Thunderous Onslaught], deals bonus Electro Damage. Can trigger on the same target once every 3s.

TERMEXP_4201_Summon.ContentEN:
Grants immunity to Hitstun when taking damage. Xuanjiao hovers around Yuming, dealing Electro Damage to enemies on contact. Can only deal damage to the same target once every 2s.
After Yuming or his nearby teammates consume Sanity to use a skill, the next time they deal Skill Damage unleashes 1 strike of [Fish-Dragon Dance] at the location of the target, dealing AoE Electro Damage. This effect can only be triggered once every 2s.
Xuanjiao absorbs the damage dealt to Yuming's HP. When the absorbed damage reaches a percentage of Yuming's Max HP, the [Xuanjiao Manifest] state ends.

TERMEXP_4201_SuperFallAttack.ContentEN:
Consumes all [Reverse Scales] to increase Skill Damage for Yuming and the nearby teammate(s).
Then Yuming plunges at high speed, dealing AoE Electro Damage on impact. This attack is regarded as a melee weapon Plunging Attack. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state triggers [Wyrmcall Clouds].

TERMEXP_4202_Skill01.ContentEN: [Barrier] blocks frontal projectiles and absorbs their damage, and expires once it has absorbed damage equivalent to 100% of Randy's Max HP.

TERMEXP_4202_Skill01Buff.ContentEN: Decreases ATK, and deals Electro Damage once every 2s.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill01.ContentEN:
When created and after a 1.5s delay, [Legion's Punishment] consumes a certain amount of [Might of Thunder] every 0.4s to deal Electro Damage to 1 random enemy within range, lasting up to 10s.
When [Might of Thunder] drops to 0, the [Legion's Punishment] field dissipates. A maximum of 5 [Legion's Punishment] fields can exist at the same time.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill02.ContentEN:
Inherits a certain percentage of Sibylle's Max HP with 0 DEF, and is considered an enemy unit.
Once summoned, [Chaotic Thunderorb] calls forth [Devastating Storm] once every 3s and links to the furthest 5 enemies within range. It links 1 more enemy per second, up to 10 enemies, dealing Electro Damage to the linked targets once per second.
When [Chaotic Thunderorb] takes damage, it transfers the damage taken to the linked targets at a certain percentage.

TERMEXP_4301_Skill02Damage.ContentEN: Deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.

TERMEXP_5101_Skill01.ContentEN: Hold for a sustained charge, continuously consuming Sanity and dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacle, Filbert stops charging, dealing AoE Anemo Damage at the endpoint.

TERMEXP_5101_Skill02_Value.ContentEN: [Passion For Work] loses 5 point per second, and restores 1 when dealing damage upon knocking into a target. During [Trotters Charge-Charge], [Passion For Work] will not lose. When all [Passion For Work] points drop to 0, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

TERMEXP_5102_Skill01.ContentEN:
When in [Stealth] state, Outsider cannot be detected by enemies, and taking damage will not exit [Stealth].
Launching attack or using [Predator's Pounce] will exit [Stealth] state.

TERMEXP_5102_Skill02.ContentEN:
When in [Relentless Hunt] state, Outsider is immune to Hitstun and gains weapon Attack Speed boost and Malaise boost.
Outsider cannot receive Healing in this state, and any Healing received is converted into an equivalent amount of Ultra Shield.

TERMEXP_5102_Skill03.ContentEN:
When generated, [Fang Spike] flies toward its target, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies along the path and infilcting [Throatcutter] on them.
After flying for a period of time, [Fang Spike] falls and remains on the ground. A maximum of 10 [Fang Spikes] can exist at the same time.
[Throatcutter]: increases damage taken from Outsider.

TERMEXP_5301_Skill01.ContentEN: Charges forward in the air and releases 16 [Ethereal Powders]. The [Ethereal Powders] automatically lock onto 1 enemy, dealing Anemo Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Powder Stigma], up to 12 stacks.

TERMEXP_5301_Skill01Mark.ContentEN: When a target inflicted with [Powder Stigma] takes CRIT Damage from [Psyche], 1 stack of [Powder Stigma] is consumed to deal Anemo Damage to the target.

TERMEXP_5301_Summon.ContentEN:
Once created, the Phantasm continuously slows down nearby enemies. After 5 seconds, it deals Anemo Damage to nearby enemies and vanishes. 
When a new [Phantasm] is created, the existing [Phantasm] immediately deals Anemo Damage and vanishes.

TERMEXP_5401_Debuff.ContentEN: Decreases Attack and deals periodic Anemo Damage to affected targets once every 2s.

TERMEXP_Common_AdditionalDmg.ContentEN: Upon dealing damage, inflicts additional damage 1 time based on the original damage.

TERMEXP_Common_OverES.ContentEN: An additional shield that stacks independently. The Ultra Shield has a cap of 425+75×Character Level.

TERMEXP_Common_SkillSpeed.ContentEN: Determines how quickly skills are executed.

TERMEXP_Common_Taunt.ContentEN: Forces the target to focus its aggression on you.

TERMEXP_Rou_10101_MoltenBlaze.ContentEN: Increases target's Damage Taken by <Highlight>2.5%</> for <Highlight>5</>s, stacking up to <Highlight>10</> times.

TERMEXP_Rou_10101_MoltenBlazeSabre.ContentEN: Deals damage equal to <Highlight>563%</> of Character ATK.

TERMEXP_Rou_10102_MiniSeaborneMoons.ContentEN: [Mini Seaborne Moons] are considered loot. Picking one up restores HP, Sanity, and ammo.

TERMEXP_Rou_10102_PhantomDrift.ContentEN: Increases Ranged Weapon DMG by <Highlight>6%</> for <Highlight>15</>s, up to <Highlight>10</> stacks.

TERMEXP_Rou_10102_SeaborneMoon.ContentEN: Deals AoE Damage equal to <Highlight>1350%</> of Character ATK and summons <Highlight>3</> [Mini Seaborne Moons].

TERMEXP_Rou_10102_Stinger.ContentEN: Deals AoE Damage equal to <Highlight>270%</> of Character ATK on hit.

TERMEXP_Rou_10102_VeiledMoon.ContentEN: A special resource. You can hold up to <Highlight>6</>. Dealing Ranged Weapon DMG consumes 1 [Veiled Moon] to fire a [Stinger], which deals AoE Damage equal to <Highlight>270%</> of Character ATK on hit.

TERMEXP_Rou_10103_Emission.ContentEN: Deals Skill DMG equal to <Highlight>810%</> of Character ATK to enemies within <Highlight>6 </>m.

TERMEXP_Rou_10103_Radiance.ContentEN: While active, increases Skill DMG by <Highlight>50%</>.

TERMEXP_Rou_10104_GlowingTree.ContentEN: Heals nearby allies within <Highlight>10</>m for <Highlight>5%</> of their Max HP per second. Lasts <Highlight>10</>s. Only 1 may be active on the battlefield at a time.

TERMEXP_Rou_10104_Lumileaf.ContentEN: Explodes when an enemy enters within <Highlight>3</>m, dealing damage equal to <Highlight>1000%</> of ATK. Lasts <Highlight>10</>s. Up to 10 can exist on the battlefield at once.

TERMEXP_Rou_10104_Lumiseed.ContentEN: Explodes when an enemy enters within <Highlight>3</>m, dealing damage equal to <Highlight>600%</> of ATK. Lasts <Highlight>10</>s. Up to 10 can exist on the battlefield at once.

TERMEXP_Rou_10105_BladeWings.ContentEN: Large homing projectiles that weaken Stance more effectively.

TERMEXP_Rou_10105_Nocturne.ContentEN: Each stack increases Movement Speed by <Highlight>1%</> for <Highlight>20</>s, up to <Highlight>60</> stacks.

TERMEXP_Rou_10105_Powder.ContentEN: Deals damage once every second to enemies within <Highlight>4</>m.

TERMEXP_Rou_10106_Glimmerfly.ContentEN: Lasts <Highlight>30</>s. Max <Highlight>3</> can be carried. After locking onto a target, homes in and deals damage equal to <Highlight>300%</> of Character ATK on hit.

TERMEXP_Rou_10106_LargerGlimmerfly.ContentEN: Deals AoE Damage equal to <Highlight>700%</> of Character ATK within <Highlight>4</>m.

TERMEXP_Rou_Treasure_10310_Swordwave.ContentEN: A fast-moving blade wave that flies in a straight line, dealing damage to enemies it hits.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_LEAVETEAM.ContentEN: Someone has left the team. Commission cancelled.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_REJECT.ContentEN: Someone has declined the Commission. Commission cancelled.

TOAST_DUNGEON_CANCEL_UNABLE.ContentEN: Commission cancelled: One or more teammates are currently unable to join the commission

TOAST_DUNGEON_FAIL_ENERGY.ContentEN: Commission start failed: Insufficient Sanergy of teammate(s) (<H>%s</>)

TOAST_DUNGEON_FAIL_UNABLE.ContentEN: Commission start failed: One or more teammates are currently unable to join the commission

TOAST_PENALIZEINVALID.ContentEN: Cannot use Ask's Retribution at this location

TOAST_PHANTOM_ZERO.ContentEN: Combat Partner Revival attempts used up

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100003.ContentEN: The stage‑curtain scrap points to the Galea Theatre, and the assailant's eerie operatic humming reinforces the link. The theatre merits a thorough search.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100004.ContentEN: The assailant fled southwest — and the only facility in that direction with significant Phoxichor stores is the local factory. It merits a thorough search.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100005.ContentEN: The assailant's hideout was decorated with stage props, and during the attack, they hummed an operatic tune. These clues suggest they may be an opera enthusiast. The melody itself might hold the key to their identity.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100101.ContentEN: Based on the moon's position at the time of the incident, the attack is estimated to have taken place between 4 and 5 in the morning.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100201.ContentEN: The freshly broken vane probably snapped when the assailant landed on the roof. Together with other clues, it may provide more information.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100202.ContentEN: The vane's base is bent toward the southwest. Together with other clues, it may provide more information.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100203.ContentEN:
The break pattern of the vane and its base align perfectly, indicating it was dislodged during the assailant's rooftop escape.
The assembled vane points southwest — confirming the direction of flight.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100301.ContentEN: That night, the assailant hummed an operatic tune in a rasping voice. Could they be a singer, or simply a music lover?

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100302.ContentEN: A scrap of velvet stage curtain was found at the crime scene — identical to the kind used at the Galea Theatre. Could this point to the theatre's involvement? More evidence is needed to confirm the link.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100303.ContentEN: The stage‑curtain scrap points to the Galea Theatre, and the assailant's operatic humming reinforces the link. The theatre merits a thorough search.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100401.ContentEN: The assailant fled southwest — an area dense with homes, schools, and a factory. Rhythm's investigation has stalled, as the area is too broad without further leads. More clues are needed to narrow the search.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100402.ContentEN: Phoxichor traces were discovered in the snow near the crime scene. However, no leaks have been reported from nearby facilities. Better consult Rhythm about the details of the case to gather more clues.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100403.ContentEN: You recall a pungent scent clinging to the assailant — clear evidence of heavy Phoxichor contamination. Very few sites in Icelake could account for such levels. Cross-reference with other clues to narrow it down.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100404.ContentEN: The assailant fled southwest — and the only facility in that direction with significant Phoxichor stores is the local factory. Could it be their hideout? It merits a thorough search.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100501.ContentEN: In the sewers, you found velvet curtains and mannequins posed like actors mid-performance. Whoever staged this scene possibly sees themselves as part of a performance. Cross-reference with other clues — it may reveal who they truly are.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100502.ContentEN: That night, the assailant hummed an operatic tune in a rasping voice. Could they be a singer, or simply a music lover?

TextMap_AnswerDetail_100503.ContentEN: The assailant's hideout was decorated with stage props, and during the attack, they hummed an operatic tune. These clues suggest they may be an opera enthusiast. The melody itself might hold the key to their identity.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200101.ContentEN: Mr Buck only drinks juice and milk at The Asphodel. He has no tolerance for alcohol — just one sip is enough to knock him straight out.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200102.ContentEN: Someone secretly laced Mr Buck's milk with alcohol — clearly intending to knock him out. A sticky, child-sized handprint remains visible on the jug.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200103.ContentEN: A trail of small footprints leads from the street to Mr Buck's windowsill — clear signs that a child broke in and did something inside.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200104.ContentEN: A few pieces of popcorn lie scattered near the footprints — likely stuck to the intruder and shaken loose as they climbed in through the window.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200105.ContentEN: A shivering Charon boy hawking beer, popcorn, opera tickets, and posters near the Galea Theatre's ticket booth.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200106.ContentEN: One particular child, knowing Buck couldn't handle alcohol, slipped into his home and laced his milk — just enough to knock him out. That's why Buck has been falling asleep unusually early.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200107.ContentEN: A drunk man slumped next to the bin, reeking of alcohol. He doesn't match the profile of a child, nor does he seem the type to give his drink away.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200108.ContentEN:
A little girl who keeps pestering her strict father for popcorn.
While she fits the profile of a child, it's clear the popcorn beneath Buck's window didn't come from her.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200201.ContentEN: Sixteen years ago, Donat's friend Sig orchestrated a kidnapping. The victim, Enola, died unexpectedly during the incident. Sig was sentenced to death.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200202.ContentEN: Once a Phoxhunter serving in the Escort, Giselle resigned sixteen years ago after a case verdict brought her into conflict with her superior.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200203.ContentEN: Violet, Sig's sister, left Icelake sixteen years ago. Now, it seems she has returned — a violet ribbon was found on Sig's grave, almost certainly left by her.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200204.ContentEN: In every performance, Violetta wears a violet ribbon — a keepsake, she says, from a dear friend. It's become her signature.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200205.ContentEN: Rosalind, daughter of Earl Magnus, has gone missing — presumed kidnapped. Her parents had recently hired her a vocal coach.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200206.ContentEN: One of Violetta's students has been kidnapped. The ransom letter makes cryptic reference to events from sixteen years ago.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200207.ContentEN: Sixteen years ago, Giselle was part of the team investigating the kidnapping case. The verdict disturbed her so profoundly, she chose to resign from the Escort.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200208.ContentEN: The violet ribbons are identical in both hue and style. Combined with their near-matching names, it's clear that Violetta and Violet share a close connection.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200209.ContentEN: It's highly likely that Violetta's missing student is Rosalind, daughter of Earl Magnus. The ransom letter's nod to events from sixteen years ago hints at a deeper connection to Violetta herself.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200210.ContentEN: Rosalind's abduction is clearly linked to the kidnapping case from sixteen years past — and Violetta knows exactly what happened back then.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200211.ContentEN: The old case concealed truths Violetta had long known. Giselle staged the recent "kidnapping" of her student to force those truths into the open.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200301.ContentEN: A cluster of Sky Lilies rests on the windowsill, their petals still damp with morning dew — someone must have placed them there recently.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200302.ContentEN: This quiet corner of EverSpring remains untouched. No footprints but Lingling's... nothing out of place at all.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200303.ContentEN: Found near the doorway, the album is filled with family snapshots. In one, a younger Lingling holds a bunch of Sky Lilies, smiling beside Nana — right outside this very home.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200304.ContentEN: A letter explaining that Lingling's parents brought her back from Haojing to Mistwharf for work — temporarily staying in the old workers' dorm they once called home.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200305.ContentEN: Someone left behind the bouquet without leaving a single trace.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200306.ContentEN: The "ghost" knew this humble little house well... and cherished the album. Perhaps they were once part of this family.

TextMap_AnswerDetail_200307.ContentEN: The Sky Lily bouquet, the photo album, the way they knew the house — everything points to the return of someone dearly missed.

TextMap_AnswerName_100005.ContentEN: Operatic Melody Heard during the Attack

TextMap_AnswerName_100101.ContentEN: Estimated Time of Attack — 4 to 5 a.m.

TextMap_AnswerName_100203.ContentEN: Assembled Vane Indicates Southwest Escape Route

TextMap_AnswerName_100401.ContentEN: Extended Search Zone in the Southwest: Factory · Homes · Schools

TextMap_AnswerName_100402.ContentEN: Spots of Phoxichor in the Snow

TextMap_AnswerName_100501.ContentEN: Assailant May Be an Opera Enthusiast

TextMap_AnswerName_100503.ContentEN: Operatic Melody Heard during the Attack

TextMap_AnswerName_200101.ContentEN: Mr Buck passes out after even a single sip of alcohol

TextMap_AnswerName_200102.ContentEN: Someone spiked the milk jug with alcohol

TextMap_AnswerName_200103.ContentEN: Child-sized footprints were found on Mr Buck's windowsill

TextMap_AnswerName_200104.ContentEN: Popcorn was found near the footprints

TextMap_AnswerName_200105.ContentEN: A young boy was seen selling beer and popcorn near the ticket booth

TextMap_AnswerName_200106.ContentEN: A child broke into Mr Buck's home and got him drunk

TextMap_AnswerName_200107.ContentEN: A drunkard lies slumped by the bin, shouting for more alcohol

TextMap_AnswerName_200108.ContentEN: A young girl begs her father for a taste of popcorn

TextMap_AnswerName_200201.ContentEN: The Kidnapping Case Sixteen Years Ago

TextMap_AnswerName_200202.ContentEN: Giselle's Resignation from the Escort Sixteen Years Ago

TextMap_AnswerName_200203.ContentEN: The Violet Ribbon at Sig's Grave

TextMap_AnswerName_200207.ContentEN: Giselle's Resignation Tied to the Case

TextMap_AnswerName_200208.ContentEN: A Connection Between Violetta and Violet

TextMap_AnswerName_200209.ContentEN: The Kidnapped Heiress Might Be Violetta's Missing Student

TextMap_AnswerName_200210.ContentEN: Violetta knows the Truth About the Kidnapping Sixteen Years Ago

TextMap_AnswerName_200307.ContentEN: The ghost is a Wishen, born of one of Lingling's family.
