voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Oh... You've noticed. Yes, I have one — it was given to me by someone very dear. I keep it locked away safely, but... I can't help checking on it now and then, worried it might just vanish somehow.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: Actually, I only know one. The person who gave it to me taught me. I wasn't quick to pick it up back then... maybe because I've never been good at things that require emotional expression...

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: But whenever I'm too tense or carried away, I find myself reaching for it. It's like an anchor — a reminder of the things that matter, the things I can trust. It always helps me find my calm again.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: Many of my peers rely on doctors for stress relief — sedatives, stimulants, that kind of stuff. I've never needed that. Whether my heart races or slows, the harmonica always steadies me.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Not bad. The Legion is one of the few places where hard work truly gets rewarded. I've earned my position here, and now I even have a few subordinates. I make sure they treat Charons and Solas with the same respect.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: I've heard plenty of complaints — and bitter accusations — about how harshly the Legion treats the Charon community. I do everything I can to change that... Maybe someday, people will start to see the Legion in a better light.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: Not yet. But there will be. There was a time when you wouldn't find even a single Charon in the Legion. I know I can't make a big difference just yet, but if I guide my subordinates down the right path, I believe the conflicts between Charons and Solas will ease, bit by bit.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_02_4.ContentEN: Treating everyone fairly and keeping them safe from Filthoids and Deterioration... I believe these efforts can improve life for the Charon community. Maybe, it will quiet the weary sighs echoing through Icelake a little bit.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: I wouldn't call it responsibility. I'm simply following the Escort's regulations to the letter.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: The Escort's regulations forbid any legionary from commenting on the conduct of their fellow legionaries.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: That said, I really don't understand them. Maybe, to them, it's just a job. As long as their superiors don't notice, they think it's fine to slack off or mess around.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_03_4.ContentEN: I think that kind of attitude is wrong. People need something to keep themselves in check. Without it, they'll just drift through life, letting their standards erode little by little — until they're no better than rats in the sewers.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: No... Thank you. I don't really enjoy looking at myself in the mirror. Seeing my horns always makes me feel... uncomfortable.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: No, that's not it at all. I'm not ashamed of my Charon heritage. It's just... I think my horns would look much better if they were more regular, more symmetrical. Ah, don't get me wrong! I'm not saying there's anything wrong with your horn...

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: I do... but it feels so heavy now, almost unbearably so. I'm not sure I have the strength to pick it up and play anymore.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: After all, it once carried all my hopes and dreams. Now, it just reminds me of everything I've lost.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_05_3.ContentEN: ...Thank you. I promise, when the day comes that I can pick it up again — when I'm ready to learn a new tune — I'll make sure you're the first to hear it.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_06_1.ContentEN: I've been taking on odd jobs here and there. It's enough to cover my expenses. But honestly, earning a living isn't the point anymore. These days, work is more about keeping myself busy.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_06_2.ContentEN: Yes... Work gives me purpose. It makes me happy. When I'm busy, even the sunlight feels a little warmer.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_07_1.ContentEN: Better than if I'd stayed, I suppose. The Legion was once my refuge, the place where I thought my dreams could take flight. But those dreams... they turned out to be illusions, and that so-called refuge was a hell that dragged my loved one into an unending abyss of despair...

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_07_2.ContentEN: Now, my heart burns with the desire for vengeance, yet I can't bring myself to aim my weapon at those I once called comrades. I feel lost... Tell me, what should I do?

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_topic_07_3.ContentEN: ...Sorry, I lost my cool. You're right — I need to figure it out on my own, instead of placing that weight on you. Though... it might take me some time.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_victory.ContentEN: Such a pity it ended so quickly. Take me on the next mission — you'll win, and I'll stay occupied.

voice_ch_char_Lise_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Patrol complete. No signs of dangerous creatures, structural damage, or suspicious markings. Routine operations may proceed without interruption. Report concluded.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_appear.ContentEN: Where are we heading for today's haul?

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: Let's see what we can find this time!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_birthday.ContentEN: Happy Birthday! Look, I made this for you — a little Plumpytail doll, just like mine~ You've been dying to give Plumpytail a good squeeze, haven't you? Hehe, this reticent detective has figured you out!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: Look at the fabric, the badge, and the leather! Ms Hilda, you are my angel! If you've got more of these ill-gotten goods that need "proper disposal", I'm your girl! You can count on me to take good care of them!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: Little Fina! It's been ages~ Wanna hear the next chapter of "Snowball the Cat Ranger & Ginger the Cat Detective"? No problem! Let me just grab a stool and settle in for a good tale!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: I assure you I'm an upstanding citizen, Ms Warden! Never pilfered or plundered, merely collecting some scraps from the bins to quiet my stomach. Even your dedication doesn't extend to rubbish, does it?

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_companio_04.ContentEN: You're living hand to mouth, aren't you...? That's really tough. Would you like to join me in scavenging? Might make things a bit easier...

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_companio_05.ContentEN: Ms Camilla! The kindest and most beautiful lady in Icelake! Could you maybe help me out of a tiny spot of bother... I promise this is the last time! Er, well, the last this month! You wouldn't have the heart to say no, right?

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: If only I could see Icelake... one last time...

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_fail.ContentEN: It's okay, staying alive is what counts!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_gain_1.ContentEN: Hello there, welcome to Icelake! Feeling a bit out of place? Let me, Margie, show you around the wonders of this place. First stop... surprise rubbish bins galore!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_gain_2.ContentEN: What? You've already heard of my title "Princess Rubbish Bin"?! Ugh... please don't go along with it! Just call me Margie. No princess here, just a little scavenger of Icelake!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_idle.ContentEN: Aww~ What a lovely day! Perfect for picking flowers, and I'd smell great after that~ Care to join me?

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Wow! My hauling pockets just got roomier!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Well... it's about giving discarded items a new home and providing those in need with a chance at a better life.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: For instance, turning an aristocrat's cast-off velvet curtains into warm winter coats for the elderly, or bringing discarded dolls to children whose only playthings are pebbles — they'll be overjoyed for a long time.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: There was one time, I dragged back a broken bookshelf someone had thrown out. Though I was half-dead from the effort, it quickly turned into a non-stop playground for a litter of kittens — totally worth it!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: That's scavenging for you! It's mostly small fry stuff, but never a dull moment. So, what do you say, wanna join us?

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Shhhh! That's a scavenger's top secret! I wouldn't have let you in on it if you hadn't helped me out with that thief!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: This map charts every rubbish bin in Icelake, and I've marked the few where the best stuff tends to gather — I've upgraded those bins to larger sizes and timed my visits to perfection!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: But scavenging is really hit-or-miss — mostly, it all comes down to luck...

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Oh, you've got it backwards! I love Icelake through and through. It's just that I often reminisce about the days I spent wandering the snowfields with my dad; that's how I grew up.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: From here, the snowfields look like something out of a fairy tale. But once you step into it, you'd feel so very small. Even after trudging through knee-high snow for hours, that feeling would never leave.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: I don't hate those days. But the bustling, lively Icelake is my absolute favourite!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: That's the big cat that used to roam the snowfields with me when I was little! We called him "Plumpytail". He would only let me pet him in exchange for some jerky, but oh, the feel of his fur — hehehe, it's the best of the best!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Mmm... it's certainly not like "meow"; it's more like, "raawr—raawr—!"

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: Plumpytail prefers the wild over city life. We had to go our separate ways, but she'll always be a part of me, just like the snowfields.

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: Nah-uh! That's not me! I'm too grown up for such a childish title! Please, I beg of you, don't ever call me that again!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: Ahem, that would be — Lady Margie the reticent detective, a lone shadow-walker of the city! Today, I will unveil for you the secrets of Icelake, as always!

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_topic_05_3.ContentEN: Hehe, now that's a proper title for me~

voice_ch_char_Maer_vo_welcome.ContentEN: I've cleared the snow from your doorstep on my way here! Touched, huh? Bet you're thinking of treating me to a cup of cocoa~

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_appear.ContentEN: I shall offer what humble aid I can.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: If weariness weighs on you, rest here awhile. No need to strain yourself.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: I stand watch upon the shore of the River of Life.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_birthday.ContentEN:
My dear child, you have safely journeyed through another year, and I am truly glad for you.
So, won't you make a wish? At your age, it's only natural to hold your dreams close to your heart and let them light the path ahead.
No river flows without encountering turbulence. Yet, even if thorns should wound you or the current carry you astray, I wish for you the courage to continue onward. And when you finally reach your own harbour, may you cherish every moment of the journey that brought you there.
Should you ever feel lost, or simply wish to hear a story, my arms will always be open to you. I shall keep you in my prayers and bless you... for all time.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: No soul can outrun its past forever. In time, you will have to confront yours. May you have the strength to face it when that moment arrives.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: My dear, you carry an aura I find quite familiar. Could it be that you, like me, hail from bygone days?

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: Greetings, child. Hehe... Indeed, we share a likeness in our horns. Perhaps our paths crossed long ago. But that is not your burden to bear. Set it aside, and follow the path your heart desires.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_companio_04.ContentEN: My memories span endless times, yet much of what I've witnessed is cruelty. Perhaps forgetting is indeed bliss. Trust that what truly matters shall find its way back to you, even if not held in mind.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: Don't worry... as always, I'll soon be...

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: Might as well enjoy the solace in this fleeting slumber.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_fail.ContentEN: It matters not. Victory and defeat are but fleeting moments. Rise, and begin anew.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_gain.ContentEN: I am Nifle, the Ferrywoman of the Misty Sea. Fear not — the Misty Sea does not reach this place, nor are you a wandering soul. Think of me merely as a passerby... or perhaps, a witness to your journey.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_idle.ContentEN: In a land so fraught with turmoil, having such a tranquil place for even a brief moment of peace is a rare comfort.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Like springtime's gentle return, when grasses break through the earth and trees bud anew.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_revive.ContentEN: It seems my time to depart has not yet arrived.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_skill02_r01.ContentEN: Like the merciful tears of Mother Embla.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_skill02_r02.ContentEN: As every river returns to the Misty Sea.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Be still the lost soul, 'tis my guide you follow.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Indeed. Over the course of endless time, I've travelled — or perhaps wandered — through every corner of Atlasia, treading upon every inch of its soil and tracing every grain of sand with my fingertips.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: Once you've seen enough, you'll find that the scenery of all places is not so different after all. Whether it's the snows of the North, the sands of Khemet, or the smoke curling from the chimneys of Huaxu, they are all but different shades of mist drifting through the forest.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: If I had to choose, though... it would be the mountains and forests of Aethyrie. The air there brings me the most peace.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_01_5.ContentEN: Should you wander into the Emerald Forest, would you mind bringing a bouquet of white asters for me? Beneath its earth rest my friends, my child, and a version of myself from long ago.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: The Misty Sea is the birthplace and final rest of all living beings. To the Misty Sea, the deceased return, and from there, life begins anew... just as dying clouds dissolve into the earth as rain, only for flowers to bloom again from that very soil.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: I believe so, my child. One day, you will journey to the Misty Sea, into the embrace of Mother Embla.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: My dear child, cherish all that life offers, yet do not shrink from its passing. Demise is not suffering, but the inevitable conclusion of life's journey.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_02_4.ContentEN: Should you ever grow weary, rest in my arms for a while... There is no need to fear — this will not be your eternal sleep. There is still much for you to fulfil in this world.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Did that surprise you? Long ago, during the Great Migration, I stood on the front lines as a soldier well-versed in close combat.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: Though those days are far behind me, I still remember the essentials of fighting.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: During my wanderings, I've often faced roaming beasts. Their claws and fangs have left me with scars, bruises, and even deaths I should have rightfully endured.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_03_4.ContentEN: Even the eternal moon wanes and waxes, ever changing. Humans, naturally, are far more complex — especially one who's lived countless lifetimes beyond a mortal span.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_03_5.ContentEN: If you're curious about those days, I'll recount them in detail for you another time.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: "Friends"... By the common definition of the word, I've had many over my long years.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_10.ContentEN: The funny thing is, I can't even recall why they argued in the first place. Strange, isn't it? When I think of them now, it's always these small, insignificant details that come to mind first.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_11.ContentEN: Indeed. Those were such precious, joyful days... But they are far behind me now.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Yet when I hear that word, the first who come to mind are Lexis and Erika, the two who once led me away from Elysium.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: In the annals of history and the tales of heroes, they're often portrayed as the Sage who tore away the gods' veil of ignorance, and the Heroine who gave her life for the Sage's cause...

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_4.ContentEN: But in my memories, they are simply Lexis and Erika.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_5.ContentEN: Erika was a brave and lively young woman, with a spirit that drew everyone to her. Lexis, though brilliant, often overthought things. He'd suddenly lapse into deep musings, which, ironically, made him seem a bit slow.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_6.ContentEN: Mm... There was one time Lexis tried to apologize to Erika for something he'd done. On a whim, she pointed to one of the soldiers' archery training dummies, saying she'd forgive him if he could hit the bullseye...

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_7.ContentEN: Of course, she didn't mean it seriously. Not even all the soldiers could manage it, let alone Lexis, whose hands were meant for quills and scrolls, not bows or blades.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_8.ContentEN: But he took her words to heart. After the soldiers left, he stayed behind and practised alone, long into the night.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_topic_04_9.ContentEN: As you might guess, true history is not a tale of omnipotent heroes. Even someone as brilliant as Lexis had his limits — he practised until his palms bled. Erika ended up wrapping them in linen, but he never did strike the mark.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_victory.ContentEN: Those drifting towards the Misty Sea shall find solace in her embrace, borne upon the rains of renewal, to merge with the next endless stream.

voice_ch_char_Nifu_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Ah, it's you, my dear child. Good day. Is there something on your mind you'd like to share with me?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_appear.ContentEN: I knew you'd bring me along.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: I wish my journey wouldn't end so soon.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: I'm so excited! I finally get to fight with you!

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_birthday.ContentEN: Happy birthday, I have a gift for you.... I hope you like it. It's a snowflake lotus. It symbolises "rebirth." You see, from the moment we met, we've shared countless adventures, and in that time, I've witnessed your growth and "rebirth." So, I think this lotus is the perfect gift for you!

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: I heard you planned a great birthday celebration for Fina. I know that you possess a considerate heart, despite your sharp tongue. Can I join you next time when you prepare a big birthday surprise for her?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: Camilla, you remind me of your noisy yet homey tavern. I'm so blessed to have friends like you guys.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_companio_03.ContentEN:
Are you gonna tell me the story of Elysium? Thank you so much! I wonder what kind of flowers you'd like in return?
Delicious ones, you say?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: After fighting alongside you... I have no regrets.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_fail.ContentEN: It's okay. Here's a flower for you. Next time, fortune will be on our side.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_gain.ContentEN: Is that you... My friend from afar? Does your voice call out to me?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_idle.ContentEN: I feel like time flies when I do nothing but watch you guys... I wish time wouldn't go so fast.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Now I can protect you all!

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Decay, or burn in the sunshine.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Thank you! Actually, we Charons are quite resilient to the cold, so there's no need for expensive, heavy coats.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: My mom made this dress, but I chose the colour — this vibrant green — and the butterfly details too. They'd look right at home somewhere warm, like the south.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Really? That's so nice to hear! Actually, I've only seen blue butterflies around Icelake. I'd love to see what other colours are out there someday.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Yeah, it's been that way for ages. We're treated like pests and I've faced harassment and insults for no reason.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: Probably. They say "Magic is the root of all evil." History books claim our ancestors used it to rule over humans a thousand years ago, committing terrible acts.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: Honestly, I can hardly imagine that... The Charons I know are too terrified of humans to even speak up around them, let alone use magic.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_4.ContentEN: And Most Charon magic is quite ordinary — just good for simple things like lighting fireplaces or freezing food.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_5.ContentEN: Not at all. Why must one rule over the other? Why can't Charons and humans just live in peace?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_02_6.ContentEN: All I wish for is that when spring comes, everyone can go out together to enjoy all kinds of flowers. That would be enough for me.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Ah, that might be from my new gardening project. The courtyard at the Hypnos' House looked a bit barren with just a few trees, so I planted some white flowers there.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: Perhaps we should plant some here too — bellflowers, windflowers, white dryas... Which would suit this place best?

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: Right, it should be a group decision... I'll ask around! By the way, which flower do you like best? I'll pick some for you when they bloom.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: No, I've been here my whole life. I always hear those trains and wonder about the places they're heading to. I'd really love to see what's out there.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Mm, I'd definitely want to visit the capital, for starters; Uncle Henrik once told me the sunsets in Scarletriver are breathtaking... Oh, and I'd love to visit Purgatorio Island you told me about — to feel the sea breeze and see if it's as salty as you described!

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: Oh, it's just that... I want to take a good look at you all, to memorize your faces better.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: Could you maybe take a moment to look at me carefully? I'd like you to remember me... just as I am right now.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_victory.ContentEN: This journey will be etched in my heart forever.

voice_ch_char_Saiqi_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Such a relief — I'm still here today. And so are you...

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_appear.ContentEN: Are you inviting me on a date?

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: Hurry up! I don't want to ruin our date by being late.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: My venom is surging like my passion for love…

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_birthday.ContentEN: I heard today is your birthday. Would you like to accompany me to my aroma garden? That's where I keep the aromatic ingredients especially for you. Each one contains the pure aroma of love, which is meant for us, and us alone. What? *chuckle* Are they toxic? Well, come with me and you'll find out.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_companio_01.ContentEN:
That dry scent... Oh, it's you. Long time no see. Still planning to take me away in handcuffs? That sounds like a fun idea...
After all, even if I gave you a thousand chances, I would still escape from your grasp... Wouldn't you agree, Ms Warden?

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: You're scared of me? Don't worry. I'll make you love me eventually. Come, have a whiff of the perfume I've blended. It smells very sweet, and I believe you'll love it.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: You're a weirdo like me. You enjoy getting hurt, savour pains and immerse yourself in slaughtering your enemies without blinking an eye... I get it. *giggle* That must be how you express your love.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: God of Love... Please don't forsake me...

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_fail.ContentEN: Failure hurts... I could really use a bit of comfort from you.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_gain.ContentEN: What a romantic encounter! Was this the God of Love's work? I'm Rebecca, a perfumer. How about indulging in a truly unique scent, the L'essence De L'amour? I made it myself.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_idle.ContentEN: Are you staying here to spend some lovely time with me? *giggle* I'm already looking forward to it.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Is this a reward for my overwhelming love?

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_revive.ContentEN: I can feel it, the power of love!

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_skill02_r01.ContentEN: Sweet venom going down your throat!

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Fear not, for I'll send you to the Land of Love.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Yes, I love rainy days. They remind me of the love stories I've read, where romantic encounters always happen on a rainy day.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: Have you ever observed those seeking shelter from the rain? They meet under eaves, the damp air enhancing the fragrance of greenery, love gently flowing with tentative advances...

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Hehe, join me next time it rains, and you'll see what I mean.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Ah, you're initiating a conversation about love with me — how unexpected.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: Hmm, how should I put it? ...It's like water in perfume, which kisses and embraces each ingredient, devours and absorbs their fragrance, and eventually blends with them to create a long-lasting aroma...

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: There's much more to that. I seek a love so profound that we become truly inseparable... Even if life itself ends, one will become the mulch for the flowers in our garden; the blooms will turn into perfume, lingering around the other for eternity.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Special? Indeed... Many have seen me as a "monster" since I was young.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: The looks of disgust on their faces aren't pleasant, which should be corrected...

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: Perhaps a little sting of my toxin in their skin will soften those harsh looks... Hehe.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_03_4.ContentEN: So, when you say "special", do you mean special like a monster... or specially enchanting?

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: I'm perfectly fine. My venom is part of me, like a gift from the God of Love — it's harmless to me, and will help me find my destined lover.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Of course. Though it often casts me as a monster, it also sets me apart. I believe that the destined lover meant for a monster must be quite special, don't you think?

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: It's my signature perfume, with top notes as intense as a first encounter, heart notes of sweet nothings that fix the scent, and a base note that lingers with a bittersweet aftertaste.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: That's my little secret. However, I'd be delighted to guide you through the blending process myself, one step at a time.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_victory.ContentEN: I will punish those who aren't faithful to love in the God of Love's name.

voice_ch_char_Shuimu_vo_welcome.ContentEN: I've been waiting here ever since I woke up. My venom has almost run dry... So, it's a good thing you came. I can feel it bubbling through my veins again. Can you come a little closer...?

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_appear.ContentEN: Filbert, wakey-wakey! It's time to leave!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_birthday.ContentEN: Happy birthday! I made a giant cream cake with nuts and jam. But, the smell lured in lots of people... so... um... I shared it with them too. But don't worry! I saved one piece for you! Look! I picked the biggest piece with jam and borealberry on it. Try it. It tastes much better than our army rations.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: You found sprouting potatoes in the bin? Don't throw them away — let's plant them! With a little digging and watering, we'll have lots of potatoes for everyone soon enough!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: You're always working so hard. Don't you get hungry? Why not join the Church? I'm sure I'll make your tummy full!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: Helloooo! I heard that praying can make one's soul feel uplifted. Personally, I think that a good meal does the same thing. But which one works better, praying or dining?

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: Look... huge ears of wheat... They're even bigger than berries.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: Impossible... I had a full meal before battle...

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_fail.ContentEN: Filbert, are you okay? Are you hurt? Oh my little sweetie, lemme give you a hug.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_gain.ContentEN: Hellooo! It's me, the Commissary, Truffle, with my faithful followers by my side, Filbert and her family. That's it for my self-introduction. But I gotta say, your eyes look as big as saucers! You must be starving!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_idle.ContentEN: Let's take some rest, Filbert. Have some grains and nuts, and a few flowers for snacks. If you're full, I'll pin them to my hat for now.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_lvup.ContentEN: An empty tummy won't get you far in battle. So gobble up some grub and prepare to charge towards victory!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_revive.ContentEN: Emergency food is gross... Well, at least it fills up my tummy.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_skill02_r01.ContentEN: The Commissary's coming. Bid farewell to your hunger!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_skill02_r02.ContentEN: The special Commissary's here. Feast till forever!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Gimme the food, or else I'll smash you.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Huh? You don't know? A commissary's job is to make sure everyone's well-fed, dealing with all sorts of food every day.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: For example, I go out to gather all kinds of ingredients from the wild, have Filbert haul them back, and then get Mr Beard at the bakery to turn them into yummy food for everyone.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: And just so you know, haggling with Mr Beard is part of my job too! Hehe.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: Oh, not at all! The others seem to be brainy types; they're all about the paperwork — filling out application forms, then waiting for trains loaded with food to roll in.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_01_5.ContentEN: But for a small town like ours, just Filbert and I can feed everyone! Otherwise, I might have to start filling out those forms too — ugh, it's all gibberish to me.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Hmm... maybe it does? I've never really thought about it, but Filbert only knocks down those no-good, shouty, fighty troublemakers! They totally deserve it!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: Those guys always end up hungry after their brawls. They'd do more good ploughing fields than swinging weapons — that way, less people would go to bed hungry.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: Absolutely! Fighting just leads to hunger — that's really awful! I've heard that in times of war, everyone ends up starving, which is just the worst! I hope I never have to see that.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_02_4.ContentEN: Right! Anyone who makes people go hungry will sooner or later get knocked over by Filbert!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Yeah, she is! And you know what, even across several creeks, Filbert can sniff out ripe berries and then off we go charging! Pretty awesome, isn't she?

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: No worries at all! Filbert always brings more food. So never ever make fun of her — it would hurt her feelings, and mine too.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Thank you! Actually, these are shorts, not a dress. They did start as a pretty, long, white dress; then the lady at the tailor's shop turned them into shorts for me.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Because dresses aren't the best for all the running around I do. One time, I tripped over the hem and all the bread in my arms went flying.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: But if the day comes, when no one's starving anymore, I'll have them changed back into a dress!

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: Oh, I was meditating, not zoning out. I'm a member of the Elysian Church after all, so I do try to give some deep thought occasionally.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: I used to wonder about that, but the clergy said it was... blastphomy or something. So I stopped thinking about that.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_topic_05_3.ContentEN: I never quite get what they say, like how gluttony is a terrible sin... but it seems like the higher someone's status, the more they eat.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_victory.ContentEN: Let's have a celebratory feast! Erm... No, that'd be a waste of food.

voice_ch_char_Songlu_vo_welcome.ContentEN: The sun is shining bright, and the little birdies are chirping with joy after a hearty meal. Are you hungry too? Wanna grab something to eat as well?

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_appear.ContentEN: You have set the stage anew for me.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: What did I used to look like, I wonder...

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: Now presenting: a tale of adventure and grandeur.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_birthday.ContentEN:
Happy birthday, {nickname}. Thank you for inviting me.
To me, ever since I was cast off the stage, birthdays have become a bitter reminder of painful days gone by, like extinguished spotlights that will never shine again or old scripts crumpled and forgotten at the bottom of a bin.
Yet today, I find myself pondering what an ordinary birthday might be like — one composed of simple, warm moments that hold a special meaning only for those who are part of them: a handmade gift box with uneven edges, a cake slightly marred by a misplaced candle, and—
...A birthday song sung by friends? You mean you'd like me to sing? Very well, but I must confess, I don't know the birthday tune of your homeland. You'll have to teach me first. Don't worry — I'm a fast learner.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_companio_01.ContentEN:
How have you been lately?
...Apologies for the abruptness. We don't actually know each other. I was... merely enquiring for a friend.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: Is that so? You've found a new home and a family who cares for you... That's wonderful. You've broken free of your cage — what a brave soul you are.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_companio_03.ContentEN:
Miss, the music you play is truly captivating. May I ask the name of this piece?
Ah, an original composition of yours... Such an enviable gift. Might I have the honour of admiring the sheet music?

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_companio_04.ContentEN: Your mimicry is extraordinary. Even the finest stage prop artists couldn't craft something so exquisitely detailed.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_companio_05.ContentEN: I have no need for a mirror to continuously remind me of my own grotesqueness.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_fail.ContentEN: Tragedy is the ordeal of the brave.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_gain.ContentEN: May we meet in the blackest hour of night, where shadows veil my face, sparing you the terror of beholding my true form.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_idle.ContentEN: Hush... I am nearly in character.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_lvup.ContentEN: I have rehearsed for such moments countless times in the past.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_skill02_r01.ContentEN: Even if I am reduced to a beast—

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Even if all dreams are shattered.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: He was a shattered crystal lamp, a fallen star plunged into a filthy gutter.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: He was just like those things — laughably absurd, yet somehow, they shine brilliantly.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: The wall between our cells was so thin, every sound passed through. There he was, barely a metre away — rambling about his family, spinning dreams of the future, or singing some hopelessly off-key tune.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: For a moment, I'd forget I was a caged beast. Instead, I'd feel like an ordinary child in school, waking from a nightmare during an afternoon nap to the racket of a noisy classmate beside me.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_01_6.ContentEN: But "friend" is far too bright a word for someone like me. We were more like two stranded fish, floundering together in a drying riverbed.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Why should I? Parsifal's story ended long ago. That name is but a distant echo now, so faint and far away that I sometimes wonder if it was ever real.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: Then I shall carry this final performance to its conclusion — for you, my last and only audience.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_02_4.ContentEN: Thank you, for granting me a stage to rest my weary soul.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: You're so kind. Thank you. Yet, all my vows have been fulfilled. There's little left that stirs my heart.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: Should you ever find yourself at the Galea Theatre, please convey to Ms Violetta that I've settled down in Aethyrie. Assure her not to worry, as I am doing very well now.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_03_4.ContentEN: "A land of music and poetry, where every pebble taps out a rhythm, and every brook sings a melody."

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_03_5.ContentEN: Hopefully, that'll keep her from enquiring after me. Once her favoured pupil... I'd rather not tarnish her memories.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Why seek to learn acting? You have no need to become someone else.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: When you're on stage, every part of you — from your very bones to the breaths you take — is surrendered to the character. In that moment, you can shed all your sorrows and pain, stepping into a world unblemished by reality.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: But you... you were born the {性别：hero|heroine} of your own story, already carrying the admiration and trust of those around you. You shine effortlessly, needing no spotlight to dazzle.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: It stands, enduring time far beyond my years. On one side of its towering walls lies the imposing inner city — majestic as storm clouds, yet colder.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_2.ContentEN: Elegantly clad figures alight from silk-lined carriages, discussing art, poetry, and the perpetual gloom of the skies. They gossip about balls and betrothals, lamenting how the mire of melting snow from the outer city soils their fine leather boots.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_3.ContentEN: On the other side of the walls, the rowdy fog district buzzes with chaos. Vendors hawk loudly, mothers clutch their children, begging for a scrap of rye bread. Mischievous hands sketch defiant graffiti, always a step ahead of the patrols.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_4.ContentEN: And so stands our Galea Theatre, caught between these two worlds, hearing all yet understanding none.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_5.ContentEN: Oddly, it's not the scripts or the lavish costumes that first come to mind, nor the cluttered prop room I swept daily.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_6.ContentEN: It's the velvet carpet that blanketed the stage after the curtain fell. As a child, after the earliest performance I can remember, my mother and I lingered on the stage after everyone left, reciting lines and dancing through the night.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_topic_05_7.ContentEN: When dawn broke, exhaustion finally overtook me. I lay down on that carpet, resting my head on Mother's lap, and drifted into a long, sweet dream.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_victory.ContentEN: Comedy is the satire of the wise.

voice_ch_char_Tuosi_vo_welcome.ContentEN: I assume the role of the shattered prisoner, and you, as a watchful warden, stand sentinel over my chains.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_appear.ContentEN: Seeking aid from an enemy? Good, it seems hatred hasn't completely clouded your judgment.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: No slacking; in the Legion, you'd have felt the whip by now.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: Who has the sheer audacity to waste my time?

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_birthday.ContentEN: What are you waiting for? You want me to make a cake for you? Hah! Don't be ridiculous. Perhaps, I'll be kind and go easy on you in our next battle.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: Our paths are diametrically opposed. I've doubted myself before, wondering if you were right. Sadly, you will only be remembered as the defeated.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: Were you not his heir... my blade would have found your heart by now.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_companio_04.ContentEN: The more flawless your disguise, the sharper the fangs you've honed in the dark. I await the day you reveal your true nature, so I can shatter those fangs without mercy.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_companio_05.ContentEN:
Have all the recent mission briefings, combat plans, logistical documents, and loss reports been organised?
Good. Then let's also finalise the external campaign slogans, domestic case analyses, routine reports to the Emperor, and the test data for the new weapons from Spathatoi today. These are part of our job, not an extra burden.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: I'll see you again soon... Your Majesty.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: Your Majesty, I'm sorry... I didn't...

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_fail.ContentEN: Next time, I'll crush every last one of you to dust.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_gain.ContentEN: I know what you wish to ask, but you're not yet strong enough to warrant my response. So, lay down your weapon; that's the kindest advice I can offer.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_idle.ContentEN: Exposing your back to your enemy so carelessly... Is it naivety or sheer folly?

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Ascend relentlessly, or be consumed by the abyss.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_revive.ContentEN: Hell's not so bad. I've been there before.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_skill02_r02.ContentEN: Scream louder, then I might show you some mercy!

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: A special force under the direct command of the Emperor, tasked with covert missions and serving as a hammer ready to strike on the battlefield.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: You got it all wrong. Without the Emperor, the Legion still stands; without the Legion, however, the crown would surely fall.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Feel free to try. Treason is a grave offence, and any accusation would work its way up through the ranks and end up right on my desk.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Hmph, my allegiance is not to the Empire, but to my ideals. A man once gave everything for these, and it is his legacy that I strive to uphold.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: You're not wrong. To get what I desire, I'll use everything at my disposal and climb the ladder by any means necessary; but each step I take is a step closer to what I believe in. Where have your steps led you?

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: It's okay. My family's long gone anyway.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: I find it liberating, actually. It means no more distractions — just a clear path to contend with my enemies, both known and hidden.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: Sentiment and feelings are merely weaknesses for anyone in the Legion.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Indeed. I've endured my share of curses and jibes to my face, and those from the gutter surely grumble even more.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: Fortunately, in this unjust world, absolute power can still earn one a modicum of respect.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: Exactly, which is why I'll never show weakness; otherwise, they'd pounce like wolves at the scent of blood, eager to tear me apart.

voice_ch_char_Xibi_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Watching your relentless efforts to strengthen yourself, I can't help but look forward to the day you challenge me again.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_appear.ContentEN: Fine, I'll humour you — for now.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: The laundry is about to dry...

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_birthday.ContentEN: Happy birthday. If my memory serves me, today is your special day. I presume you require no further assistance, as you must be celebrating with the others. I shall retire to my quarters for a well-deserved rest now. Oh yes, I have prepared a cake for you, which I have left on your table. I am confident the flavour will meet your expectations, so please make sure you finish it all.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: My favourite flower grows under a dome of eternal warmth. One petal distilled in the evening tea, brings a restful slumber. Yet ten petals are poisonous and have the power to induce eternal sleep. In my dreams, I prune this flower, and upon waking, I am grateful that I will never have to tend to it again.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: Marvellous. It amazes me that you are constantly pondering such profound matters. As for myself, I am but a humble servant, concerned only with the minutiae of daily life.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: These piles of clutter have long been an eyesore. I'd be delighted if you could take them away. But, before you step into the room, I must insist on a proper cleanup — no objections, and certainly no squirming.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: That's going back in the wash...

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_fail.ContentEN: My apologies. I seem to have underestimated this filth. I must acquire more suitable cleaning tools.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_gain.ContentEN: I'm Hilda, a humble maid in charge of Miss Flora's everything from daily routines and meal plans to tailoring and hosting — oh, and should the occasion arise, I'm quite adept at dispatching any nuisances or unwanted guests. Just a little extra service I offer.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_idle.ContentEN: From dawn till dusk, a maid is always bustling about. But every now and again, she may come across an undesirable distraction, such as a wandering conversationalist seeking her attention while she is busy compiling the next week's menu.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_lvup.ContentEN: As a refined maid, I should thank you. But getting stronger just means more work for me.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_revive.ContentEN: After taking a brief respite, I can now resume my cleaning duties.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_skill01_r01.ContentEN: Basic sounds or short sentences indicating getting injured, but it hurts more than under light attack.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_skill02_r02.ContentEN: The cleaning is proceeding well, albeit with a touch of noise, there is no need for concern.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Indeed. The persistent fog means laundry never dries and it clings to the ever-present dust.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: And sometimes, it emboldens certain undesirables to creep close to Miss Flora.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Sunny days do favour the laundry, yet they also make it easier for Miss Flora and me to be spotted. There's no ideal weather for us, just less troublesome days.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Why, isn't it normal for a maid to be able to fight? Nothing out of the ordinary here.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: Be it flies or Filthoids, all are mere dirt that needs to be cleared away. Think of my combat as just another form of cleaning — only more exhilarating.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Dangerous items? What do you mean? Could you be more specific? Please don't beat around the bush.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: ...Ah, yes, I do have a certain preference for firearms. Among all the cleaning tools, I find them uniquely satisfying to handle, and unmatched in cleaning up certain messes.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: If you've been feeling stressed, perhaps I could lend you a few. A little "rat-a-tat-tat", you might find it quite therapeutic.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Mm, maybe. I don't waste time on pleasantries with those who matter little to me.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: That's because you've paid well. Should your funds dry up, my enthusiasm might just wane.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: No need to fret. Trust me, I won't let it come to that.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_05_1.ContentEN: Hmm? W...Where? She shouldn't be here today according to her calendar...

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_05_3.ContentEN: Not at all. Miss Flora means the world to me. Perhaps it's bold of me to say, but she's much more than just my honorable lady...

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_05_4.ContentEN: Regrettably, I'm not a poet; otherwise, I'd find the perfect word for her, which combines the meanings of friend and family.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_topic_05_5.ContentEN: I prefer keeping such feelings to myself — clearing the path for Miss Flora is both my duty and my privilege.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_victory_r01.ContentEN: Phew, cleanup complete! Now, off to tackle the laundry.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_victory_r02.ContentEN: Phew, cleanup complete! Now, off to prepare dinner.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_victory_r03.ContentEN: Phew, cleanup complete! Now, off to water the flowers.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_victory_r04.ContentEN: Phew, cleanup complete! Now, off to fashion a new dress for Miss Flora.

voice_ch_char_Xier_vo_welcome.ContentEN: How may I be of assistance today? Would you like a refreshing cup of flower tea? Or perhaps you would prefer me to deal with some of your pesky foes?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_appear.ContentEN: Oliver should be m-much better at f-fighting than me...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_battleidle.ContentEN:
Hey, don't just stand there, find something to blow up.
Shh, we need to stick to the plan.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_battlestart_r02.ContentEN: The experiment's about to begin, be c-careful.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_birthday.ContentEN:
Yale: Happy birthday! I... I had made a gift for you. It was a new model Tot Popper. I drew a picture on it of us fighting side by side…
Yale: But every time I finished, Oliver wiped it off, and I insisted on redoing it... one thing led to another, the bomb went off... Um, I'll make you another one today!
Oliver: Give it a rest, Yale. That's supposed to be art? It looks like two half-dead Filthoids! Step aside — let this genius draw a "Bomb Master" and show {nickname} what real art looks like!

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_companio_01.ContentEN:
H-hello... Your singing is really b-beautiful.
Hmph, just another victim.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_companio_02.ContentEN:
Is Filbert... your friend? I have a good friend too. He's as r-reliable as F-Filbert.
Wait, seriously?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: Uh... p-please don't be mad, a-all my bomb experiments are up to s-s-s-safety s-standards...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: Yale... must feel the pain too...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: It's okay, Oliver. I'm here with you...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_fail.ContentEN: Hmph, you won't get away next time.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_gain.ContentEN:
H-Hello... I'm Yale. Y-You are here for some Tot P-P-Poppers, right?
Ugh, great, no improvement at all.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_idle.ContentEN:
Peter Piker p-picked a peck of p-p-peckled peppers…
It's "Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers!" Come on, Yale, keep up!
O-Okay! P-Peter Piker p-picked…

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Yay! Oliver, we've grown stronger together.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: Oliver is not a talking bomb... It might sound strange, but... he's actually...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: Ugh, you're killing me here! I am Yale, and Yale is me. Got it? Not that I'd expect someone with your pea-sized brain to understand.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Oliver's a-a-actually a nice guy! He might s-seem a bit rough, and mean, a-and likes to pop up out of the b-blue, but...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: Hey! That's your idea of nice words?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: I... I might not be much help. The only thing I'm good at... is probably making Tot Poppers...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: They're the most popular items at our "Snap 'n' Spark" toy store... They take a lot of time to make.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: But it's not because I'm skilled... It's all thanks to Oliver's expertise.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Ah, sorry! B-But if I start speaking fast, my tongue tends to get all t-t-tied up.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: I-It's okay, sometimes Oliver speaks for me... And when no one else's around, Oliver would always hear me out.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: I never really had a "childhood"... From my earliest memories, I've been in this body. Oliver might have one, though.

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: I've sometimes wondered what having a "childhood" would be like... Would Mr Jones have told me bedtime stories every night, like a normal dad...?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: You expect that jerk to tell you bedtime stories? Have you lost your mind?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_topic_04_4.ContentEN: S-Sorry! I-I know he only cared about his experiments... He wouldn't have done that...

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_victory.ContentEN: Did you like my awesome masterpiece?

voice_ch_char_Yeer_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Hi... Such a nice day, isn't it... Perfect for some explosive experiments... Um, what a nice day.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: I'll take care of the dirty work.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_birthday.ContentEN:
Birthdays? I hardly paid attention to such occasions — my allegiance to the Nine Chapters renders life and death mere footnotes.
Yet, a kind wish can bring a smile, perhaps. ...Happy Birthday.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: I know not of the history you've forsaken, but our scents are alike. Keep your distance - I find little comfort in my own kind.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: We are no longer comrades of old. Like the fleeting wind, people drift by. Best leave yesteryear behind.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: Your resolve and adherence to law command my respect. Do moments of doubt ever cloud your certitude?

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: I'm sorry... you had to see this...

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: Can I... cast away my shackles...?

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_gain.ContentEN: Are you requesting my assistance as a friend? Or do you see me as nothing but a weapon to be wielded at your will?

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_idle.ContentEN: An uneventful day is a good day.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_lvup.ContentEN: The seasons may shift, yet strife lingers evermore.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_revive.ContentEN: Do the shackles pursue even those who took refuge in death?

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: ...Go read a tome or seek another's company for such trivial discourse. Perhaps the Starweavers peddling their crafts would indulge your curiosity.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: I am oft preoccupied, and my perspectives are notably skewed. Should your curiosity truly beckon, a visit thither would enlighten you far beyond any second-hand account.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: The Nine Chapters are the sacred laws of Huaxu, brooking no defiance. Should anyone dare to challenge divine decree, it falls upon some to quell the ensuing turmoil.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: ...Perhaps in title. I seldom consort with the commoners. My presence, necessary as it may be for law's enforcement, often brings collateral grief. Few in Huaxu would greet me with joy.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: There is nought to celebrate. That is the entirety of the matter.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: Your concern is appreciated, yet I would not burden another soul with my woes. It is unnecessary.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Indeed. The moon, a celestial marvel, purifies the remnants of the day, be it festivity or foul deed. Through the ages, the crescent merely watches from its lofty perch.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: No, I am one who has bid farewell to the past. Tonight, I simply indulged in an extra half cup of wine.

voice_ch_char_Yuming_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Do what you need to. Cherish your freedom before the chains of law bind you.

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_appear.ContentEN: Are we going on an adventure today?

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: *yawn* I'm bored out of my mind!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: Ta-da! Demon Tabethe the Red Hand has arrived!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_birthday.ContentEN: I've never celebrated my birthday, so I'm not really sure what I meant to say. But how about this? I wish you never have to know what it's like to be starving or have to steal to survive.

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: You wanna catch me? Why? I'm not a bad girl! I only steal from other thieves. It's no big deal... Hey, stay away from me! Ow! That burnt!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_companio_02.ContentEN: This is for me? Hmm, but you look pretty dangerous, so you'd better keep it. Wait... this scent is making me feel light-headed... My body is going numb... You really are dangerous!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_companio_03.ContentEN:
I love the way you talk to your sword!
"Samel, do you like this place? Let's explore more places together!"
Hey, what's up with you, getting all riled up? Haha, you're a proper laugh!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: Demon Tabethe the Red Hand never loses...

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: This shouldn't be the end of my game...

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_fail.ContentEN: You guys are worse than those thieves! *sob*

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_gain.ContentEN: Ooh, what a fine collection you have! It's got me feeling a bit intrigued... Don't worry, Demon Tabethe the Red Hand never steals from the fair and honest. Or, perhaps you're on the naughty list?

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_idle.ContentEN: Heyyyy, lemme fight with you. I'm bored stiff and my tentacles need to stretch out!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_lvup.ContentEN: Hehe, the next time I disguise myself as a barrel, you won't be able to recognize me!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_revive.ContentEN: That wasn't the end for me. I knew it!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_skill02_r01.ContentEN: Ouch! That hurt... Pss, not really!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_skill02_r03.ContentEN: Demon Tabethe the Red Hand's coming!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: "Your smile in the morning is already the greatest pick-me-up of all. From now on, I'll always be there to keep you safe." Hee hee, pretty convincing, isn't it?

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: Are you angry? Hehehe, that scowl on your face makes me want to mimic you even more!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Easy, I can change my look however I want! Hehe, I can take any shape, any colour, and blend in anywhere perfectly. No one can spot me!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: One time, I even turned into a barrel just to scare you, but you never came near...

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_02_3.ContentEN: What?! Wait, so you knew it was me and just walked away? That's not cool!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: Hey! Don't lump me together with those baddies who steal from just anyone! I'm nothing like them!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: I only steal from thieves. I blend in, sneak up close, and pluck my favourite treasures right from their pockets!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: When they find out, their faces are priceless! Hehe... If anything, I'm more like a vigilante!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Of course not. You wouldn't like it either if people called you a "demon" with a frown and disgust.

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: That's because I want to make the word "demon" cool. Now, the mere mention of my title "Demon Tabethe the Red Hand" sends shivers down the spine of those thieves.

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: And one day, the word "demon" will only make people think how awesome I am. That'll be pretty cool, don't you think?

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_victory.ContentEN: You idiots. You didn't touch a single hair on my head. Hah!

voice_ch_char_Zhangyu_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Now's the perfect timing. I should head out before... Huh?! When did you get here?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_appear.ContentEN: Need my assistance? Heh. I'd be pleased to lend a hand.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_battleidle.ContentEN: Time is precious — as is my service fee.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_battlestart.ContentEN: Let's make it quick and decisive.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_birthday.ContentEN:
Today is your birthday. I have prepared a small gift for you — you may open it later.
Surprised that I know? Let's just say I pulled a few strings to acquire your profile. The details, naturally, have remained etched in my memory.
Much has changed with time, yet my wish for your continued well-being and happiness remains the same. But if you do not mind hearing it from me... Happy Birthday.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_companio_01.ContentEN: Your perfume carries a bold, intoxicating sweetness — unrestrained, unapologetic. A striking contrast to the subtle fragrances of Huaxu. I'm intrigued.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_companio_02_1.ContentEN: Deception may serve its purpose in war, but in the finer art of human interaction, it is a blunt instrument. Overreliance on such tactics does little more than tarnish one's standing in business.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_companio_02_2.ContentEN: But, of course, you have your own way with everything. My words, I suspect, fall on deaf ears.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_companio_03.ContentEN: I saw a trace of someone I once knew in you... No, I must be mistaken. Pay me no mind.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_companio_04.ContentEN: It has been some time since I last had the pleasure of tasting a drink personally prepared by you. If time allows, may I trouble you for another glass of your delightful afternoon concoction today?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_die_r01.ContentEN: Never thought... I would miscalculate one day...

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_die_r02.ContentEN: So, I could not escape it in the end...

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_fail.ContentEN: Do not let despair cloud your judgment. Reassess and try again.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_gain.ContentEN: Most things in this world are but illusions — sincerity or calculation, does it truly matter? In the end, all that counts is that I stand before you, here and now.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_idle.ContentEN: I had my secretary clear my schedule for the next few days. For now, I wish only to savour this tranquillity with you, untouched by the clamour of the outside world. Is this out of sincerity, or another calculated move? Why don't you take a guess?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_lvup.ContentEN: As expected, everything falls neatly into place.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_revive.ContentEN: Did you truly think this was over? A grave miscalculation.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_01_1.ContentEN: There is nothing that cannot be leveraged in a negotiation. The only question is — what price will move the scales in your favour?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_01_2.ContentEN: Indeed. Your life, mine, and the lives of countless others — each is but a piece on a grander board, their worth determined only by the stakes at play.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_01_3.ContentEN: For those as insignificant as we, to exchange what little we have for what we desire... is that not, in itself, a stroke of fortune?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_01_4.ContentEN: Does my answer unsettle you? Then, by all means, prove me wrong.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_02_1.ContentEN: Mmm... Never lose yourself in fleeting profits and losses. Play the long game. Be generous when needed. Learn to read people, to use them, and to grant them favours, so that they respect you, admire you, and also fear you. True power lies in that delicate balance.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_02_2.ContentEN: Heh. Goods have fixed prices, but human connections are a different currency altogether. Those who haggle over every coin will remain forever bound to their little corner of the market. Only by mastering the art of influence can one rise above mere trade and ascend to true greatness.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_03_1.ContentEN: I am often entangled in the minutiae of business, rarely afforded the luxury of leisure.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_03_2.ContentEN: Yet, if fate were to grant me a fleeting moment of respite... I would likely seek solace in the theatre. Be it the age-old storytelling traditions of Huaxu, the refined operas of the Empire, or the avant-garde films gaining traction overseas — each offers its own intrigue.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_03_3.ContentEN: Heh... No, I suppose not. Theatre distils fleeting moments of life, yet within those fragments, it unveils profound truths about the human soul — one that defies reason, thrives in contradiction, and remains endlessly captivating in its unpredictability.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_03_4.ContentEN: So, what unexpected turns will you bring to my story? I shall be watching with keen interest.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_04_1.ContentEN: Hmm? So, you've noticed. An old habit, nothing more.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_04_2.ContentEN: When I was little, an accident left me stranded in a pitch-black ravine for three days and nights. It was then that this... tendency took root.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_04_3.ContentEN: In this world, everyone harbours their own fears. I am no exception... You seem surprised. May I ask why?

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_04_4.ContentEN: Heh... You're right. Weakness can be a merchant's undoing.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_topic_04_5.ContentEN: I underwent rigorous training to suppress this fear. At the negotiating table, I can cast it aside with ease. But in your presence, there is no need for such pretences.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_victory.ContentEN: A trifling matter, hardly worth mentioning.

voice_ch_char_Zhiliu_vo_welcome.ContentEN: Ah, so you've come to see me... Are you still resentful? Conflicted, perhaps? Or have you become indifferent toward me? It makes no difference. We have all the time in the world to figure it out.
